# Nouns Center by cdt.eth

adapted from cdt.eth's post on discourse:  

![n](https://aws1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/original/1X/70ba17820156a1a258994d06263ec04c7de22a14.png)

## Who is behind this proposal?

**[cdt.eth ](https://twitter.com/cdt_eth) -** [Christian ](https://twitter.com/cdt_eth) is a software engineer who has worked on the [Nouns POAP](https://nounspoap.com/) team, created [ToadzToolz ](https://toadztoolz.com/) for Cryptoadz, and [SharkDAO‚Äôs ](https://sharkdao.community/) website as well as the forthcoming SharkDAO PFP project and a secret Nouns project with [12BNoun ](https://twitter.com/12bnoun). He‚Äôs also opened some PRs on https://nouns.wtf/ and has been an early-supporter of Nouns.

## What is it?

[Nouns Center ](https://twitter.com/NounsCenter) ([nouns.center ](https://nouns.center/)) will be a home for the Nouns community. The hope is to document all existing creators & projects, and help people discover the hundreds of new ones that will launch in the future. I did something similar with the Cryptoadz community by creating [ToadzToolz.com ](https://toadztoolz.com/toolz), but that was mainly to showcase projects. Whereas my vision for Nouns Center is to serve the community in 3 main ways.

**1. Knowledge Center**

* Brand & product design resources
* A traditional help center
* Responses from Nounders to FAQs

**2. Project Aggregator**

* showcase all projects built off Nouns
* prove the power & track scale of CC0
* inspire more art & derivatives

**3. Onboarding Ramp**

* help others use Nouns in projects
* explain Nouns buying process
* submitting proposals

**Whether you want to buy a Noun, create a derivative, contribute to the codebase, or submit a proposal, this information should be clear and immediately accessible to you.**

## Video Explainer

Here is a pitch from Christian to Seneca on the idea, for anyone who might prefer to hear him talk through his vision for Nouns World.

![|480x360](https://aws1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/original/1X/42dff306eeea9c1a85fba96e594b5376276dbaab.jpeg "Nouns Center")

[Nouns Center](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4rDpYBeOpM8)

# 1) **Knowledge Center**

I will compile all Noun trait files, fonts, logos, colors hex values etc in one place to help people get up and running to build with Nouns. Until the forthcoming Design System is released, which can also live on this site. Imagine simply visiting [ `https://nouns.center/assets` ](https://nouns.center/assets) and finding everything you need to work and create with Nouns. Whether that be PNGs for artists or links to the folder on Github. The answers to all questions asked should be one link away.

![i|450x372](https://aws1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/original/1X/68dd2750be337c655a27f75d160b1ff6425f6c53.png)

My second pitch is to the Nounders to open their Discussions forum feature on [the monorepo ](https://github.com/nounsDAO/nouns-monorepo) to begin to capture all the answers they give to user questions every day. I added some example categories below to help visualize this. We could break up question types be category and begin to collect dozens of questions & answers in each section. The Nounders have spent a ton of time answering every question imaginable and very thoroughly, on a daily basis and I want to give them their time back. It will be some work up front to get the Discussions content up and running, but to have a technical content repository would be invaluable.

![a](https://aws1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/original/1X/f99536abdd4a03261d7e5a13aab4c52a0fbaad5f.png)

Github Discussions is free, comes with Search built-in, and the Nounders are Github-native. My plan is to fetch this data and bring it into the site. Imagine, if someone has a question they could simply visit [https://nouns.center/dev ](https://nouns.center/) to find all these answers, and I would fetch the data on this new site because artist and non-devs could benefit as well. Those who don‚Äôt have a Github account nor would ever go to the Developer channel on Discord could simply go to [https://nouns.center/artist ](https://nouns.center/) to find questions answered already about where to find assets, how to compose a Nouns, canvas dimensions etc.

It will snowball once the infrastructure is in place.
Questions will be asked once, and linked forever.

# 2) Project Aggregator

I‚Äôve aggregated every piece of Nouns content (so far) that I could find in [this spreadsheet. ](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1QlE93Uv4L3pTOPmrgLvr1NinPDB6atQ_ZbbU6vkHmXs/edit?usp=sharing)

It‚Äôs a lot. We‚Äôve done a lot. I want to showcase all this effort.

![r](https://aws1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/original/1X/71224aa3e3eadc1c68f37dee22632c5707ab51bb.jpeg)

Imagine going to [ `https://nouns.center/projects` ](https://nouns.center/) and being able to see and access every single derivative, podcast episode, proposal project, YouTube video, and news story about Nouns. We should have a one-stop-shop for that as well. It should be compelling visually and truly highlight the power of CC0 and our community. We‚Äôll highlight creators and link to their profiles as well. I‚Äôll create a backlog submission system so we can capture user-submitted projects to streamline the process of getting added to the site. I did this with [https://toadztoolz.com/ideaz ](https://toadztoolz.com/ideaz).

I want to inspire the next hundred projects to spawn out of Nouns,
and we‚Äôll be ready to give them the tools to do so.

# 3) Onboarding Ramp

Lastly, I‚Äôd like to reduce as much friction as possible with people understanding the concepts & processes of NounsDAO. I‚Äôd like to find an artist to help with create some infographics about some key aspects of Nouns to help explain concepts like Proposals (How to Submit, Criteria, Timeline, and Payment), the Auction & Settlement process, buying a Noun = 1 vote in Dao, cloning & getting the Nouns webapp running locally for devs etc etc. There‚Äôs plenty of room to play with here, and yes, all these questions can be answered by a long paragraph of copy, but I loved what The Oracle did with the Proposal infographic.

![h](https://aws1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/original/1X/91dea0df191f4f42c0f030955f4ae66108b32e22.jpeg)

and SharkDAO has an excellent one explaining its role within the NounsDAO. I believe these things work and they help solidify the concepts for folks. Plus it adds an air of Nouns both high-quality and creatively capable.

![b](https://aws1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/original/1X/53d2efcd3848707f471b3281f91f68d1d62c9a90.png)

Make the unknowns, known.
Let builders get back to building.

## Where Does This Go?

Some random thoughts where this could go in the future:

* integrate Nouns official Design System?
* sub-DAO onboarding?
* Nouns Newsletter?
* Verb Team [Nouns O‚ÄôClock integration](https://www.notion.so/Nouns-Automations-using-Integromat-Zapier-7f3af840dc1d4a04b1d728f978c785b0) to build something off auction endings?
* Specific Nouns lore (integrate with [nouns.wtf](http://nouns.wtf/) sub-pages? show projects using a specific Noun in them?)
* [Decentraland](https://decentraland.org/) meetups with [3D Nouns ](https://3dnouns.com/)?
* _________________?

Right now my plan is to establish this site as the central resource hub to serve the DAO and our community. Once the solid foundation is established the site can serve as a flywheel for creativity and projects to be housed and built on top of it.

## Funds Requested

This proposal requests a total of 15 ETH from the DAO for design, development, planning, commissioning an artist, and maintenance for 6 months.

# Send a Noun to the International Space Station

I‚Äôve been speaking to a space company (name is confidential) that sends cargo up to the International Space Station (ISS) and assigns tasks (such as experiments) to astronauts on board. I‚Äôd like to propose sending a 3d printed Noun to the ISS. This would be the first time a crypto or NFT character has ever traveled in space, and would generate a lot of publicity and forever be part of Nouns lore. The memes that can be generated from this event would be endless. With this project, Nouns DAO would be pushing the boundary of what crazy things can be achieved by DAOs.

DANIT will design and 3D print the Noun to be delivered into space. She will send it to the company, where it will put the figurine through a variety of tests to make sure it is safe for entering space. 

Noun 22 will provide governance and an extra pair of eyes on all communications with the company to make sure everything is done above board. 

Launch will occur sometime in H2 2022. The Noun will get sent up on a Space X (or similar) rocket to the ISS. Astronauts will take a picture of the Noun, with various backgrounds such as the inside of the space station and the window looking out on the Earth. These pictures would be sent to us and circulated in traditional and social media. We could choose to pay extra to deliver the Noun safely back to Earth, or pay less to dispose of it in however way NASA usually disposes of stuff. 

We have the proposal from the company and if this is approved, I would personally enter into a contract with the company to begin this project, and use the ETH from the DAO to pay USD deposits on the work. Here is the budget:

Design and printing of Noun plus shipping costs  (by DANIT) - 1 ETH
Project management (by Noun 53), consisting of 1+ years of calls and emails with the company, and reviewing proposals and contracts - 5 ETH
Pre-launch testing, launch, and return - 20 ETH
Booked NASA astronaut time - 37 ETH
Total - 63 ETH

Timeline:
Mid Dec - Proposal voted on and contract signed
Jan 2022 - Initial deposit paid
Feb 2022 - printing and shipping of Noun completed
Mar - Jun 2022 - testing of Noun and waiting for launch to happen
Mid to late 2022 - launch to be scheduled and picture to be taken on ISS.

# TSP x Nouns: Skateboard Design and Giveaway

Submitting this Proposal in collaboration with Lily, Development Director for The Skatepark Project

Who is behind this proposal?
Founded by Tony Hawk, The Skatepark Project (TSP) is a nonprofit organization working to increase access to outdoor recreation and free play through the creation of safe and inclusive community skateparks. TSP provides the resources, advocacy skills, grants and fellowship programs that guide skaters in creating their own community skateparks, from conception through construction. This is a collaborative process between skaters and city authorities to invest in capital improvements that will enrich a community for decades. The Skatepark Project‚Äôs grant programs have awarded over $10 million to help fund nearly 700 public skateparks in all 50 States, enjoyed by an estimated 6 million people annually. The organization‚Äôs International Program has provided technical and financial support to assist youth through the Skateistan educational programs in Afghanistan, Cambodia, and South Africa. To get involved, visit https://skatepark.org/

What is it?
apenoun/Oni will facilitate a design contest for the artwork and The Skatepark Project will source and facilitate the creation of 300 complete skateboards with the winning art to be given away to kids who would not otherwise be able to afford a skateboard. We'll also plan to have stickers available for the kids!

- Design Contest
Nouners to run a contest selecting 10 community submitted designs to be printed on the boards.
- TSP to source custom decks with Nouners winning art + hardware and skate tools for 300 complete boards
- Facilitate Build: TSP will organize volunteers or paid labor to assemble 300 skateboard
- Give Away Event: TSP will organize a small local event at a public skatepark to give-away the 300 complete skateboards. This event will take place only if be public health guidelines permit. The boards will be given away in Southern California.

Funding:
This proposal requests a total of 23.72 ETH up front from the DAO to fund the entire project.

- 12.60 ETH: Parts and Tools for 300 skateboards (wholesale cost + shipping) [TSP]
- 7.69 ETH: Donation to the The Skate Park Foundation [TSP]
- 1.93 ETH: Events & Coordination (parts ordering, volunteer board build and board give away) [TSP]
- 1.00 ETH: Skate Deck Contest Prize Money (10 x .10 ETH) [Oni]
- 0.5 ETH: Oversight, Design & Supply die-cut vinyl stickers, Gas [Oni]

Timeline:
We expect this process to take ~3 months . We will communicate milestone goals throughout the project and provide detailed dates as they are solidified.

Milestones: Design contest, deck manufacturer, board assembly, give away event

# Nouns Acquisition Committee

## Create new workstream: Nouns Acquisition Committee
The DAO has socially signaled a desire to acquire Nouns, either in the treasury or on-demand, for a variety of potential use cases including:
- experiment with fractional ownership/governance protocols
- provide collateral to one or more NFT lending facilities
- add option to transfer Nouns as part of proposal transactions

We propose the creation of the Nouns Acquisition Committee workstream: a group comprised of Nouners who facilitate the purchase and distribution of Nouns on behalf of the DAO. This approach allows the DAO to acquire Nouns in stages as needed and avoid many of the negative externalities expressed by Nouners.

## Other approaches and issues
1. Buy from secondary
    * net loss of ETH to the treasury
    * easily gamed by secondary market participants
2. Mint directly to the treasury
    * navigate technical and execution risks of swapping out the NounsAuctionHouse implementation
    * potential brand damage around increasing the Noun supply by more than 1 per day

## Workstream mandates
attempt to acquire up to 3 Nouns from the daily public auction
for any given auction do not exceed 20% of average settle price of the last three (3) auctions
hold the (3) Nouns in the workstream multisig and delegate votes to the Nouncil
as uses materialize, allocate Nouns from the multisig for these purposes at the discretion of the committee
once all Nouns are allocated request funding for acquiring more Nouns

# Retain builder to work on nouns.wtf for 6 months

Proposal by brianj, submitted on-chain by Noun 22

### TLDR

I have been the Nouns DAO engineering resident for the last 3 months (funded under Prop 17) and I requesting a 6 month continuation of my residency.

### What I did during Prop 17

My residency under Prop 17 had the following goals:

1. Update the UX of the auction page and integrate it with the Noun profile pages
2. Update the UX of the governance page
3. Update the UX of the proposal page

I achieved all of these goals during Prop 17. In addition, I also took it upon myself to do the following:

1. Created the (recently revamped) nounsstats.wtf page which provides insight into Noun rarity and Noun Governance participation
2. Created (pro bono) a bot to automatically create snapshot votes for Shark DAO based on the creation of new on-chain Nouns DAO proposals
3. Helped automate parts of Bidder POAP
4. Review PRs for nouns.wtf

### What I will do during my next residency

I have two main goals for my next residency:

#### Continue to maintain nouns.wtf

I will be taking on more of an ownership role of nouns.wtf going forward. This means that in addition to reviewing inbound PRs, I will be responsible for ongoing bug fixes and improvements. 

One particular task to call out as part of improvements is getting to a few UI details that we didn't have time for during Prop 17 (ex: bid history modal).

#### Make nouns.wtf more robust, extensible, and contributor friendly

1. Revamp CI / CD pipeline to allow easy deploy to prod (process right now is very manual)
2. Add real time error monitoring so we can rollback bad changes quickly with minimal negative user impact
3. Generally improve code quality and documentation of the codebase to make it more contributor friendly (in particular, documentation around our Github processes to make it easier for new contributors to onboard)
4. Refactor nouns.wtf to use a nouns component library to allow people to easily build on our ‚Äúlook and feel‚Äù
5. Localize nouns.wtf to increase the reach of our brand to non-english audiences 
6. Security audit to assess risk and patch any potential exploits should they exist

### Proposed workflow

I propose the following framework for tracking my progress and giving the DAO visibility into my work. 

#### Monthly updates

I will give monthly written updates to the DAO. These will be akin to investor update emails.
They will include:
1. What did I say I was going to get done last month
2. What of that did I actually get done
3. What am I committing to getting done in the coming month

#### Project scoping docs

For every distinct project I take on, I will write a short scoping doc (1-2 pages) which I will share with the community for visibility (either on Discord or Github). In this context one project roughly equals one bullet point in the section of my goals (ex: localize nouns.wtf would be one project).

These scoping docs will include the following information:
1. Project goals (project must do x, should do y)
2. Project non-goals (what, if anything, is explicitly out of scope)
3. High level description of technical aspects of proposed change
4. Project milestones with ETAs

#### Github projects + Discord
In addition to tracking progress at the project level, I will continue to use Github issues, Github projects, and frequent updates to the Nounders (in a private project Discord channel) to promote accountability and give the DAO visibility into my daily work. 


### Proposed compensation

I propose that I am compensated 62.52414 ETH over 6 months (10.42069 ETH per month distributed via a Sablier stream).

I think this is a fair rate for 2 reasons:
1. 22's recent proposal passed at this rate. We were both previously funded by Prop 17
2. This rate is fairly in line (in fact a bit lower) on an annualized + USD converted basis with what I was making in my previous normie tech job / what I was offered by normie tech companies when I recently interviewed (~4 months ago)



### Closing thoughts

I believe that over the last 3 months, I've show that I can execute with little oversight and generate value for the DAO (in excess of original project scope). I have greatly enjoyed building with all of you over the last 3 months and hope you will give me the opportunity to continue with you on this great journey.

#  Donate 51 ETH for humanitarian aid to Ukraine through the Rescue Toadz project

## Summary
Donate 51 ETH for humanitarian aid to Ukraine through the Rescue Toadz (https://rescuetoadz.xyz/) project and incentivize people to donate more.

## Methodology
Rescue Toadz is an NFT collection of 18 toadz in which 100% of the funds are donated to Ukraine via Unchain Ukraine (directly coded in the smart contract). The project has a special bidding mechanic that encourages people to donate more.

The interesting thing is that you can not only mint toadz, but also match or increase the last donation for an already minted toad and it will automatically be transferred into your wallet. The toad will then drop its noun glasses as POAP in the wallet of the original holder.

This mechanism is coded directly in the smart contract and a toad owner cannot prevent the toad from hopping into another wallet. The idea is that this will encourage people to donate more. If they want to keep their toad they need to increase the price of the donation or acquire back the toad if somebody donated more.

### Why not donate directly to Unchain?

The idea is to gamify the donation experience so people will donate more. For example, NounsDAO can donate for already minted toadz and ‚Äústeal‚Äù them from the previous owners. Some of them will then donate again to get their toad back.

The goal of the proposal is to donate 0.2 ETH for 5 toadz that are already minted and ‚Äústeal‚Äù them from the previous owners and also raise the prices for two other toadz to 10 ETH and 40 ETH respectively.

### Transactions

The following transactions shall be executed if the proposal is approved:

Donate 5x 0.2 ETH for Rescue Toadz #2, #5, #6, #11 and #16
Donate 10 ETH for Rescue Toad #15
Donate 40 ETH for Rescue Toad #8

## Conclusion
Donating 51 ETH through the Rescue Toadz project has the following benefits:

Funds raised by NounsDAO to help Ukrainian people recover from the war
Raised popularity of the Rescue Toadz charity project, so more people start donating
People that had their Rescue Toad taken from them are incentivized to get it back by donating again.
Recue Toadz or Noun Glasses NFTs collected by the NounsDAO

# Gnars x Nouns Athletes

![](https://aws1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/original/1X/df0297e0030a5dda9107d39db82d67e739e58687.png)

**Background: [Nouns Athletes](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/small-grants-nouns-athletes/731)** received 3 ETH in funding from Small Grants for a proof of concept. We secured our first signing, [Joe Atkinson](https://www.instagram.com/joeatkinsons), who is currently working on his first Nounish production.

This proposal aims to facilitate a co-op between [Nouns Athletes](https://twitter.com/nounsathletes) and [Gnars](https://gnars.wtf), a community of action sports enthusiasts ready to expand beyond skateboarding, to all extreme sports.

**Gnars DAO** is a natural progression for a project that‚Äôs well positioned to help extreme athletes reach the people, places and things that bring out their best ‚Äì ultimately proliferating Nouns.

## TL;DR

**Extreme sports DAO tasked with‚Ä¶**

1. Managing a Nouns DAO funded and decentralised treasury
2. Sponsoring athletes with grants for travel and content creation
3. Making production, merch, event and protocol decisions

**Requesting 69 ETH** for Gnars DAO to steward an expansion of Nouns Athletes with travel sponsorships across various target disciplines.

ie. Gnars DAO (enthusiasts) proliferating Nouns DAO (professionals)...

## Sub-DAOs

Nouns DAO inherently [faces a number of challenges](https://twitter.com/0xigami/status/1511601988915523585) around ideation and capital deployment, due to the broadness of application that comes with such an ambitious project.

![](https://aws1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/optimized/1X/336a6169a8e534d0e5a38077c5ea7b24a1cfc1d2_2_690x357.png)

As of 22 March 2022, Nouns DAO has:
* Received 23,421 ETH
* Sent 4,784 ETH
    * Staked 3,000 in Lido
    * Spent 458 on Foundation setup and ops

**Only 1,326 ETH has been spent on directly proliferating Nouns,** which represents **just 5.66% of total funding raised,** most of which is not visible on the chart above.

Sub-DAOs may address the deal flow problems faced by a generalist organisation such as Nouns, by operating as an intermediary for impactful and domain specific capital deployment.

![](https://aws1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/optimized/1X/192fa943b3337ed1990092839abbdadd1b181009_2_690x288.png)

Gnars began as a simple experiment to see how people value team contributions versus allocation of funds toward meaningful and well aligned charitable causes. As expected, collectors want to see what the future holds and therefore tend toward adequately funding a team ‚Äì tested using a [Humble Bundle inspired](https://support.humblebundle.com/hc/en-us/articles/204387088-Pay-What-You-Want-and-Contribution-Sliders) contribution slider.

![](https://aws1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/optimized/1X/3e838186abf3c575e92ffe393b44445d749b2258_2_690x239.png)

But perhaps more abstractly, the project was intended to serve as a dip of the toe, to understand whether I personally, should ‚ÄúSkate or DAO?‚Äù Having quickly attracted a community of talented and passionate individuals, I‚Äôve discovered that the answer is unequivocally ‚ÄúDAO.‚Äù

Connecting with the community has helped me to understand that we are uniquely positioned for experimentation. As a laser focused sub-DAO we can recruit and grow an extreme sports team through fan engagement. 

I‚Äôm proposing a domain specific sub-DAO structure **‚Äì a *SHRED*.**

## Gnars DAO

Skate or DAO -> Shred the Nouns ü§ò

Gnars aims to operate as a ***Streamlined Hierarchical Really Excellent DAO (SHRED)*** and while the name is a stretch, the concept of ‚Äòshredding the nouns‚Äô can be hyper-focused and impactful.

The structure allows for off-chain voting with on-chain execution, without dependence on a single centralised entity. This hybrid model is more accessible since individual voters won‚Äôt need to pay gas. But it‚Äôs also an adequately secure means of sub-DAO treasury stewardship.

![](https://aws1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/optimized/1X/b74c48999630dffa607bfd7cbc72f059732d72ee_2_690x238.png)

[Zodiac Reality Module](https://gnosis.github.io/zodiac/docs/tutorial-module-reality/get-started/) ([I've deployed here](https://etherscan.io/address/0xca553AC295EDA95594e77Aa97525Fc815090589a)) enables on-chain execution based on the outcome of events reported by the reality.eth oracle. [Gnosis Safe](https://gnosis-safe.io/app/eth:0x0658f4eD17289144717713ADfFC2539eF7c2EF8e/balances) and [Snapshot](https://snapshot.org/#/gnars.eth) are primary interfaces.

A [3 of 5 multisig](https://gnosis-safe.io/app/eth:0x0658f4eD17289144717713ADfFC2539eF7c2EF8e/settings/owners) has been established at [gnars.eth](https://etherscan.io/address/0x0658f4eD17289144717713ADfFC2539eF7c2EF8e), granting Nouners with veto power over the treasury. The signers appointed as safe owners are as follows:
* [0xigami.eth](https://etherscan.io/address/0x387a161C6b25aA854100aBaED39274e51aaffffd)
* [blockbird.eth](https://etherscan.io/address/0x6B67623ff56c10d9dcFc2152425f90285fC74DDD)
* [apenoun.eth](https://etherscan.io/address/0x91dCCAA260CC4616E1a6e6b693DB7207C5E42937)
* [undeadnoun22.eth](https://etherscan.io/address/0x75Ee6eb3d8DAcf41eE2e5307090B197D3E1Cca6E)
* [0x530...3Fe4](https://etherscan.io/address/0x5306C064F74B2c45d3f1afAE90cF0D74F7523Fe4)

### Funding

* **Source 1: Nouns DAO funded**

    * Funding received to Gnosis Safe (2 Gnars and 3 Nouns signers)

        * If proposal passed, execute transactions
        * If proposal failed, mark as invalid
        * Safe owners veto power (incl. Nouners)
    * Funding sent to signed athletes (through SHRED governance)
        * One from each discipline competing in FISE World Series late May including, BMX, climbing, mountain biking, parkour, inline skating (Joe), scootering, skateboarding and wakeboarding (subject to change)
        * Approximate budget of $25k USD per athlete per year for contest and film production travel expenses, equating to $200k or majority of 69 ETH grant (approx $225k current price)

            * Travala account (ETH deposit, USD credit)
            * Bitrefill account (ETH deposit, USD credit)

* **Source 2: Gnars NFT sales funded**

    * Nouns merch design and manufacturing (pro team and community gear)
    * Events IRL and URL, conference sponsorships and promotional activities
    * Artist commissions, community design contests and brand development

### Benefits

* **First ever extreme sports DAO**

    * High impact and focused sub-DAO of Nouns 
    * Launch with current world champ Joe Atkinson
    * Extreme athletes from seven other disciplines

* **Gnars (and Nouns) NFT utility**

    * Governance rights (protocol, merch, content decisions)
    * Social benefits (action sports enthusiasts and pro team)
    * Product benefits (games, merch, early access content)

* **Governance rights and activities**

# [Calladita Film](https://www.calladitafilm.com/)

First European (and second ever) fiction movie funded with NFTs, based on an award-winning short film with an A-list cast attached.

[**2-minute Intro Video on Twitter**](https://twitter.com/miguelfaus/status/1500867988341280771?s=20&t=7jVlhyOdDeGSoR8Wg9BoDg)

[![Calladita](https://i.ibb.co/z4f3grt/calladita1.png)](https://www.calladitafilm.com/)


## About the Film
*The movie will be shot in Barcelona (Spain) in September, and is **expected to premiere in International Festivals in spring 2023**, and then in cinemas (there‚Äôs distribution agreements in place with Spanish and U.S. distributors) and finally in streaming platforms.*
*We want this historic web3 movie to have several easter eggs of NFT and Web3 Culture, and the Nouns embody decentralization and CC0 like no other project, so we would love to find ways to showcase Nouns in the film.*

*The entirety of the proceeds from the NFT collection will go towards the budget of the film: locations, equipment rentals, cast & crew, travel & accommodation, post-production‚Ä¶, and so I would like to propose that the DAO contributes to the budget of the film, and in exchange we contribute to ‚Äúproliferating Nouns‚Äù by showing them in this pioneering web3 film.*
*We believe that ‚ÄúCalladita‚Äù has the potential of starting a movement towards the decentralization of cinema via web3, because film is still the most centralized and corporation-controlled art form around.*

## Nouns in Calladita
Nouns will be included in the movie as follows:
1.    A Character in the film will wear Nouns Glasses in at least 1 scene.
2.    There will be a chosen Noun put as decoration on the location of the film, which will appear in at least 1 scene. 
3.    Credits: either the Nouns glasses or one chosen Noun will appear in the Credits of the film, and NounsDAO will appear credited as an ‚ÄúAssociate Producer‚Äù of the movie.

## Funding Request
The total budget of the film is 1.4M$, so we‚Äôre looking to raise that amount through our NFT collection. We would ask for a **contribution of 6.9 ETH** from Nouns DAO for this collaboration.

# Bring luxury Noun sunglasses to market

## Summary

A couple months ago small grants funded the prototyping of a luxury sunglass initiative by salvinoarmati: https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/small-grant-request-create-luxury-noun-sunglasses-irl/658. This proposal is to fund the initial run and launch of the physical and NFT components of this project. More details here: https://ivory-pine-ebc.notion.site/NounsDAO-Proposal-29a658f763f74f958f7c6bd916533dbb.

## Upcoming plan

We‚Äôre planning to launch these as an NFT collection of limited-edition glasses. Each NFT is *consumable* in the sense that it can be used *once* to redeem a physical pair. Once the NFT is used, a boolean value is flipped to indicate consumed status and the underlying tokenURI is permanently changed. A physical pair of sunglasses is then sent to you.

**~7.2% of supply reserved for NounsDAO Treasury**

The total supply of the collection will be 6969 units. This project would not have been possible without the NounsDAO and the treasury.  As a thank you, we‚Äôve decided to allocate ~7.2% of the supply to the treasury (500 units). We hope to make other such contributions as a thank you to the DAO in the future. 

**Custom Edition Glasses Just For Noun holders**

We‚Äôre also making a custom ‚Äúspecial edition‚Äù pair *exclusively* for noun owners. The design of these glasses will be based off of the under-appreciated and rare ‚Äúdisco‚Äù glasses featured on some nouns. *There will only 500 of these glasses ever made, and will be available to the first 500 nouns during mint. This means, future nouns (up to #500) will also be able to receive the glasses.*

## *High-level todos that still remain*

- **Create Smart Contract, Website, Minting, and Redeeming Experience.**
    - Have had a preliminary call with @blequity at Zora and will be using Zora‚Äôs smart contract system to launch this NFT.

- **Finalize a storage/distribution facility for shipping the sunglasses.**
    - We‚Äôll need to organize a distribution facility which will serve a few functions:
        - Long-term storage of glasses (for those that are unredeemed or redeemed later)
        - We have items coming from multiple manufacturers (Sunglasses, Nouns Box, Carrying case, polishing cloth, thank you cards) ‚Äî and will need an area to assemble and ship out all boxes.
- **Promotional Video / Ad**
    - We want to create a fun promo (IRL) video that showcases the glasses + nouns brand. We‚Äôve had a preliminary call with [@jasonmorena_](https://twitter.com/jasonmorena_) (who was previously the filmmaker for Gary Vee) who has expressed interest in creating an ad for us.
- **Finalize glass design and create units at scale.** 

### **Funds Requested**

# Gamify fundraising for Ukraine by donating 51 ETH through the Rescue Toadz project


## Summary
The goal is to donate 51 ETH for humanitarian aid to Ukraine and increase the popularity of the Rescue Toadz (https://rescuetoadz.xyz/) charity project so that more people start donating as well.

## Methodology
Rescue Toadz is a charity project that gamifies the fundraising process. It is an NFT collection of 18 toadz with 100% of the funds being donated to Ukraine via Unchain Ukraine. A special bidding mechanic encourages people to donate more.

The gamified aspect is that you can not only mint toadz, but also transfer someone else‚Äôs toad in your wallet by matching or increasing their last donation. The toad then drops its noun glasses as POAP in the wallet of the original holder.

This mechanism is coded directly in the smart contract and a toad owner cannot prevent the toad from hopping into another wallet. This encourages people to donate more - if they want to keep their toad they need to increase the price of the donation or acquire back the toad if somebody donated more.

100% of the funds are immediately sent from the Rescue Toadz smart contract to Unchain Ukraine. It is a pure charity project - the project devs make no money from it.

## Why not donate directly to Unchain?
The idea is not only for Nouns DAO to donate, but also to encourage other people to donate as well. For example, NounsDAO will donate for already minted toadz and ‚Äústeal‚Äù them from the previous owners. Some of them will then donate again to get their toad back.

The goal of the proposal is to donate 0.2 ETH for 5 toadz that are already minted and ‚Äústeal‚Äù them from the previous owners and also raise the prices for two other toadz to 10 ETH and 40 ETH respectively.

## Conclusion
Donating 51 ETH through the Rescue Toadz project has the following benefits:

Funds raised by NounsDAO to help Ukrainian people recover from the war
Raised popularity of the Rescue Toadz charity project, so more people start donating
People that had their Rescue Toad taken from them are incentivized to get it back by donating again.
Recue Toadz or Noun Glasses NFTs collected by the NounsDAO
Raised popularity of the iconic Nouns Glasses, which are dropped as POAP for everybody that participated

### Reflections:

**Quality proposals**
The two core hypotheses with initial testing were that 1) there would be a meaningful volume of proposals given the ETH<>Proposal auction format and 2) some subset of proposals would be high quality. With 69 proposals and a double digit % of those being highly desirable, I feel confident that we should continue to pursue scale via the prop house model.

**Communities are eager to participate**
With a total of 48 proposals and 520 votes casted by 77 non-nouners for Round 1, it‚Äôs clear that members of the broader community, both individually and as part of extension communities, are eager to participate. It‚Äôs behavior like this that points to how NFT communities can grow beyond their ownership-constrained communities (particularly true for Nouns).

**DAO-only voting won't scale**
Given the volume of proposals received in Funding Round 1, it's clear that a Prop House where only Nouners are voting won't enable us to scale to 1000s of proposals. i.e. It's irrational to expect Nouners to be reading through 50 proposals every week. If we are to hit scale, decision making needs to be gradually decentralized. 

### Beyond funding - a new way to interact:
Framing the ERC721 standard as the social graph, Prop House may be looked at as a ‚Äúpermissionless ETH power source that communities gather around‚Äù (h/t joel).

Analogous to reddit, we now have crypto-native subreddits but are missing the key ingredient that makes crypto so special - the ability to transact, transform and create value. 

**With this proposal**, Prop House looks to do two things:
1) Focus development on the Nouns Prop House as the main node in the network:
    - Nail down UX 
    - Experiment with different funding amounts, longer and shorter rounds 
3) Explore the ways in which the DAO can further its reach via independent Prop Houses (e.g. prop.house/**japan**, /**extensions**, /**budlight**)
    - Enable these communities to become self-curating Prop Houses where their members both submit and vote on their own proposals.

![](https://i.imgur.com/kQ1JnVC.png)
![](https://i.imgur.com/le4Q4Xz.png)
![](https://i.imgur.com/ElCNZge.png)


### Team:
- seneca (all hats)
- devcarrot (backend)
- toastee (design)
- cdt (frontend)
- jckbutcher (memes)

### Budget:

We are requesting working + funding capital for **4 months** of operations. 

- Funding props, 120 ETH:
    - 80 ETH for Nouns Prop House
    - 40 ETH for 1-3 Nouns extensions Prop Houses (e.g. japan, nounpunks, budlight)
- Operational, 94 ETH:
    - 23.5 ETH per month:
        - 10 ETH seneca 
        - 3.5 ETH devcarrot
        - 3.5 ETH toastee
        - 3.5 ETH jckbutcher
        - 3 ETH for other potential misc expenses 

**Considerations**
- Funding schedule is meant to be flexible so that we can both experiment (diff funding amounts) and slowly ramp up (i.e. start with 1 extension prop house)
- Funding amounts and corresponding communities will be decided internally by the Prop House team. Some of the heuristics we are using to select communities:
    - Enough activity to merit competition between proposals
    - Willingness to onboard from leadership
    - Alignment with nounish culture and proliferation
- The ideal and final version of Prop House would allow for all decisions with regards to funds leaving the DAO to be decided upon by Nouners via vote. 

**Multi-sig**
The [multisig](https://etherscan.io/address/0x5BcD6f3B0a5519D448FBDf33204091bbE097C992) is currently 2/3 where the signers are seneca, devcarrot and toastee. It still holds ~20 ETH from [prop 23](https://nouns.wtf/vote/23). With the passing of this proposal, we will be adding 2 more signers (cdt and jckbutcher). The addresses are as follows:
- safe: 0x5BcD6f3B0a5519D448FBDf33204091bbE097C992
- seneca: 0xfC9e8dB5E255439F430e058462360Dd52b87cB4f
- devcarrot: 0xB1C41C71d36cedEa7DdCd5f8D5c5C32BA8f3CBFc
- toastee: 0x5F99FC2d2A98e046t9689d3117e0F96bb5c640d88
- cdt: 0xD19BF5F0B785c6f1F6228C72A8A31C9f383a49c4
- jckbutcher: 0xD1295FcBAf56BF1a6DFF3e1DF7e437f987f6feCa


### Closing thoughts
Prop 23 enabled the first experiment of the Prop House model. Given the results, it seems to me that the answer to "is there something here?" was a resounding yes. Moving forward, I hope to continue to build with the same framing: an exploration to see what the model can amount to.

For this next phase, there are a few key questions that I'd like to have more definitive answers to, chief among them: 
- Is the volume of quality proposals meaningful?
- Will funding align extension/external communities to proliferate Nouns? 
- Is the Prop House model a viable approach to pursue 100x growth? 

The goal of this proposal is to answer these questions by continuing to develop the UX while taking our first steps towards independent Prop Houses.

If this second phase succceeds, I intend to eventually  develop Prop House into an trustless on-chain solution. As stated in [Prop 23](https://nouns.wtf/vote/23):
> Conceptually, the contracts could be the seed to a crypto native Y Combinator model. Where as before you had partners, now you have DAO members. Instead of summer and winter batches, you have weekly or monthly cadences. And instead of demographic restrictions for applicants, you have anyone with an Ethereum wallet. It might be the case that breaking thresholds in the categories mentioned above transforms the model to something completely different.

From lessons learned in the first phase, I'd reframe it by saying that utilizing only DAO members won't scale. Instead, plugging into open and available social graphs (ERC721) is the way.

# Pilot Collectivized Nounish Allocation 

 **Purpose**
 
 Equip Builders to Steward DAO Resources
 
 **Ask**
 
100 Œû

**Covenant (tl;dr)**

Any Noun ("Nouner") or member of the Nouns Discord server and given the "Nouncillor" role (http://discord.gg/nouns) will be eligible to co-administer distribution of Ask in an experimental effort to democratize funding by and of protocol (NounsDAO) contributors. The objective for this round will be to empower the collective of active Nouns builders to convey Œû in a manner that attempts to effect sustained outsize benefit to Nounish Culture.

**Procedure** 
1. Funds custodied in the Nouncil (nouncil.eth) multisig, which signers and their constituents (Nouncillors) have agreed to defend according to the above mandate. 
2. Open call will be held in the Nouns Discord Server for Nouners/Nouncillors wanting to co-administer. 
3. Administrators will refine a process for adding candidates who are interested in participating, biasing for inclusivity where possible, while considering how the process may be sustainably implemented at protocol level in future.
4. If nominated, addition of non-voting addresses (NounsDAO/SubDAO Treasuries, Public Goods etc) as potential beneficiaries may be considered.   
5. Approved contributors will be allowlisted / encouraged to participate in an off-chain weighted voting process (via an application such as https://snapshot.org/ or https://coordinape.com/) to determine the final distribution coefficients.
7. Any funds which the administrators conclude they are unable to disburse constructively (in accordance with Covenant) by 07/01/22 will be returned to DAO.
8. The custodian of the proposing Noun (*wag#5265*) will recuse themselves from the round. 
9. Some additional context is currently available at: https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/proposal-pilot-coordinape-round-s-to-implement-retroactive-impact-rewards/929/5

**Possible Failure Conditions**  
1. Disagreements arise as to proper execution of Covenant, where clear consensus (measured as a simple majority vote) among Administrators cannot be reached.
2. Number of nominated contributors is too low or too high to be deemed a useful representation of active Nouns builders.
3. Unforeseen technical constraints make executing the weighted vote or disbursement impractical. 

**Possible Success Conditions**

# Marketing Studio for Nouns-funded Projects

**TL;DR**

- Fund a studio to create short videos telling the world about the projects that Nouns fund.
- Offer builders to tap into a marketing studio with Noun-specific expertise, free of charge.
- We will work with builders to tell their project‚Äôs story in the most digestible and compelling way.
- We will edit these videos to fit the formats of the top social media platforms.
- These videos will be shared on new social media accounts dedicated to telling the stories of Nouns-funded projects. The goal of these videos will be to reach new audiences to amplify the reach of the projects we have funded.
- Create a free resource of CC0 Nouns-proposal-related footage and assets.

**The Problem**

- Prop builders don‚Äôt necessarily have the skills/resources/time to execute a marketing campaign for their projects.
- Wonderful projects with really great output are not being amplified and we are missing out on a lot of noun proliferation potential.
- It‚Äôs difficult to explain what Nouns are to the world.

**The Solution**

- We propose to build a team dedicated to market the projects that Nouns fund.
- We will offer the most promising projects the option to work with us closely to produce a video that markets their project.
- We will do whatever is necessary to make the videos as compelling and impactful as possible, like:
    - Develop a compelling story about the project.
    - Send a film crew to the builders' studio for an interview and B-roll footage.
    - Edit the videos in different formats for different social media platforms to maximize virality.
    - Publish the videos on social media accounts - on all major social media outlets: twitter, facebook, instagram, tiktok, and youtube.
    - Manage interaction with social media followers.

**Why is this awesome?**

- **Tell the Nouns story via the projects we fund**
    - The best way to tell the story of Nouns is via its funded projects. The projects and builders that the treasury funds are what is nounish. The substance of the proposals are the most compelling and accessible narratives of Nouns DAO. These stories will also attract more builders to submit proposals to the protocol.
- **Let the builders focus on building**
    - Builders don‚Äôt have to be marketing experts.
    - We want to enable builders to focus on delivering their projects in the best way - and let us produce the video marketing assets they need.
    - We hope that potential builders who see these videos will get inspired to create quality proposals themselves, knowing that this support and exposure will be there.
- **Use the treasury to its fullest potential**
    - An awesome Nouns-funded project that not many know about is a waste of our treasury.
    - We will make sure to amplify the work that‚Äôs being done by our prop builders and reach a wide audience.
- **CC0 Nouns Video Stock**
    - Similar to public domain stock videos, all footage that we will gather in the process of producing these videos will be CC0 and available online
        - Initially we will share a Google Drive or Dropbox with these files. We will also experiment with posting the footage in CC0 stock video websites like [Pexels](https://www.pexels.com/).
        - In the future, if there‚Äôs demand, we may want to build a dedicated website to enable easy access to the footage.
    - This will enable the composability of our storytelling by giving access to right-free footage to, for example:
        - Projects like the [Rose Parade documentary](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/proposal-nouns-go-to-the-rose-parade-a-documentary-by-the-makers-of-robot-chicken/1046) will be able to use our raw footage as part of their documentary, permissionlessly.
        - YouTubers who produce an explainer video about Nouns.
        - News outlets who are reporting about Nouns.
        - All future documentaries about the protocol.
    - This will enable more ‚Äúmemetic stimulus‚Äù: more visual content from our projects can result in more nounish memes!

**Scope of The Pilot**

We want to start with a small pilot of 4 published videos, delivered within the next few months. These videos will be 30-90 seconds, bite sized content for easy consumption and maximum shareability. They will focus on summarizing a single project/proposal ‚Äì with a little context about nouns as well.

In this pilot we want to experiment and learn as much as possible (e.g. How to work best with builders? What content type and format gets the most engagement? How do we manage remote film crews?).¬† Once we successfully deliver on the pilot and we have learned a ton, we will probably submit another proposal to produce more videos.

- Work with builders to create videos telling the stories of 4 projects:
    - Confirmed:
        - Coloring Books by Messhup
    - Other projects we would love to work with but haven‚Äôt fully confirmed yet:
        - Nouns Psychogeography Sculpture with Dustin Yellin
        - Perpetual Glasses to Kids In Need
        - TSP x Nouns: Skateboard Design and Giveaway
        - Luxury Noun Sunglasses
        - Hong Kong Takeover
        - Nouns 3D-printed fashion collection
- Upload all relevant high quality raw footage to a cloud service and make it available to anyone.
- Setup, brand, and manage new social accounts for Nounish on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, TikTok & YouTube
- Share videos to social media accounts

**Team**

**[142](https://twitter.com/danpeguine)**

- Strategy, scriptwriting, and storytelling
- Coordinating with builders
- Manage socials

**[Goldy](https://twitter.com/Goldypix) & [Pixel](https://www.pixel.melbourne/)**

- Strategy, scriptwriting, and storytelling
- All video production: from footage to edited files, film crews
- Visual brand assets

**Questions or comments? Feel free to reply in the [discourse](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/marketing-studio-for-nouns-funded-projects/986) thread or DM us!**

**Funding**

40 ETH for this pilot (4 published videos)

# Mad Realities x Nouns DAO

# Mad Realities x Nouns DAO

### **What is it?**

Mad Realities is building audience-owned TV, starting with an interactive reality TV network where the audience votes on cast, shows, and more via holding an NFT. Think TV, but owned by and voted by the community. 

**The finale taking place on May 1st at Webster Hall** is for our first show Proof of Love, a community funded, created, participated, and decided dating show powered by NFTs. Season 0 kicked off March 13th and we've already had:

- 1,500+ people on the internet co-creating the show with us
- 172 ETH worth of Membership Pass NFTs minted which funded all the show production to begin with
- 4 IRL live shows hosted at NFT art gallery [Bright Moments](https://www.brightmoments.io/)¬†with¬†300+ audience members (max capacity of the venue)
- Notable guests judges like [Victoria Paris](https://www.tiktok.com/@victoriaparis?lang=en), [Matt Medved](https://twitter.com/mattmedved), [Antoni Bumba](https://www.tiktok.com/@antonibumba?lang=en), [Elsie Hewitt](https://instagram.com/elsie), [Meltem Demirors](https://twitter.com/Melt_Dem), [Nolita Dirtbag](https://www.instagram.com/nolitadirtbag/?hl=en), [Aubrey Strobel](https://twitter.com/aubreystrobel), [Alex Zhang](https://twitter.com/alexzhang__), and more.

This proposal is for NounsDAO to put **50 ETH** towards the festivities alongside Zora (also contributing 50 ETH) for a chance to be 800+ 20-somethings in NYC‚Äôs first touchpoint with web3 and the endless possibilities of crypto in culture. It‚Äôs also going to be really fucking fun.

### How would it work?

**Date: Sunday, May 1st**

**Venue: Webster Hall**

**IRL Audience: 800-1000 NYC based 20-somethings (50% female)**

**URL Audience: NFT holders of the episodes, Twitter** 

**Run of show:** In our season finale, 4 winning couples from past episodes will compete in a showdown to prove their love to the audience, where the audience is the final decider of which couple wins the jackpot prize (4.20 ETH). Anyone in the world will be able to text our hotline to vote ‚Äì similar to American Idol days ‚Äî and by doing so will be able to mint one of our condom NFTs as well ‚Äî not so similar.

- 6:30pm ET - Doors Open
- 7pm ET - Begin airing recap episodes from Season Zero
- 8pm ET - Final Episode Airs on Youtube and live at Webster Hall
- 8:30pm ET - One hour long live streamed After Show (with 2-3 musical performances)
- 9:30pm ET - Winner of finale episode is chosen live
- 10:30pm ET - Invite only after party at The Jane (you are invited to join us!)

### **Why?**

The Mad Realities team has mad respect for NounsDAO as one of the pioneers of CC0 as a viable model to spread a decentralized brand & meme.

We ourselves are making that leap, and the night will mark history as Mad Realities enters Proof of Love into Creative Commons (CC0) and allows anyone to mint full episodes of the show and most meme-worthy clips, and own a piece of reality TV.

It will be a bold experiment in putting a whole TV show in Creative Commons ‚Äî along with the infinite stories that we expect our community to tell far into the future. We picture anyone in the world creating their own Proof of Love spinoff in the future ‚Äî including experimenting with new formats, mediums (TikTok vs. Youtube vs. Live Stream vs. Audio vs. Snapchat, and more), themes, locations, and casts.

### **Funds Requested**

This proposal requests from the DAO:

- 50 ETH to go towards the production of the festivities

Funds would be used towards live after show production, venue costs, talent booking, co-branded merchandise, marketing expenses, and a portion of the bar tab at our invite only after party at the Jane Hotel (open to NounsDAO members shall the proposal be approved üëÄ).

`Address for transaction: madrealities.eth`

Help Mad Realities herald a new era in Hollywood. In exchange, Nouns gets...

# Nouncil Proposal #1

![](https://i.imgur.com/WQ7Zlco.jpg)

OG Nouncillors POAP - art by [Messhup](https://mobile.twitter.com/messhup)

__________________

**TLDR**

Nouncil is asking for 64.20 ETH to fund:

1. Q1 retroactive operating costs
2. Q2 operating costs
3. Nouncil Community Grant Program Pilot

__________________

1. **Q1 Retroactive Operating Costs - 10 ETH**
__________________

‚ÄúNouncillor‚Äù is a volunteer position, whose main role is discussing and voting on Nouns DAO proposals. We are requesting a reasonable budget to incentivize Nouncillors to put in additional work beyond that scope.

‚ÄúOperating cost‚Äù funds would be earmarked for Nouncil administrative items such as:

 - Creating and operating Gnosis Safe
 - Social media management
 - Meeting notes
 - Content development
 - Website development
 - General organization
 - Nouncil proposal development & on-chain submission

Operating Costs will be distributed via a collaborative Coordinape round and all Nouncillors will get an equal voice. External contributors and Nouners who helped set up Nouncil up will be invited to join the circle as potential recipients. Q1 Coordinape will be administered immediately. We will prepare a report of how the operating costs were distributed and host it on the Nouncil website publicly.

Program specific operating costs will be distributed in separate Coordinape rounds with the teams that worked on them.

Currently Nouns DAO proposal discussion on Discord and Discourse is encouraged, but still considered a volunteer activity. In the future we would like to think through and develop intuitive programs to incentivize Prop discussion.

__________________

**2. Q2 Operating Costs - 12.2 ETH**
__________________

Same as #1 but to be administered at the end of 2022 Q2.

After this, we will reflect on the administration process / budget and re-apply for future operating cost funding as needed.
__________________

**3. Nouncil Community Grant Pilot - 32 ETH**
__________________

1 ETH grants available to each eligible Nouncillor, to be spent in collaboration with the communities / projects they represent with the goal of proliferating Nouns by leveraging their networks.

Ideally, the grant will be sent directly to project / community wallets. The grant is permissionless, any eligible Nouncillor will receive it if they apply. It must be spent proliferating Nouns in the most effective way possible. Nouncillors may choose to delegate their grant to another Nouncillor. Funds that are unable to be spent effectively within the period will be sent back to Nouns DAO.

Nouncil will establish basic guidelines and rules on how these grants can be spent, but will leave a lot open to imagination. Projects should be highly aligned with Nouns DAO and celebrate both Nouns and Nounish culture. Nouncillors who accept the grant and misspend it will not be eligible for future Community Grants and may face expulsion from Nouncil.

Rule #1: funds from this grant cannot be used to buy NFTs or cryptocurrency.

At the end of every grant period we will host a Nouncil Community Grant wrap-up where recipients will be responsible for demonstrating what they were able to achieve. We intend for this wrap-up to be entertaining, and will only apply for future funding if Nouns DAO is thoroughly impressed.

For the Pilot all Nouncillors as of 4/20/22 (30 in total) will be eligible. In the future eligibility will be defined as: 2 months of Nouncil membership with a proposal vote participation rate of 69% or greater.

The Pilot grant period will be 3 months from receipt of funds. After the pilot the intention is to have quarterly grant periods.

Admin Team: maty, Toady Hawk, Joel Cares

30 ETH - - - - - - 1 ETH / Nouncillor
2 ETH - - - - - - - Program Operating Cost

__________________


Nouncil is a special council of Nounish BUIDLers and NFT community leaders that seek to extend the Nouns DAO universe. Our goal is to work together within the framework of Nouns DAO, using the Nouns that have been generously delegated to us, to be a voice for the nounish states and do our part to proliferate CC0 and Nounish culture.

For the Pilot all Nouncillors as of 4/20/22 (30 in total) will be eligible. In the future eligibility will be defined as: 2 months of Nouncil membership with a proposal vote participation rate of 69% or greater.

The Pilot grant period will be 3 months from receipt of funds. After the pilot the intention is to have quarterly grant periods.

# Nouns Esports

**Goal**
Proliferate Nouns through esports initiatives, starting with the signing of a professional Dota 2 roster.

**Description**
Dota2 is a multi-decade-old esport that is currently being developed by Valve Software. They host the single largest prize pool tournament in esports, The International. The latest purse for this annual tournament was around $40 million USD. To qualify for The International, you participate in the Dota Professional Circuit (DPC) 2 league which takes place throughout the year. This is mostly an online, regional format, but each season culminates in an international LAN called a Major.

One of the first initiatives of our esports pod will be to sign ‚Äú4 Zoomers‚Äù 3, a Division 1 North American DPC team.

**Budget: 35 ETH**

The majority of this budget will be used to compensate the roster of five players, their manager and coach for the upcoming DPC season. The team has agreed to sign from the day the proposal is voted-in until the end of the third DPC season, July 17.

We will be working with former player and caster Brax to to act as an ambassador and liaison within the Dota community. He will be hosting and casting at least two different Nouns branded Dota tournaments.

Some of the players stream individually via Twitch. We will create assets for their on-stream overlay.

**Administrative Multisig**
Brennen
Sasquatch
Maty
Goldy
Wag

**Deliverables**
Tournament stream viewership - Their most recent series from April 16th has 283,352 views on the VOD via Twitch. Live tournament broadcasts regularly have tens of thousands of concurrent viewers

1. Individual stream viewership - Some of the players on the roster regularly stream on their own while practicing (hundreds or thousands of concurrent viewers)

2. In game branding - Dota allows for DPC teams to have in-game branding through assets placed inside of the game‚Äôs landscape. Nouns branding will be visible in game as the team competes.

3. Name branding - The team will rebrand from 4 Zoomers to **Nouns Dota**.

4. Player name branding - Player names will include a Nounish sponsor tag. e.g.
**Gunnar.‚åê‚ó®-‚ó®**

I am happy to report the team has offered us ‚ÄúRight of First Offer‚Äù for the upcoming Major and The International.

The road to TI for the team is as follows:

Achieving a top 2 placement in DPC North America (June 6 - July 17) qualifies them for the Major LAN in Arlington Texas (Aug 4 - 14th)
Performing well at the Major qualifies them for The International.(date TBD)

**Future**
If this pilot is deemed successful by Nouns, potential next steps include signing this Dota roster for an extended term, signing other gaming teams or esports athletes, and fleshing out an esports-focused subDAO.

# nounify muc.xyz

# tl;dr
[MUC.xyz](https;//muc.xyz) is a two-day NFT event, which is scheduled for 27th & 28th of May 2022 in Munich, Germany.
Goal of the event is to offer a platform to a broader audience to empower, educate and onboard the interested public onto the NFT space.
We would ask for a nouns grant of **15 ETH** to have nouns sponsor the event and nounify it.
![image|
100%](https://i.imgur.com/H8VJZH0.jpeg)

# event in detail
The event will be hosted in Munich but will collaborate with a hackathon in Nuremberg. This way we ensure an inter-regional promotion of NFTs in the two biggest Cities of Bavaria (total population of ~2M people)

**The first day** introduces the underlying technologies of NFTs such as blockchain and smart contracts through panels and talks. Different areas of application of NFTs and their economic significance will be presented using successful examples from the gaming, fashion and art sectors. A panel discussion will be held to critically examine the technology and its benefits and to take a visionary look into the future of NFTs. On this day, the audience will be introduced to the world of NFTs and informed about the basics and possible areas of application.

**The second day** will be a deep dive into current topics and trends in Web3 and the world of NFTs. Representatives from Web3 projects and companies will present their NFT journey, current strategies and experiences. Trends, technological developments, as well as tax and regulatory aspects will be covered. The crypto and NFT communities and all interested parties are invited to exchange ideas in an interdisciplinary manner on this day.

The event is planned to attract ~400 people in-person and around the same amount to stream online over the course of 2 days.

# who is organising muc.xyz?
[Benjabo](https://twitter.com/benjabo): Benjamin Bauer (CEO of [ZOLLHOF](https://www.zollhof.de/) - Tech Incubator) is a long-time fan of blockchain technology. He first invested in Bitcoin and Ethereum in 2016 and went all-in on NFTs early 2021. Fascinated by the new possibilities of the decentralised web3, Benjamin pushes this topic for ZOLLHOF and the German startup ecosystem.
[Cairol](https://twitter.com/cairol2_0): aerospace engineer, idea creator and value-based leader in the field of innovation and deep tech.
[Aguwiku](https://twitter.com/aguwiku): architect and urban planner, sustainability and climate protection expert, grew up with art, big fan of tennis.
[niftynaut](https://twitter.com/niftynaut): noun172, building [swap.kiwi](https://swap.kiwi) to help others swap their NFTs the safe way with each other.

# how will the event proliferate nouns?
In general, as the event has an educational approach, we hope also to spread the word about cc0 and convince more builders to think about what kind of license they want to use for their future NFT projects. Moreover, Nouns are not yet proliferating in Europe and sponsoring the conference will help get more attention to the protocol outside of North America.

+ We will let nouns nounify the event completely. Nouns will be THE sponsor who has their logo everywhere where the muc.xyz logo is.
+ We will have posters around the city to draw attention to the event.
+ We will nounify our website accordingly.
+ We will add nouns logo on all of our merchandise which is free for all attendees.
+ We will nounify the venue accordingly (roll-ups, photo wall).
+ We will mention nouns in our press release.
+ We will add a cc0 talk/panel to our event schedule
+ We organise some side NFT exhibitions - here we have the possibility to display nouns and their story. 
+ With representatives from the city and the state of Bavaria, chances are high that there will be photos circulating in the regional and national newspapers.

# event location and schedule
we are hosting the event at the [Haus der Kunst](https://hausderkunst.de/en/) (House of Art) which is a non-collecting modern and contemporary art museum in Munich, Germany.
![image|
100%](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/f/f6/Haus_der_Kunst_-_Munich_-_2013.jpg)
Photographer: Avda / avda-foto.de

Date of the event is the 27th & 28th of May 2022.

The NFT event will help to educate the interested public about NFTs. We are sure this event will draw attention to NFTs and blockchain because it is touching the Zeitgeist and there are not many other events to educate the public about this technology in Germany, and so far none in Munich.

**There is still a great need for education and information in Germany.** ‚Ä®**There are a few events, but they differ in their objectives and focus.** 
**So far there are not many events to compare it even with.**

Right now it is a right and important time for our muc.xyz, precisely because there are so many different approaches, ideas, areas of application etc‚Ä¶‚Ä®**Our approach also stands out above all because of the first day, which focuses on critical observation and informing the broader public.** ‚Ä®On top of it, Bavaria has developed its own blockchain strategy. The added value of this technology for society, the economy and even for the administration is seen.

Munich is a hotspot for art! The art scene is alive and well. There are many collectors and art enthusiasts here. There is a lot of ‚Äúold‚Äù culture and a lot of tradition. Our event fits right in as there is a vacuum currently we hope to fill.
We are also partnering with [Hackbay](https://www.hackbay.de) which organised many hackathons (200+ participants) and now organises its first web3 hackathon (Sponsors: Adidas, Siemens) in Nuremberg (population of ~800k).

Some more info about Munich:
* 3rd largest city in Germany, 11th largest City in the EU with a population of 1.6M
* The city is a global centre of art, science, technology, finance and its economy is based (besides cars) on high tech, creative industries, as well as IT.
* With large universities it attracts a lot of young people with whom it would be great to connect and educate about web3 and NFTs.

# SharkDAO: Nouns CC0 Story Foundations & Development

Let's create CC0 Story Bibles that can be the foundation for future stories and inspire creatives to create their own stories, animations and Nouns content.

When Blockbuster DAO recently proposed creating a Story Bible for Nouns there was hesitancy to fund the project for fear of establishing Canon. 

Through a series of conversations with various Nouners there seems to be concensus that rather than fund only BBDAO we want to fund multiple groups to create great CC0 Story Bibles for anyone in the community build off of, fork, animate, draw, etc.

I've spoken with BBDAO, Sam Ellis, StudioDAO & Greidiens who have all been following Nouns from the beginning, have great accomplishments and want to pursue this idea.

We will begin the process of creating Nounish characters, story explorations and series ideas that can lead to more and more diverse worlds built around Nouns. 

We propose to create a Multi-Sig and start by funding 6 CC0 Story Bibles at ~20E each (120E total) all by accomplished writers. This seems to be a bit above industry standard but takes into consideration the CC0 requirement for this experiment.*

Creative Teams (click names for more info)
 1) [BBDAO 1 - Animated Series - Scott Albert & Will Bryan](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1dATW6a93NF5NelKz2PM3ap7HiOUWadFrOpcvmQurMao/edit)
 2) [BBDAO 2 - Feature Film - Van Robichaux & Garfield Lindsay Miller](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1dATW6a93NF5NelKz2PM3ap7HiOUWadFrOpcvmQurMao/edit) 
 3) [Sam Ellis - Animated Series](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1yeSJcwZRSygWKAsRIJkQ2fMVY93Qcakax_YtOhOtTkU/edit?pli=1)
 4) Studio DAO - Mixed Media Noun O'Clock - link
 5) Greidiens/Keenan Thompson
 6) TBD Group - 

A story bible typically contains a cast of characters, some story ideas, maybe a season 1 arch and is delivered in a fully fleshed out document with drawings, text, etc. Some examples can be found below:

Example Story Bibles:
[#writers-room, Nouns Discord](https://discord.com/channels/849745721544146955/921486884826406982/961336684505595995)

Deliverables: Based on this thread we expect each Bible to include a general world/universe outline, 15-20 Characters w/ illustrations and character descriptions, 10+ story/episode ideas. We expect these to be illustrated and 20+ pages each.

The multi-sig would pay the writers on a schedule of 30% Up Front, 20% Upon Rough Draft, 50% Upon Completion. For this first round we will be focused on writer/creator teams that have high level credits and a history of delivering professional works on time.

Multi-Sig: 0x9667Ac39E7534c43Ca1A2a4a5BC4a6FFC2783458
SharkDAO Multi-Sig (5/7 signer wallet): 0xAe7f458667f1B30746354aBC3157907d9F6FD15E

Story Foundation & Development Lead 
Jawshua Fisher
I‚Äôve been actively working with the teams, Nouners and Nouncil members on creating this proposal. I want to continue advising and consulting teams and basically providing an oversight over the whole project.

My goals for this project:
- project oversights - payments, deliverables, DAO updates
- advising and consulting the creative teams
- active outreach to writers, animators and producers for consideration
- phase 2 planning - reaching out to additional teams for production, illustration, animation, etc as well as exploring alternate ideas to create Story Foundations.

I anticipate this project drives a lot interest and this comp will cover other activities that arise such as general Noun advice (I get a lot of questions and offer support for folks looking to get into Nouns or make proposals) and overall Noun Creative support/activity. For this I am proposing a compensation of 6ETH/month for trial period of 3 months.

As a creative manager by trade I have experience helping creatives deliver while holding them to high standards and helping with ideas. I've also been here paying close attention since Noun 3 and feel I have a good foundation for many of the fun moments and underlying themes that have been embraced. Finally, I'm a multi-sig signer at SharkDAO and am active in the community.

**WHAT?**
A short documentary (between 8 and 10 minutes) on Dean Harvey, the artist behind Noun Cats extension.

**WHY?**
The focus of the documentary is to show how NFTs and Nouns are empowering emerging artists and really transforming people‚Äôs lives in NZ and in the world.

We learn about the Dean‚Äôs journey from web2 to web3 and hopefully inspire others to join the web3 movement and Nouns DAO.

We plan to release the film at international film festivals and therefore expose their audiences to the Nouniverse.

Nouns Dao to sign ‚ÄúExecutive Producer‚Äù in a documentary aimed at international film festivals. Opening credit ‚ÄúNOUNS DAO presents‚Äù at the start of the film. All the raw footage, music and artwork to be added to the Marketing Studio free resource of CC0 assets.

**FUTURE / NEXT STEPS**
As we researched the web3 space here in New Zealand for an ongoing feature-length documentary, we found a group of very talented artists connected through NFTs and their own DAO. The Wenbreakfast DAO.

# NOUNish Friends Stage 1: Collectibles by BigShot

The proposal is for Nouns DAO to fund Stage 1 of 2 of NOUNish Friends, a 10,000 run of modular Nounish collectibles designed, created, and distributed by Bigshot Toys. Klim and team have been working on this for months (along with other Nounish projects, like [Propsal 56 for Fun Noggles](https://nouns.wtf/vote/56))  and they not only have extensive expertise in creating collectibles like this but also have a specific vision for their NOUNish Friends line beyond just making them but getting them distributed in high signal locations and in front of forward thinking people. 

* [Discourse Discussion for NOUNish Friends (‚ÄúNOUN TOWN‚Äù) Collectible Figure Series by Bigshot Toyworks](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/proposal-nounish-friends-nouns-town-collectible-figures-and-more-by-bigshottoyworks/967)
* [Up-to-date Google Docs for full vision](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1eT3Qr7diwWm6JhBwZb9iwuVoqg__nHuXW_HUDd-VajU/edit)

![enter image description here](https://aws1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/original/2X/0/0b614027a5f63693886c61be4c65318287176f8f.jpeg)

**What is the NOUNish friends project?**

A modular collectible physical toy series based on Nouns and created by an award winning creative studio. Uniquely crafted in a new look and style that will showcase the fact that ‚Äúnounish‚Äù does not just mean ‚Äúpixelated‚Äù. Unique packaging and interactive elements will make this series stand out above all other figures in this format.

**STAGE 1 (DEVELOPMENT & PRE-PRODUCTION)**

* Finalize sculptures (1 modular body, 7 heads, accessories & base stand)
* Create prototypes (1 set of 1st prints, 3 sets of paint masters / tooling patterns)
* Create paint masters (design colorways, tampo prints, 2 sets of samples & AI production files)
* Packaging design for individual boxes & display cartons & master cartons

**Stage 1 Cost Estimates**

* Design & sculpture: ~$12K (5 ETH)
* Prototypes (12 figures / 6 heads / accessories x2): ~$16K (6 ETH)
* Paint masters (12 figures / 6 heads / accessories x2): ~$16K (6 ETH)
* Packaging design (templates, die lines, color callout for production): $6K (2 ETH)
* **TOTAL STAGE 1 ESTIMATED COSTS: 18 ETH**

Klim and his team have been working on this project over the past 3 months and the final designs are fun, playful, modern and we feel represent NOUNs well in this funky new style. The sculpts are ready to go but we have gone as far as we can without help.

A more robust description of the proposal dealing with production costs and beyond is in the Google Docs.

**Stage 1 AND Stage 2 Cost Estimates**

* Pre-Production: 20ETH (Stage 1 with cushion, what is being funded in this Proposal)
* Tooling: 20-22 ETH 
* Production @ 10K units: 30 ETH
* Plus 500 ROYGBIV sets: 8 ETH
* hipping / logistics estimate: 15 ETH
* Warehousing for 1 year: 5 ETH
* **TOTAL ESTIMATE: 100 ETH**
* *Potential Success-based Bonus: 1 Noun after launch, at the DAO's discretion*

**Who is Bigshot?**

 Bigshot Toyworks is an award-winning creative studio with over 25 years of experience in the design, licensing and merchandising space, We have  worked with some of the top brands and IPs in the world innovating and delivering award winning executions. In both the physical retail, advertising and digital space.

Bigshot Toyworks is trusted by industry giants like Turner Network, Disney and Bungie, and independent creators and artists to bring their unique visions to life. For 25 years this has meant creating and delivering physical goods like toys, collectibles and consumer products, as well as the related 2D and 3D digital files necessary for ad campaigns, animations, commercials, billboards, activations and experiences of all shapes and sizes.

While crafting assets and collectibles for clients, Bigshot has also developed and produced a wide range of original collectibles under our own label, and sold them both DTC and B2B through our own shop and various distribution partners. Years of community engagement, several successful Kickstarters, booths at shows like New York Comic Con, DesignerCon, Licensing Expo and other events have allowed us to service an impressive range of happy customers and clients.

Within the past few years, the unique capabilities of Bigshot have been deployed more and more frequently by NFT project creators as they put out a mix of physical and digital collectibles under their IPs. In 2022 the lines between the physical and the digital blur more each day as consumer behavior and the definition of what is ‚Äúcollectible‚Äù change daily.

Bigshot is uniquely positioned to help IP holders and creative organizations engage and thrill their communities by straddling the physical and digital collectibles spaces.
