# Nouns Around Town - a Documentary Film Proposal from the makers of Robot Chicken

We propose producing a comedic documentary film about the groundbreaking nature of the Nouns DAO and the web3 community and our weird journey of getting the Nouns featured in the Rose Parade. The Noun community has shown itself to be forward thinking, enterprising, generous, warm, funny and bold. Everything from donating to Ukraine, making eye glasses for the underprivileged, to being featured in a Super Bowl ad. This is a story worth telling!

This project will be unique for three reasons:

1. Stoopid Buddy has spent years developing a very specific comedic tone we want to bring to this documentary. The doc will tell the story of the Nouns community and all the amazing initiatives it supports, but will be anchored with a strong narrative - the journey of getting the Nouns into the Rose Parade as the first ever NFT featured. This narrative lends itself to keeping things fun, silly and strange, while providing a strong hook to tether the larger story of Nouns.
2. As part of the documentary story, we'll be building and featuring six life-size walk around Noun costumes that will spread the Noun ethos through activities the community will have a say in driving. Do we want them handing out glasses? Giving random hugs to people in Times Square? Running in a charitable half marathon? We'll have fun and create great content for the documentary, all while showcasing how the DAO works.
3. Our story will revolve around the journey to get a giant, vibrant Noun float in the Pasadena Rose Parade in 2023. The film will reach a climactic end with the six life size Nouns partying their way down the Rose Parade with a massive Noun float in tow!

_Tone_

We're inspired by docs like "Exit Through the Gift Shop" which was light, playful, and blurred the line between real and imagined. We want to tell this story in an imaginative way, often with tongue firmly in cheek.

_Why?_

We are inspired by this community and think the world needs to know how amazing and revolutionary this DAO is. We also think this is a great way to get this organization and brand out to a much wider audience. The Rose Parade will create tens of millions of impressions but the documentary will give this story life and legs and tee up the Nouns to further their reach into mainstream pop culture.

_Who are we?_

We are [Stoopid Buddy Stoodios](https://www.leagueofbuddies.com/). Most of you might know us from our flagship series, [Robot Chicken](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kuWZzOusVJ8), but we're also the studio behind Marvel's MODOK, Crossing Swords on Hulu, and all the costumes on FOX's [Masked Singer](https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/the_masked_singer-characters-publicity-split-h_2019.jpg). And the studio that built a 15 foot walk around for [League of Legends](https://www.leagueofbuddies.com/news/buddy-builds-at-pax-east/). We've been nominated for over [22 Emmys](https://www.emmys.com/shows/robot-chicken) and won six of them. We've also won Cleo Awards for our advertising work and have worked with brands from DC, Marvel, Walking Dead, Star Wars, LEGO, Target, and [Denny's](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tBLThhKIoFM) among many others. All that is to say we know how to translate the spirit of a brand into entertainment. We're also the studio that last year built a life-size walk around goat Noun that made [an appearance at NFT.NYC](https://twitter.com/grelysian/status/1456665812182487048). While our ambition for the next round of life size Nouns is even greater, this experience was amazing, and a source of inspiration for what's to come.

But we don't want to do this alone. We want to bring the entire Nouns community together to help tell this story. We've been amazed by the early positive support of this proposal and are excited to engage with you all. Nouners will have the opportunity to participate by voting on where these life size "Nouns in the Wild" go on their journey, and even participate by walking along with other Nouns in the actual Rose Parade. The documentary will feature interviews with Nounders and Nouners alike, and highlight projects that have been successfully funded and what type of impact they've made. This will be a movie making experience that engages the entire community.

### BENEFITS TO THE NOUNS DAO


ROSE PARADE
- HUGE AWARENESS OPPORTUNITY TO TELL THE NOUN STORY
_(all data below provided by the Tournament of Roses staff)_
  - Rose Parade seen by 22 million people in the US, and in over 60+ countries across the world
  - 1,000,000 people line the streets in Pasadena for the parade, and another 150,000 visit the floats pre and post parade
  - 1.8M+ social impressions
  - 20 seconds of airtime during telecast with scripted description for Nouns
  - Inclusion of the float in printed program
  - Estimated media value of media coverage $300M


DOCUMENTARY
- First documentary about a DAO community to fully tell the Nouns story and cement their place in public imagination, but in a way that's funny and on-brand for both the Nouns and Stoopid Buddy Stoodios.
- The Nouns community will vote on random acts of joy that our Nouns will spread throughout real world communities as part of our documentary so we can highlight other initiatives the DAO funds and feature other Nounish events.
- Sequels and other content opportunities to expand on the story we tell in the documentary. Our plan is to take any net proceeds from the sale of the documentary and reinvest them into more Nouns content.

### PHASES OF EXECUTION

PHASE 1: (May-July)

- Select and design the six life-size Nouns
- Sign contract with the Rose Parade team for 2023
  - (NOTE: Document each of these phases with our production team)
- Line up interviews and identity storylines for the documentary (those that would like to remain anonymous will be free to do so)
- **MILESTONE 1 - Fund 45% of proposed allocation\***

PHASE 2 (July-September 2022)

- Begin building out the Noun costumes for the documentary and the parade
- Begin the designs that will ultimately become the massive Rose Parade float

PHASE 3 (August-September)

- Community votes on winning float design
- Approve the build
- **MILESTONE 2 - Fund 45% of proposed allocation\***

PHASE 4 (September 2022-January 2023)

- Film interviews and storylines for the documentary including the "Nouns in the wild" segments
- Film behind the scenes of the parade build and the day of festivities.
- Release short segments of the film to build awareness and hype for the parade.

PHASE 5 (January-Feb 2023)

- Party at the Rose Parade!
- Post-Production and editorial cut
- Screen film exclusively to the Nouns community for feedback on final cut
- Determine best distribution outlets for the film
- **MILESTONE 3 - Fund final 10% of proposed allocation\***

PHASE 6 (Q2/3 2023)
- Distribution. Our objective is to maximize viewership with wide distribution. Tactics may include submitting to festivals, pitching to streamers and networks (SVOD), or even distributing on AVOD services like YouTube to keep from being behind paywall. We'll make this decision with transparency and will confer with Nouns DAO as we consider options.

_\* Milestones to be funded at commencement of each phase. Note that these are guidelines only and that a final determination will be made in collaboration with the stoopid-buddy-escrow multisig._

### BUDGET

- Parade fee - $23k USD
  - Paid to Pasadena Tournament of Roses
- Float build - $400k USD
  - Inclusive of design, build, and storage. We will solicit creative proposals/bids from each of the three Rose Bowl Parade approved float building companies and select one to help us build the float.
- Six life-size Noun costumes - $330k USD
  - Inclusive of design and build and storage
- Film production - $450k USD
  - Inclusive of crew, travel, accommodation, equipment, editing, post-production, music, legal, etc.
- 1 Noun
  - We want to be part of this story!

The ETH will be immediately converted to USDC, and everything in excess of the original budget, minus 1 ETH to cover gas for the life of the multisig, will be returned to the DAO. If, due to high volatility, insufficient ETH is available to cover the proposed budget, a second proposal will top up the multisig at a later date.

# Allocate Noun to Lil Nouns DAO

This proposal allocates Noun#253 (currently held by the NounsDAO treasury) to the Lil Nouns DAO treasury.


Rationale:

Lil Nouns has demonstrated product market fit, a demand for Nouns exposure at a lower price point, and well-aligned community values.

Nouns DAO receives 10% of Lil Nouns supply for first 5 years, which brings additional utility to the Nouns treasury.

Lil Nouns has broadcast intent to use treasury funds to acquire Nouns, but additionally granting a Noun will demonstrate that we value:
- the ownership stake they have granted NounsDAO
- the positive externalities they have created for the Noun ecosystem

Noun grants in the future to derivative projects should be evaluated on a case-by-case basis

# Nerman: A Nounish Community Bot

___

# TL;DR
___

Here is Nerman: [https://twitter.com/nermanbot](https://twitter.com/nermanbot)

![](https://i.imgur.com/bZhHfhr.png)

Nerman is a community bot for Nouns. Nerman can also be a great friend. A shoulder to cry on. A guiding light.

In Discord he will help with coordinating group votes on DAO proposals (ie Nouncil), informal Nouner polling, offer helpful commands, post all relevant Nouns DAO activity, and allow the community to easily share content to Social Media. On Twitter he will listen for Nounish content and cleverly decide what is the top content to reshare.

Nerman will be open source, and Nounish communities can clone him and tap into the Nouns protocol within their own Discords. Every subdao with a Nouns vote needs a Nerman. Every subdao with twitter needs a Nerman curating their feed.

**DELIVERABLES**
Two Discord bots, a Twitter social listening bot, two websites, and a distribution ready open source library.

**TIMELINE**
6 Months (multiple collaborators)

**BUDGET**

69.420 ETH 


___

# 1. PROPOSER: JOEL CARES
___
![](https://i.imgur.com/DTQjQzu.png)

Joel has been building in Nouns since November. This projects coincides with him shifting into full time Nounish work, the beginning of many years of Joel x Nouns collaboration. Alongside (and separate from) this project he will be actively taking meetings in the entertainment / tech / comedy / animation worlds to spread the Nounish word and help groups put together proposals.

Socials: [Twitter](https://twitter.com/JoelCares_/) -  [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/joelcares/) - [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/joelcares.net) - [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/joelcares/)

Joel is:
 - a [Nounish Meme](https://twitter.com/JoelCares_/status/1520076489974190080)
 - a founding member of [Nouncil](https://twitter.com/nouncil)
 - the current elected Nouncil Ambassador to Nouns DAO
 - helping admin [Prop 63](https://nouns.wtf/vote/63)
 - building [Noggles.wtf](https://noggles.wtf/)
 - running [Crispy Nouns](https://twitter.com/CrispyNouns)
 - making 3D at [JoelCares.net](https://joelcares.net)
 - CEO of [ANOA.ca](https://anoa.ca/)
 - CEO of [Lobal Global](https://lobal.global/)

___

# 2. PREAMBLE
___

Earlier this year we received [support from Small Grants](https://lobalglobal.notion.site/Proposal-Nerman-1-0-f37a8407e49641a5b5f2d8f2c6ff334c) to develop Nerman 1.0 - a basic version of Nerman with social sharing and simple Discord commands. Nerman 1.0 is alive and well!

- Currently running in private server
- Manually retweeted and shared ~3000 Nounish posts as [NermanBot](https://twitter.com/nermanbot) 
- Curated 4 Twitter lists: [Nouners](https://twitter.com/i/lists/1495232888249491456), [Nouncillors](https://twitter.com/i/lists/1498451834545086470), [Nounish Projects](https://twitter.com/i/lists/1494410570161926147), [Nounish Content Mines](https://twitter.com/i/lists/1473482057246408707)

To showcase Nerman we released [Lil Nerman](https://twitter.com/LilNerman), a development bot currently running in NIL Discord.
 - will reshare Discord post content to  when :nerman: emoji used
 - has basic commands (/noun and /nouner)

We have also completed a first version of [Noun O'Clock bot](https://nounoclock.wtf/) that anyone can add. It is currently running in NIL and NounsDAO Japan.
 - shows time to Noun O'Clock in bot status
 - posts link to [FOMONouns.wtf](https://fomonouns.wtf) at Noun O'Clock 

___

# 2. DISCORD BOT - NERMAN

___

The Nerman Discord bot can help with internal governance and polling, sharing community news to the world, connecting people, lending a hand. A true friend.

**2. A.) DISCORD - SIMPLE VOTING**

Nouncil / subdaos all use emoji polls to vote on Nouns DAO proposals. It's messy and a lot of work. Nerman can fix this.

**Problems - Discord Emoji Polls**
 - people can vote for more than one option
 - if emoji votes are public, anybody can add reactions. Because of this you have to manually go through and manually tally results.
 - people can add unwanted emojis, cluttering the poll.
 - when the vote is finished you have to manually mark it closed and post the results.
 - the results aren't stored in a database, and there are no broad statistics calculated from them

**Simple Voting - Features**

 - allow / disallow voting based on Discord roles (public, Nouner, Nouncillor...)
 - votes can be anonymous, or public. For anon votes participation will still be tracked but actual vote content won't be stored
 - can enforce one vote per user, or allow multiple
 - specify an end time
 - live visual feedback, which can be turned on or off
 - uses Discords new button API
 - stores votes in a database in preparation for future web apps that display voting stats
 - basic API for db queries so others can build with this data

**FUTURE GOALS**
 - consider further voting methods: weighted voting, ranked choice, quadratic. Can any reliably be done from Discord?
 - manage and deploy votes from web app
 - create Snapshot vote and post to Discord
 - possibly automate executing Nouns DAO vote

___

**2. B.) DISCORD - SOCIAL SHARING**
___

Nounish Discords are contain a stream of Nounish content, creators put their soul into noggley creations and the world needs to see it. Nerman can fix this.

In V1.0 we implemented basic social sharing, active in the NIL Discord and the [@LilNerman](https://twitter.com/lilnerman) account. 

**FEATURES - COMPLETED**
 - user reacts "Nerman" emoji, Nerman responds with "NERMAN_BLAST" 
 - text & media (image, gif, video) are formatted appropriately for twitter
 - threshold function that determines how many votes needed to share

**FEATURES - NEW**
 - better media handling, adding support for large videos and any other misc media that needs to be formatted and handled for Twitter
 - create Nerman social media accounts on other platforms (instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn). Format it appropriately and post it there as well
 - test thoroughly and improve error handling and messages
 - if user's post is just a tweet, allow Nerman to simply retweet
 - further develop Twitter thread functionality for long text posts
 - test the Threshold functionality with live public, tweak and dial in
 - experiment with Threshold calculations in an active Discord


___

 **2. C.) DISCORD - COMMANDS**
___

Some people live in Discord.They live and breath Discord. They don't want to go on the *internet* to find Nounish facts and assets, they want it In-The-Chat. Nerman can... ah, whatever, you get it.

V1.0 Nerman implemented the following commands using https://noun.pics

**/noun [id]**
Returned a PNG of the specified Noun in an ephemeral response.

![](https://i.imgur.com/HZ4GiRE.png)


**/nouner [address or ENS]**
Returned a grid showing the Nouns owned by that address.

![](https://i.imgur.com/vXxFXUs.png)


**FEATURES - NEW**
We will switch to the Nouns DAO subgraph and offer more details.

 - /nerman noun [id]
Can display a more detailed ephemeral message about the Noun. It could possibly include: a PNG image, the last sale price, current owner, basic DAO voting stats, other Nouns owned... we will try to express the most useful content in a minimal clean way.

- /nerman nouner [address or ETH address] [include delegates]
We will change this to an ephemeral with more stats about that address, including owned Nouns and delegated Nouns. Possibly things like auctions won, etc.

- Other Useful General commands
We‚Äôd like to add further useful commands as we think of them, while also not clogging up the Nouns command space. We will experiment!


---

  **2 D.) DISCORD - BOT MESSAGES**

---

Nerman will be active in the Discord posting useful things about the State of Nouns, social media, and anything else he can chime in on.

**FEATURES**

 - When a new Nouner !joins Nerman will provide a welcome package with all links and instructions required to enjoy their Nouns experience.
 - When someone wins an auction Nerman will look on ENS for connected Social Media accounts and try to tag them with a Warm Welcome when possible
 - All State of Nouns events will be available with nice formatting: new auction, bids, auction end, new DAO proposal, proposal executed, etc
 - Notifications whenever a Noun is transferred - if it occurs on a marketplace with an API (OpenSea, LooksRare, Zora) we will provide appropriate metadata like price
 - These notifications will be configurable - work with the commmunity to figure out which ones are useful, turn the rest off
 - top daily Twitter messages

---

  **2. E.) DISCORD - ADMIN CONFIG**

---

In the beginning Nerman will only be allowed in approved Discords under the devs watchful eyes. We will tweak, and improve, and help Nerman be the best bot he can be.

Once Nerman is a well built, reliable bot, we will build out a simple config system for people to install and configure Nerman to run in any Discord and share to any social media accounts. 

**FEATURES**
 - configure which "State of Nouns" events post, and to which channel
 - configure which social media accounts Nerman posts too, including posting to your orgs own social media
 - where Nerman listens for posts to share to social media
 - turn options on and off (swear filter, welcome committee, etc)
 - customize messages things like the Noun O'Clock message
 - change language

---

  # 3. DISCORD BOT - NOUN O'CLOCK

---

Noun O'Clock bot is a very basic fork of Nerman that does two simple things:

 - Counts down to the next Noun O'Clock in the bot status:
![](https://i.imgur.com/w7F9c0O.png)
 - At Noun O'Clock - posts a link to [FOMO Nouns](https://fomonouns.wtf/) in the designated channel:
![](https://i.imgur.com/a0GLIjP.png)

This is currently running in several discords, including NounsDAO Japan and NIL. You can download and install the current version of Noun O'Clock here: https://nounoclock.wtf/

**NEW FEATURES**
 - Integrate new State of Nouns libray
 - Add more details to announcement link, including an image of the sold Noun, sale price, and buyer address.


---

# 4. TWITTER BOT - NERMAN LISTENER

___

Nerman surfs through social media (Twitter, LinkedIn, Instawhatever, etc), sharing, caring, looking for primo Nounish content to showcase. He is on a mission to automate his Twitter account. Nerman will try to figure out novel ways to find high quality Nounish content and decide which ones should be shared to [@NermanBot](https://twitter.com/nermanbot). This will take some experimentation, we have ideas but will be trying them out and continuously refining.


**FEATURES**
 - Nerman will listen on Twitter @NermanBot tags. In the beginning he will retweet all of them, and when there are too many, will develop further metrics for choosing what to Tweet.
 - Nerman will listen for common Nounish content, like "@nounsdao", "#nouns", and "‚åê‚ó®-‚ó®" and share the top results.
 - Nerman will share important events from the State of Nouns, including saying hello to New Nouners when an auction finishes, 
 - Nerman will compare content from all methods and ensure only a reasonable amount of tweets are sent each day.
 - broadcast Nerman activity to additional social networks: Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn

If the DAO desires Nerman can eventually post directly to [@NounsDao](https://twitter.com/nounsdao).


___

# 5. WEBSITE - NERMAN.WTF

___

Nerman will maintain a presence in the *old web* at https://nerman.wtf. There will be some fun, basic info about Nouns DAO, a guide to following Nerman and Nouns activity, and a web app that displays voting stats from Discord polls.

**FEATURES**

 - a summary of Nerman and Nerman's activities
 - discord bot documentation
 - State of Nouns documentation
 - instructions on how to engage with Nerman on Twitter
 - links to all Nerman social media
 - breakdown of vote results and decisions made
 - breakdown of behaviour across all votes, including user behavior (if not anon) 

___

# 6. WEBSITE - NOUNOCLOCK.WTF

---
Nerman will maintain a very basic site for Noun O'Clock. It's already complete. 
[https://nounoclock.wtf/](https://)

**FEATURES**
 - a website with stuff on it. Go look

___

# 7. JS LIBRARY - STATE OF NOUNS

---

WHEN DO THINGS HAPPEN?! Nerman needs to know, and so do other Nounish bots. When a Nouns auction ends, when a proposal is created, when a Noun sells on OpenSea. Nerman needs these events, and the data associated with them.

State of Nouns is a standalone JS library for the Nounish community. Nerman will use it, and any other JS project can use it to accurately get events from all Nouns DAO activity.

Our first priority is developing this fully for Nerman. Afterwards we will package and release it as an open source, free standalone library.


**FEATURES**
 - provides access to all Nouns events across governance, NFTs, etc
 - will report all Noun transfers. Will report sale metadata if on OpenSea, LooksRare, or Zora
 - simple JS library that can be incorporated into other projects
 - user provides own Web3 connection details (supports various JSON-RPC options)
 - no centralized service, simply fork the code and run your own


---

# 8. USER ROLES & META DATA RESEARCH

---

Discord user roles are often verified with Collab.Land. Nerman will be able to function with existing User roles. 

We will experiment with other options in a separate Discord, try to find a better way. We have specific advanced Nerman functionality we want to explore. There are solutions like [The Guild](https://www.the-guild.dev/) and devcarrot's [custom idea](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/lets-build-a-better-way-to-verify-ownership/297). A simple connection to ENS would also be great.

 - connect Discord username -> wallet address -> Twitter username so we can correctly tag users on Twitter when sharing. This could be a custom app, or there might be existing tools we can use.

# Make Nouns Visible From Space : IRL event space 

[Discourse Proposal](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/make-nouns-glasses-visible-from-space-part-of-the-permanent-record-google-earth-maps/1126)

**Request for 150 ETH to:**
1. Fund installation of Nouns glasses VISIBLE FROM EARTH ORBIT
2. Serve as venue retainer for future Nouns IRL events
3. Establish Nouns DAO as a founding supporter of charity beer garden that will utilize the space
4. Provide drone photography of finished project and initiate media coverage

**Benefits:**
1. Imprint Nouns upon the permanent record via Google Earth, Google Maps, etc.
2. Retain two venues for IRL Nouns events in the US Midwest
3. Reinforce the Nouns ethos by supporting a community-oriented charity event series
4. Raise Nouns awareness and proliferation potential on a previously unrealized scale

![Event Space](https://aws1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/original/2X/0/0d7ffadc9ee9fe961e06d937ecc2a31cf2273d46.jpeg "Event Space")

The DAO has already funded a Nouns expedition space and the ISS. This proposal will MAKE NOUNS VISIBLE FROM SPACE by installing a pair of Nouns glasses large enough that they‚Äôll be seen from orbit and for long enough to be included when satellite maps are updated in Google Earth/Maps, etc. They‚Äôll become part of the permanent record, visible even to normies that don‚Äôt frequent NFT social media. The glasses will appear less
than 300 yards from the largest stadium in the US (third largest in the world) and one of the largest universities ‚Äî a destination for hundreds of thousands every year. It‚Äôs also an area that has undergone major municipal and private development over the past 12 months so updates to online maps are sure to follow.

Nouns funding will fulfill multiple goals simultaneously: the biggest and most visible being the massive Nouns glasses, obvious not only to online navigators but to in-person visitors and media providing ground & aerial coverage during sporting events. The glasses will be included as part of a synthetic turf upgrade at the site and will align with a North-oriented map display for a natural viewing angle. Replacing the natural lawn with
synthetic turf will improve durability at the site and preserve the Nouns glasses long enough for the next satellite maps update to take place.

Funding will also serve as a retainer for Nouns IRL events in a Midwest US city accustomed to large gatherings and a short drive from an international air hub. The Nouns community is welcome at the charity beer garden and can also request a private visit. Nouns DAO will have access to a 10,000 square foot outdoor site and a
premium residential venue for any dates not reserved for charity events).

Installation of the Nouns glasses at the site will identify Nouns DAO as an advocate for community-oriented events in public spaces and will benefit a well-established charity beer garden that began at this location in 2016. The family-friendly public tailgate successfully attracted tens of thousands of patrons each season (before a pandemic hiatus) and grossed six figures for cancer programming.

A licensed drone photographer will capture photos of the Nouns glasses in situ so that images and Nouns backstory may be included in a press release for local and national media. The owner/manager of the charity event spent 26 years as a professional photographer and has numerous media and connections, including a spouse in the publishing and PR industry.

# Nouns Children's Book Development

*Copied from [Nouns Discourse](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/proposal-nouns-children-s-book-development/1231/11) on behalf of @brandonmighty*

Hey Nouners,

You may have seen me (Brandon James Scott / @brandonmighty) on twitter or around the discord. I‚Äôve been making Nouns-inspired art like my [Myth of Noun collection on Superrare](https://superrare.com/series/0xca4607aad52f654cf6357895c397094c077a3236) and my [Nouns at Work collection on Foundation ](https://foundation.app/collection/nounsatwork).

![](https://i.imgur.com/N70U3r8.jpg)

*The Myth of Noun & Nouns at Work collections*

I am an artist with over fifteen years of experience in children‚Äôs entertainment via animation and publishing. I‚Äôm writing this proposal because I think the world needs a Nouns children‚Äôs book - and I‚Äôd like to make one.

**Goals**
Introduce the fun, positive energy of Nouns to a young audience (and their parents). Create a wonderful nounish illustrated experience in physical form. Open a path to the traditional publishing world for Nouns.

![](https://i.imgur.com/biSbsDm.jpg)

**I am a Noun**

I am a Noun (tentative title) will be an illustrated book for young children where we meet, learn about, laugh with, laugh at, argue with, understand, admire and ultimately love the Nouns. It will read like a curious journey with occasional reader involvement instead of a traditional linear story. For those familiar with children‚Äôs books, think along the lines of Julie Morstad‚Äôs Today, Oliver Jeffer‚Äôs Here We Are, or Richard Scarry‚Äôs Best Word Book Ever - these books take a big idea and explore them visually and nonlinearly.

The book may start with asking a simple question to the reader: What is a noun? Our Nouns characters will have their opinions on this, which will lead to more questions, and more opinions - often at odds with each other and the narrator, with the reader stuck in the middle of it all. The book will be curious, funny, smart, absurd, and nounish‚Ä¶ always. And it might end with another question for the reader: What kind of noun will you be?

You already have an idea of what it might look like. I don‚Äôt see the book as fully painted as my Myth of Noun pieces - probably more minimal like Nouns at Work with characters on simple backgrounds. And like the art I‚Äôve done, I will base as much as possible on official Nouns traits. I‚Äôll also be adding new characters (people, places, things‚Ä¶) and will put the Nouns glasses on almost everything.

It should be noted that the story will not directly reference the dao, nfts, crypto, ect. I would consider this project a very gentle trojan horse for nouns for a brand new audience.

I will also encourage and welcome any input from the Nounders as I develop this story to keep the nounish vibes in check. ‚åê‚ó®-‚ó®

**Package**

This is not funding for a finished book, but rather funding for the development of a book submission package. Once a successful submission and sale takes place, the publisher would acquire publishing rights and offer an advance so that I may finish the rest of the book.

I have literary representation (Emily Van Beek at Folio Jr. literary agency) who has already shown interest and encouraged me to pursue this idea. I will work with her to fine tune this submission and once we‚Äôre both confident that it‚Äôs ready, she will work on my behalf to find a publisher for it.

I‚Äôd like funding from the DAO so I can devote time to write, illustrate and develop this idea into a package that would include:

* A finished manuscript
* A book ‚Äòdummy‚Äô (a sketched out layout of the full book)
* 2-3 pages of finished art
* Cover art

This amount of material makes up a strong package which solidifies all the main creative decisions (the concept, the story, the content and flow of the pages, and the final art style) for a confident submission.

The goal would be to have material ready to submit to publishers in fall 2022.

**Funds Requested**

15 ETH

**Caveats**

* There is a small possibility that the normy publishing world may struggle to support a project based on a nft collection, or using a public domain ‚Äòbrand‚Äô, or because we just don‚Äôt get it all those weird heads. I don‚Äôt believe any of these things will happen because A) I believe I can create a wonderful, unique book that publishers will want, and B) I love the Nouns, and I believe many others will too.
* I‚Äôll be relying on my agent for her experience and advice with regard to submitting, and any and all publishers, from the big 5 to smaller indie publishers may be considered. In the event that a traditional publishing deal proves difficult, self-publishing could be another option, in which case I would return to the DAO to explore further funding for production and distribution with a separate proposal.
* The DAO should anticipate that any book published with a traditional publisher will most likely end up in a more traditional copyright situation and not CC0.

**TL;DR** - I‚Äôm asking for 15 ETH to develop a robust submission package for a Nouns children‚Äôs book for traditional publishing.

**About Me**
I‚Äôve worked for over 15 years in animation as an art director, director and creative director at Guru Studio on a range of hit animated series including Paw Patrol, True and the Rainbow Kingdom, Pikwik Pack, and Mecha Builders. I‚Äôm also the creator of my own series, the Emmy-nominated Justin Time.

I‚Äôm the illustrator of I Was Born a Baby and I Live in a Tree Trunk with Harper Collins, A Bear, a Bee, and a Honey Tree with Astra Publishing/Hippo Park, Cow Says Meow with HMH, Snow Falls with Penguin Random House/Tundra Books, and The Dog Who Wanted to Fly with Annick Press. I am represented by Emily Van Beek at Folio Jr. 1 literary agency.

You can see more of my work and experience on my website, brandonjamesscott.com 4

Thank you for reading and considering this proposal!

# Nouns Coffee

## tl;dr

### Nounders. Nouners. And Nounish Friends.

As Nouns continues to strive to be a household name throughout the world, our team began to think, let us not lose our tie to our everyday life. We are not necessarily here to use our digital space as a means to escape the real world, but rather, as a means to improve it. An ethos and belief that we know many Nouners also feel.

With this in mind and our team‚Äôs love and experience in the international coffee industry, we come to the DAO and the Nouns Community with a proposal for Nouns Coffee, the first ever Nounish consumable brand. With hopes of being on the shelves of your favorite cafe, local market, or frequented grocery store. With the potential of someday having special real world locations at the corner of your favorite neighborhood to meet up and sip a cup with some of your closest nounish friends.

### Nouns Coffee Brand
*Below you will find key details on how our team plans to bring this prolific coffee brand to life.*

## Phase One
### Coffee

- For Phase One of Nouns Coffee, the team will be sourcing a high-quality roaster in order to whitelabel for the brand. (read more about the potential plans for phase 2 and 3 later in this proposal)
- Our team will use their connections within the coffee industry to find the right partner to roast our coffee. We will work diligently to ensure the highest quality coffee. This includes virtually hosted cupping sessions where we will send the roasts around to members of the community so we can all decide on the roasts together.
- All coffee will be fair trade and organic. We care deeply about not only who drinks our coffee, but the hands that were instrumental in the planting, growing, harvesting, and roasting of our coffee.
- Phase One will include a variety of different single origins as well as a variety of blends so that all of our nounish palettes are satisfied and caffeinated (and decaffeinated for you weirdos).

### Ecommerce

- In order to get Nouns Coffee into as many cups as possible, we will build an ecommerce site in order to streamline operations and provide trustworthy purchasing and shipping of Nouns Coffee.
- This will be inclusive of a custom web experience reflective of the existing Nouns brand, to ensure a cohesive experience.
We will most likely use Shopify along with an integration of Coinbase Commerce in order to accept payments in crypto as well.
- The team will work on Web3 integration to enable all Nounders and Nouners to access and claim certain coffees/roasts for free as part of their participation in the DAO.

### Collateral/Advertising

- Beyond just caffeinating you, we will provide you with vessels to sip from as you listen to hosted noun o‚Äôclock spaces by CDT, while at work, or out for your morning walk.
We will create custom cards to place in each order with QR codes (or similar) sending people to nouns.wtf so they can check out the daily auction while brewing their morning coffee.
- Phase One will also include the creation of other nounish collateral like tote bags to carry around your coffee, your mug, your books, your HW, you name it. We‚Äôll work with the community to decide what pieces of collateral will be best used to show off your love for the community and your love for coffee. Proliferation is the name of the game.

### By Nouns for Nouns

- Being a Nounder/Nouner will open the door for monthly perks from Nouns Coffee. This may come in the form of monthly coffee deliveries, custom mugs and totes, and even ‚ÄúNoun of the Month‚Äù featured roasts where Nouners can have their Nouns featured on the packaging etc.
- Beyond being a Nounder or a Nouner, if you hold a Nouns Bidder POAP (brkfstsndwch‚Äôs first project for the DAO), you will also have the chance for added features and perks from Nouns Coffee.

### (If prop is approved by June 9th) Soft Launch at Korea Blockchain Week 2022 in August

- In collaboration with alphanonce, holders of Noun 75, we will be the Coffee Break Sponsers of Korea Blockchain Week in 2022.
- Being the Coffee Break Sponsors of the event means:
- Possibly the greatest branding exposure at KBW2022 as attendees are
constantly searching for their next cup of coffee. Branding will include
full-colored signage at all coffee stations, and on branded napkins and
coffee sleeves.
- Thousands of eyes, and mouths, witnessing the glory of Nouns and Nouns Coffee.

### Project Timeline
#### Phase One Accelerated for Korea Blockchain Week
Full Timeline Can Be Viewed [Here](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1G1l5sQb3JRQ5C0NGSklu_KoSe4p0KWk_/view)

## Phase Two
*Sourcing/Roastery | Warehouse Leasing and Hiring Head Roaster*
- Upon the successful adoption of Phase One and dependent on the demand for more coffee, we will submit a second proposal to lease our own warehouse and roaster, while also hiring a head roaster to roast and produce our own coffee.
- The pros to this are the eventuality of bringing down costs, allowing us to keep our quality high, and giving us the opportunity to produce at scale.

## Phase Three
*Nouns Cafe*
- A real world cafe, bringing the meme to life. Imagine you are walking down the cobblestone streets of soho and you look to your right to see a bright red figure appear, to realize it‚Äôs a pair of noggles. The sweet aroma of nougat, chamomile, and chocolate fill the air. It pulls you in. Taking a step through the door, you see a few patrons sporting Salvino Armati‚Äôs noggles, clinking their Nounish mugs, and bidding on the auction for the day.

# Nouns x Vector DAO: Secret Nouns 1/1s drop at NFT NYC

# Nouns x Vector DAO: Secret Nouns 1/1s drop at NFT NYC
Nouns ‚ÑÖ Vector DAO Proposal 

## Summary
Vector DAO will commission 8 artists in our community to design a series of unique Nouns artworks and print them on 200+ extra-large (6ft high!) wheatpaste posters around New York City for NFT NYC. Each unique poster design will be posted in a grid of 8 (all 8 posters will be the same artwork), with different designs being posted in their own grid of 8 across different locations, creating a scavenger like hunt to collect all 8 artworks.

Each poster will have a QR code that will allow individuals to mint 1 of 150 limited editions of each artwork. There will be 1,200 total mints at a price of 0.15 ETH each. All primary and secondary sales will go to the Vector DAO treasury to be used to purchase a Noun, replenishing the Nouns treasury. Any remaining ETH post Nouns acquisition will be split among the artists and team. As a stretch goal, we will try to support having the first 25 mints of each artwork be free, allowing this drop to be accessible to more people ‚Äì this will depend on our ability to find an elegant sybil resistant solution in time.

Vector will provide photographers to take photos of all the posters to share on social to boost visibility (blurring out the QR code) as well as write an article about our collaboration experience with Nouns DAO to help future creators make proposals.

![N|Solid](https://i.imgur.com/HB7iq5Y.png)

## What‚Äôs in it for Nouns DAO?
### Spread the Nouns meme
- We're putting up 200 giant posters (6ft tall) around NYC during a high visibility week + taking photos to share online
- The artwork will be done by a roster of top tier artists with their own audience and community
- There's a fun game attached to being the first to find the posters and mint the limited NFTs, creating a viral loop to share back online
- Vector DAO will use proceeds from the mint to purchase a Noun, forming a long term relationship between Vector and Nouns, helping replenish the treasury, and cementing the culture of paying it forward to more nounish builders

### Pave a path for more creatives to contribute to Nouns
- We'll bring 8 really amazing artists into the Nouns universe, who will then talk about it with their friends, driving more high caliber builders to the Nouns universe
- This also forms a relationship with Vector DAO, a community of 80 super strong makers who are excited to further contribute to nouns
- We'll write an article about the entire process to help onboard more makers into the community

## The Artists
[Shawna X](https://shawna-x.com) | New Yorker, Academy Awards, Nike, Google
[Elijah Anderson](https://www.instagram.com/spacehose/) | Adidas, SNS / New Balance, Popeye‚Äôs
[Lulu Lin](https://www.instagram.com/da__h_/) | Adobe, MAYDAY Magazine, Migrant Journal 
[Adam Ho](https://www.adamho.com/) | Cash App, Beat Foundry, Airbnb, Nike
[Danny Jones](https://yasly.com/) | Grammy‚Äôs, Nike, New Balance
[Haruko Hayakawa](https://www.haruko.co/) | New York Times, Bon Appetit, Fly by Jing
[Moon Collective](https://www.instagram.com/mooncollective/) | Saturdays NYC, Instagram, Popi CBD
_And more (pending proposal approval)_

## The concept: Independent, together
![N|Solid](https://i.imgur.com/bYQ8hIH.jpg)
_(Similar concept for Art Basel in 2021)_

We‚Äôre commissioning 8 artists with distinct styles to create a series of posters remixing Nouns, showcasing each artist‚Äôs unique styles and perspectives (illustration, 3D, typography, color, etc). To create a consistent visual motif across the posters, the artwork must feature a Nouns artifact, but interpreted however the artist sees fit. Vector will have these artworks printed on 200+ wheatpaste posters and posted around the NFT NYC conference in Times Square and in neighborhoods like Williamsburg and SoHo.

Each poster will have a QR code where viewers can mint 1 of 150 limited edition NFTs of that poster‚Äôs artwork. Each NFT edition will have a mint price of 0.15 ETH and be sold using the [Zora Protocol](https://create.zora.co/).

We hope the end product not only propagates the Nouns brand and reflects the power of placing goods in the public domain, but also the power of individuals in forming digital communities like Vector to create across both digital and physical mediums.

## About Vector DAO
Vector DAO is a collective of artists, designers, and developers in web3. Our mission is to give individuals autonomy over all aspects of their work from lifestyle and creative freedom to team and compensation. We believe in a future where creatives and makers aren‚Äôt tied to any one employer but can freely contribute to communities, like Nouns, that excites them. We believe in the power of working independently, together. That means members run their own independent practices but share resources, risks, and opportunities as a community, working together in groups when projects call for it, or individually at other times. Over time, Vector hopes to prove this new model of working that other communities and builders can replicate, sustainably working for public goods and moving web3 forward.

## Budget
200 Wheatpaste posters in Times square, Williamsburg, SoHo [1]: **20 ETH ($36,000)**
8 Independent artists‚Äô commission [2]: **100 ETH ($180,000)**
NFT mint mini-site design & dev [2]: **10 ETH ($18,000)**
Contribution process blog post w/ photos [2]: **0 ETH**
Total: **130 ETH**

_[1] Vendor: TBD, evaluating several proposals_
_[2] Vendor: Vector DAO Community_


## Timeline
**June 6, 2022** Artwork finished and sent to printers
**June 20, 2022** Wheatpaste posters printed and posted around NYC
**June 24, 2022** NFT minting closed

# Nouns IRL World Art Tour - NYC Mural

# Nouns IRL World Art Tour - NYC Mural
By Nouns Collective

![N|Solid](https://i.imgur.com/fJ9nndG.png)
_(Microsoft Surface Mural, Jasper Wong)_

## TL;DR
Let‚Äôs bring Nouns to the world through a global art tour starting with Nouns IRL in NYC! This activation will take place during NFT NYC (June 20 ‚Äì 23) and will feature:
- Hand painted mural by Jasper Wong who is an artist and founder of Worldwide Walls (http://www.powwowworldwide.com/ 3), the mural will be viewable from June 20 ‚Äì July 10 and will promote NFT culture by highlighting several well known projects with Nouns at the center.
- Simple website / landing page to commemorate the mural

**The activation is estimated to generate ~2.5M impressions. The total amount being requested is 87.5 ETH.**

## Why Should You Care? 
We can all agree that art is a pretty powerful communicator; it appeals to our emotions, forces us to think, and does a pretty good job of bringing us together on some level. We hope to use this power to accomplish the following: 
- Increase awareness of Nouns at NFT NYC‚Äîonline and IRL
- Increase brand awareness of the Nouns DAO as a leader in the industry;
- Invite NFT enthusiasts and the public at large to become involved with the Nouns DAO community. We want to let people know that we are here and we invite them to come build the future with us; and,
- Create a website (nounsirl.live) that tells the story behind the art (plan is to also include art from other cities on the tour)
  - High-res images and time lapse video of the mural, artist‚Äôs explanation etc.
  - Links to Nouns website, twitter, discord, etc.  

## Nouns IRL ‚Äî Person, Place, Thing
Nouns: person, place, thing‚Ä¶ We thought that it would be really cool to bring this concept to IRL via fun and engaging art activations around the world. Each stop on the tour will feature a specific artist (or group of artists), a city, and an interesting Nounified art piece. Imagine Nouns on Venice Beach, or Nouns on a rehabilitated basketball court in Chicago. Imagine the looks on people‚Äôs faces if a huge inflated Noun floated by them in Miami. These art activations will vary in flight time from several weeks to several months, with the goal being to create longer lasting pieces that become a part of the cultural backdrop in the city. There are a ton of things we can explore on this tour and we think NFT NYC would be a perfect place to start. 

## Person
Jasper Wong, founder of [Worldwide Walls](https://www.instagram.com/powwowworldwide/?hl=en).

Jasper Wong is an artist, illustrator, curator and art director; his art style can be described as a unique clash of Asian-influenced pop culture on paper. Jasper has exhibited worldwide in places such as Japan, California, France, London, Mexico, New York, Hong Kong, Chicago, and Australia. Jasper is also extremely accomplished having been chosen as one of the HB100, a list of Hypebeast‚Äôs 100 most influential figures in the industry, which includes the likes of Kaws, Pharrell, Banksy, Jay Z and Kanye West.

Jasper is a big fan of Nouns, he has been following the project for some time and is very excited at the opportunity to get involved with the DAO. In addition to painting the mural, Jasper will be sending out Nouns-related messages on his social media platforms to engage his followers before and during the mural‚Äôs flight time. Jasper is also very well known within the art community and will attempt to leverage his network to invite some of his artist friends to hang out with him at the completed mural during NFT NYC. The goal will be to use both Jasper and his artist friends‚Äô followers to generate additional traffic at the mural and further amplify social media impressions.

Jasper is very involved with the community through his non-profit organisation Pow! Wow! of which he is the creator and lead director. Pow! Wow! is a group of contemporary artists committed to community enrichment through the creation of art outreach programs, educational programs, and engaging the community in the creation and appreciation of art. Pow! Wow! has executed projects (murals, school renovations, basketball courts, etc.) in 13 cities around the globe, such as Honolulu, Taipei, Tokyo, Nepal, Guam, Seoul, Israel, and others. 

![N|Solid](https://i.imgur.com/Gd2UFLO.jpg)
_(Jasper Wong)_

## Place
New York City during NFT NYC, the Super Bowl of NFT conferences.

NFT NYC is the perfect staging ground for the first Nouns IRL activation. One of the stated missions of the DAO is to attract builders/creatives who are ready to create products that proliferate the Nouns brand to a wider audience and shed positive light on the concept of DAOs. NFT/crypto enthusiasts attending NFT NYC are a perfect target for this mission as many are informed about the space and are also builders/creatives looking for a project to support. The general public present in New York at this time will be surrounded by a ton of NFT related themes which should generate interest and curiosity. Many of these people (who may also be builders/creatives) have not yet fully explored the crypto space, this will be an opportunity to capture their attention and encourage them to become involved with Nouns DAO.

## Thing
Sharable hand painted mural art piece promoting NFT culture (optimised for social sharing on Twitter and Instagram) and website.

We have encouraged Jasper to create a mural in his style that is a conversational piece. The mural will act as an introduction to the crypto space for many newcomers, we hope that it inspires a sense of curiosity and an urge to dig deeper. For those in the know, the mural will act as a proverbial nod of acknowledgment to the projects that have made an impact and have shed a positive light on the crypto space in general. The mural will showcase popular CC0 and non-CC0 projects such as BAYC, Doodles, Moonbirds, Cryptoads, Chain Runners, CryptoPunks, Coolcats, World of Women, Creature World, DeadFellaz, Okay Bears, etc. Each of these projects have extremely large and very loyal followings which we believe will ensure that the mural reaches the widest audience possible. The goal is to create a compelling piece which shows unity within the crypto space and inspires the viewer to get involved. 

![N|Solid](https://i.imgur.com/HKKgICa.png)

The mural will be located at 300 W Broadway, next to the entrance of the Soho Grand Hotel, facing the busy Holland Tunnel) and will measure 8‚Äô9‚Äù H x 16‚Äô W in size.

As mentioned above, the ultimate goal is to launch a continued effort to promote Nouns worldwide through art. NYC is the first stop of the tour. The Nouns IRL website will act as an artefact for this and all future activations. The website will contain high-res images, time lapse video, artist bio, story behind the art, and links to the discord, the main Nouns website, discourse, etc. 

## Budget (all figures are in USD):
- Mural Wall: $62,000.00:
A soft hold was placed on the mural location until the 27th of May; we are in communication with the mural company about extending the hold for at least another week. If we are able to keep the current location, the cost for the wall will be $36,000.00. The $62,000.00 amount is a rough quote for an alternate location. We are in communication with the wall company to determine if cheaper locations are available. We are more than willing to return any funds that we did not end up needing to use to secure the wall.
- Artist: $40,000.00
- Team: $25,000.00
- Nouns IRL Landing page + capturing of video and photos for social: $11,000.00
- Travel / Accommodations: $6,000.00

**Total: $144,000.00, total ETH ask: 87.5 ETH**
_Based on $1,700.00 price of ETH as of May 27, 2022; we have added 2.5 additional ETH to try and account for volatility and fees._

## Team
This activation is being executed by the [Nouns Collective](https://twitter.com/Nounscollectiv3) (formerly the Collective DAO) which is a liquid super team made up of friends building playful, useful, and beautiful products and experiences with the crypto communities they love. We have previously contributed to the community via the [Nouns iOS app](https://www.nounsapp.wtf/) (proposal 6) which was officially launched on May 16, 2022. The Nouns Collective is composed of experienced founders, brand builders, and developers with over 15 years of experience building successful products. 

For this activation we have teamed up with [@miss_singh](https://twitter.com/Miss_Singh) who is a creative professional, cultural connector, community builder, experiential expert, and entrepreneur. @miss_singh has over two decades of experience that spans industries from tech, marketing, fashion and retail with her most recent gig being with Shopify. @miss_singh is extremely excited to jump into the Web3 world with us and looks to use her considerable experience and talents to deliver a memorable and lasting experience.

## To be Nountinued‚Ä¶

We are super excited to merge Nouns with IRL. The Nouns community is strong and vibrant; we hope to show the world who we are and what we are about. The best way to onboard more individuals, especially builders, into the space is to meet them where they are. DAOs, NFTs, blockchains, this can all be difficult to grasp for newcomers. Using familiar / traditional mediums of delivery (pop-ups, art, events, etc.) to introduce these concepts are an effective way to drive engagement. We hope that this stop on the tour will be the first of many to come!

![N|Solid](https://i.imgur.com/9upXNjf.png)
_(Uniqlo Mural, Jasper Wong)_

# GOAT CLUB's Nounish Meme Factory

**TLDR;**
Order 69 nounish gifs, jpegs and mp4s for 15E from the first Nounish Meme Factory ‚Äìhereby known as GOAT CLUB aka Goldy and tummlin (owners of noun #116).

![|300x300](https://media.tenor.com/images/307ba7102a129618fa4766d17a031e8b/tenor.gif)

**WHY?**
One of the founding principals of Nouns DAO is based on the thesis that backed by provenance, NFTs can be used as value capture for memes, and that therefore we should spend the treasury to proliferate Nouns as much as possible.

Nouns is digital (and internet) native, and the majority of people interacting with it are doing so on twitter and discord, so the first port of call should be to arm the nouns, and extended NFT and crypto communities with as much ammo for the meme war as possible.

![|573.526066350711x237.42583817429912](https://c.tenor.com/AIuauz6uAwUAAAAC/nouns-nouns-dao.gif)

**THE RIGHT TEAM FOR THE JOB**
Goldy has been a part of the Nouns community since early testnet, and Tummlin was lurking for a weeks before they purchased their noun together ~150 days ago. Both have already compulsively created all manner of high quality nounish, memish content, which has garnered hundreds of thousands of impressions, and been shared countless (no, literally, we don‚Äôt know how to do this) times on twitter and discord by the wider community to express their nounishness and spread the meme.

You can see gifs already by GOAT CLUB here: [https://tenor.com/users/goldypix
](https://tenor.com/users/goldypix)
And more nounish content below:

**![|588x832](https://www.dropbox.com/s/mc7wudpn0zraryj/goatclubnounishness_march2022.jpeg?dl=1)**

**CONTENT**
Our vision is to focus mostly on the content we know works; we want more of it. But we also want to be flexible, and move wherever both excites us and is getting traction. Part of the process will involve some experimentation to try to find new avenues for impact, ideally we unlock new nounish ideas. We will deliver within 1-3 months.

**We will mainly focus on:**  
* Nounish remixes of reaction gifs

**With a secondary focus on:**
* Nounified static memes, cartoon/comics, and pop culture remixes
* Nounish artwork (pixel art and otherwise) with cultural references and memetic resonance.

**And we may experiment with:**
* Brand new nounish memes (as opposed to remixing existing memes)
* Lo-fi nounish videos
* ‚Ä¶Perhaps something not yet considered

**Community requests:**
* We will create a twitter hashtag, and a channel on the nouns discord for the project (or perhaps our own discord if its neccesary) for community members to request remixes, content or share ideas.

**Bonus**
* Livestream the creation of 1-2 gifs
* Timelapse of a creation of 1-2 gifs

![|444x235](https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/SNtkogr9Bq5pFxATI3itMf_YblttSCdyqCWNdQJAj-Jox9AbWsYxYLQP8H8JaSM5_Hcy0nDcItBaAuDJiJbsSLB18rTWLnf8PPyzc3tO4NwG6zxpkTI1zxlwQzNwOVAlx-GbAw69)


**ACCESS & PROLIFERATION**
We‚Äôll upload everything we make to accessible repositories for easy use, especially those with native integrations to social platforms like Tenor and Giphy, as well as a repository of all the things we have made and will continue to make (Google Drive or Dropbox etc.)

We‚Äôll convert the most appropriately scaled work as Discord reactions (emotes) for extra ease of use. (Happy to either host these on a Goat Club discord server or give to Nouns DAO server admins).

We will also make dedicated efforts to share this content, as natively as possible (as well as find ways to encourage others) via twitter and discord to increase awareness of the existence of all of them. Connecting the gifs with a hashtag like #nouns or #nounify could be quite powerful.

![nounish-more|500x500](https://c.tenor.com/lCq21Mx-m0UAAAAC/nouns-nounsdao.gif)

**RISKS & REWARD**
**Worst case scenario:** 
There‚Äôs a whole bunch of new Nounish content to enjoy, share, and proliferate.

**Best case scenario:** 
We strike gold memetic gold and some content we create spreads far and wide on the internet, beyond our nounish bubble.

We‚Äôre big fans of Noun 40‚Äôs Retroactive Outsized Rewards idea in general, and we‚Äôd love for the DAO to be open to such a thing if anything we made here became a huge success (eg. millions of views etc).

Thank you Nouners and Nounees, we look forward to hearing feedback, ideas and questions.

# # Nouns DAO esports - Pok√©mon Unite expansion & BLVKHVND partnership trial

* Pok√©mon Unite team for 3 months
* Lots of Noun representation on twitch & youtube
* Mini documentary series following the tournament during their London trip
* Competing in $550,000USD worth of events over the next 3 months
* Trial and introduce BLVKHVND as operational partner for Nouns esports.
* Direct results and exposure between now and the end of August, no delay due from ‚Äòbuilding‚Äô

**Goal:**

To expand the Nouns DAO esports division operations and increase the audience reach for the nouns brand using the diverse, engaged global audience that gaming and esports presents. Additionally, to trial BLVKHVND as an operational partner for Nouns DAO esports.

**Pok√©mon Unite:**

Pok√©mon Unite released in June 2021 and is a MOBA for Nintendo Switch and Mobile. Currently the Unite Championship Series (UCS) season 1 is underway with 1 monthly final, the regional championships ($50,000USD prize pool) and the world championship ($500,000USD prize pool) remaining until the conclusion of the season.

The official Pok√©mon Unite twitch channel shows 36 hours streamed over the last month with an average viewer count of 2,398 and a peak viewer count of 20,574. That peak occurred during the European AEOS Cup finals, which our proposed team won first place in. Due to that we can assume that the European Regional Finals and especially the Pokemon World Championships will beat that viewer count.

**The Proposed Team:**

The proposed team we are looking to acquire is known as Random Gaming who have consistently placed 1st or 2nd in all European UCS events to date, including winning the AEOS Cup and the $20,000USD first place prize, with the top 2 teams from European Regional Championship qualifying for the World Championship on August 19th-21st in London we are confident in the team‚Äôs ability to qualify for this event.

The team consists of five players who are;

ADESu (Spain) - https://twitter.com/ADESuUnite 1 - Twitch
Redmaw (Norway) - https://twitter.com/redmaw_ 1 - Twitch
Bruv (England) - https://twitter.com/BruvHD 3 - Twitch 1
Gyz (Spain) - https://twitter.com/Cepriii 1 - Twitch
Ghatlue (Germany) - https://twitter.com/Gatlue 1 - Twitch

At the time of writing this proposal, the team in total has 976 hours streamed on twitch in the last three months with a team average of 56 viewers at any given time. Most notably is BruvHD who averages 167 viewers throughout his streams in this three month period.

**The Proposed Agreement:**

This proposal consists of a three month agreement with the team which will have them representing Nouns DAO for the remainder of the UCS. This agreement will consist of a signing bonus and funding a boot camp in London on the 15th - 20th of June in the lead up and during the European Regional Finals. This boot camp will be documented by a videographer to produce a mini series and various other forms of video content for the Nouns community to engage with and to spread Nouns around the gaming and Pok√©mon Unite community, we would be looking to utilize the Nouns DAO marketing studio, however we do have alternative options locally to London.

**BLVKHVND:**

BLVKHVND are the first decentralized esports organization, fielding teams through Halo, Counter Strike, Pok√©mon Unite, Apex Legends, Rogue Company and Blood hunt. Being knowledgeable in both the esports/gaming industry but also the web3 industry we are in a unique position to be able to contribute to this project with in depth understanding of both elements. Our involvement would be being the point of contact for the team, organizing and executing all the elements of this proposal and working alongside the existing Nouns DAO esports contributors in Sasquatch, Brennen and Brax to scale the current Nouns esports resources and continue to develop and improve the operations as well as increase our branding image and implementation of Nouns culture throughout the operation.

Our tasks include but are not limited to;

* Organizing and executing the Bootcamp in London on 15th - 20th of June, this consists of booking flights, accommodation, training facility, media for content creation and having a staff member on site to monitor and assist.
* Working with the players and media contributors to create engaging content and roll out on YouTube and Twitter.

# Nouns Bidder POAP V2

## tl;dr
**Nounders, Nouners, and Nounish friends. ‚åê‚ó®-‚ó®**
After an exciting V1 Bidder POAP experiment, the team is back with a proposal for a stronger, more robust, and more engaging Bidder POAP experience. With the top-tier UX talent from 0xDesigner, the unmatched creative prowess of SerNoadz, the development expertise of Plaid Shaman, and Brkfstsndwh (along with a direct line to Patricio and the POAP team), we aim to deliver a creative and engaging experience that will continue the spin wheel and proliferation of the meme to a whole new audience.

## Why
Through our V1 experiment, our team believes that having an ongoing incentive around bidding in the daily auction is not only beneficial to the DAO (promoting increased bidding on daily auctions to add capital to the treasury), but also allows more people to feel like they are a part of the DAO without actually winning the Noun on auction. POAP and team also have some fun ideas for incentives that will be coming via a secondary proposal (think, raffling off a Noun to POAP winners).

## What
- Revamped Gallery Page + Auction House and POAP Integrations
- More Advanced Claiming Mechanism
- Updated POAP Art with New Artists
- Retroactive POAPs for Winners Since V1 Ended
- 6 Months of POAPs and Management from Launch Date

## How
### Revamped Gallery Page + Integrations
- We will work with our team of designers and developers to create a revamped gallery page for showcasing the daily POAP, past POAPs, and winning bidders.
- This page will also show the live auction data for each daily auction, showcasing which bidders are currently in the running to receive one of the daily POAPs.
- Beyond that, we will integrate the POAP API more seamlessly to make the entire experience of the POAP page more engaging and informative.

### More Advanced Claiming Mechanism
- With our direct connection to the POAP team, we will work on building a more robust claiming mechanism than the direct send we conducted in V1.

### Updated POAP Art with New Artists
- Working with the incredibly talented SerNoadz, we will create a unique and updated art style for the Bidder POAPs.
- We will also aim to commission featured artists monthly that are voted on by the DAO to create unique POAP art in their own nounish style.
- Below is just an example of some of SerNoadz‚Äôs work, and is by no means the final art style. We will work with the community to land on the final and approved art style for the key POAP art.
- See example art and full prop [here](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/proposal-nouns-bidder-poap-v2/1440).

### Retroactive POAPs for Winners Since V1 Ended
- Once the art is complete, we will retroactively send all POAPs to their rightful winners since V1 concluded in May at Noun 296.

## Who
Producer + Project Manager | Brkfstsndwch
**Experience:** With close to a decade of production and product management experience, Brkfstsndwch has managed projects ranging from rebrands for some of tech‚Äôs biggest companies to 360 campaigns to website + app builds to feature-length documentaries and so many things in between. Brkfst was also responsible for the proposal and execution of the Bidder POAP V1 project, Nouns Coffee, and has been a part of the Nouns Community since the beginning.

Lead Artist | SerNoadz
**Experience:** An artist that needs no introduction, SerNoadz has been a staple in the Nouns community nearly since its inception, proliferating Nouns day in and day out with their project Noadz, among a plethora of other crucial pieces that have helped the DAO become what it is today. Most recently the current Nouncil site.

UX Designer | 0xDesigner
**Experience:** Being the lead designer on the POAP V1 project, 0xDesigner has a proven track record at executing to the highest degree. Beyond their involvement in the DAO, 0x is a product designer with a decade of experience working with companies ranging from seed stage startups to big tech like Facebook and Google. 0x has designed and helped launch over 50 digital products via founding a globally ranked UX agency.

Developer | Plaid Shaman
**Experience:** For nearly 20 years, Plaid Shaman (Brian) has been working with startups, agencies, and non-profits bringing 100s of projects to life. More recently, they‚Äôve been collaborating on Web3 projects to create innovative experiences with NFTs and other blockchain technology. A few most recent projects have included, NounCats, Contract Reader, Chowies, and more.

Commissioned Artists | To Be Voted On by Community

### Timeline

- 4-6 Weeks | POAP Art Development

# Nouns cc0 Space Image Bank

# TLDR:

Space is one of the core themes in cryptoart and the NFT universe. This proposal is to ask Nouns to fund a repository of cc0 space images for all artists to use freely in their work. Sponsored by the Nouns DAO, the website will feature nounish elements as well as an "about section" with information about Nouns. The Nouns ecosystem will be proliferated through exposure to the artistic community as well as any potential exposure from the featuring of the space images on mainstream and specialized media. Total amount requested: 12 Eth.

# About me:
If you prefer to watch instead of reading, check out this short video I made for my SuperRare application to learn more about myself and my work. 

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1iffK8n9uYuJgV8BmHjQaYXPuhgGmvHxi/view?usp=sharing

My passion for space and astronomy started at a very early age and I started shooting astrophotography about 7 years ago when I first paired a camera to the eyepiece of my telescope. After doing this as a hobby for several years, two years ago I decided to quit my job in TV and film production to become a full time astrophotographer. In early 2021 I minted my first NFT and throughout this past year I've released two collections and over 20 1/1 NFTs. During this past year, my work has been featured across several media outlets such as NASA‚Äôs Astronomy Picture of the Day and the European Space Agency's social media profiles, as well as a number of astronomy websites and magazines, and I've even had the honor of having one of my pictures used as a stamp of the Argentine Postal Service.



# Goal:

As a way to give visibility to the Nouns DAO, a cc0 image bank of space images will be set up that will serve as a repository for artists working on space-themed art. Space is a huge theme in cryptoart and NFTs. These images will be free to be used as subjects, backdrops and to be repurposed as artists see fit without the need to attribute authorship, giving artists complete control. The url **cc0images.wtf** has already been secured to this end.

**Nouns proliferation:**

The website would be designed in line with the Nouniverse aesthetics and would contain an "about'' section with information about Nouns. Besides strengthening ties and gaining visibility within the artist community, space images are regularly featured on specialized and mainstream media, which could potentially increase visibility to the Nouns community outside the art/NFT circles, by being featured by space agencies and more traditional media outlets reaching the general public. When published in  media, images would be credited to the photographer and the Nouns DAO.

**Website Mockup:**

![690x460]( https://static.wixstatic.com/media/e2982b_b37b352373d746f89df20b099d550a89~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_750,h_421,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_auto/mockup%20portada%20copy.jpg)

![690x460]( https://static.wixstatic.com/media/e2982b_27fa02424e8f4ef095329ff2748b6f8d~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_750,h_421,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_auto/mockup%20about%20copy.jpg)

# About the images:

As technology has pushed forward during the past years, the ability to image deep space objects like distant galaxies or nebulae has stopped being the exclusive realm of observatories and space telescopes, and amateur astronomers worldwide now have access to hardware that allows them to photograph these stunning objects. Taking hours and sometimes several nights to shoot with long exposures, these hi-res images combine complex processing skills with specialized equipment, resulting in unique artworks that capture the beauty that lies in outer space.

Located 7.500 light years away, the Carina Nebula is a region of ionized gas and space dust almost 500 light years across.

All of the above are examples where the Nouns DAO could get exposure through this image bank.

In time, the repository can grow and add other categories of images for non space-related art.

# Deliverables and timeline

A website with the Nouns DAO branding with a set of 30 space images available for free download under a cc0 licence. 

Deep space images take anywhere from a couple of nights to entire weeks and require careful planning to obtain, so this is a slow rollout project. Tens of hours of exposures as well as extensive processing time are needed in order to capture these objects, and most objects only appear in the night sky during limited periods of time during the year so the collection would be slowly built throughout an entire year. Some of the images will be shot from my rooftop observatory but others require traveling to dark sky sites. The images will be a balanced mix of deep space objects shot on telescopes, solar system bodies (Sun, Moon and planets), widefield images (star fields, milky way shots, star trail images) and landscape astrophotography, to offer a wider variety of objects and backdrops for artists.

Launch of the website would be scheduled six months after proposal is approved with an initial amount of 15 images at launch, and another 15 images would be added after a second six month period (this second update could be scheduled at shorter, more frequent intervals with a smaller amount of images).

# Budget

Project management and execution, consisting of planning and acquiring the images throughout a one year period - 5 Eth

Equipment upgrades (purchases to upgrade equipment already owned) - 3 eth

Expenses for dark sky sites travel - 2 eth

Website development and maintenance (according to scope of this proposal) - 2 eth

Total: 12 Eth

# Protect Treasury (down $43M since April)

Since its peak in April, the treasury has gone from $78M to $35M.

People calculate their expenditures in their native currency (typically dollars) and pay people in the same.

Having some bit in USD allows us to protect against massive downside while being able to pay people in the currency they calculate and pay everyone else in.

This was proposed months ago, and ignored - while such action wouldn't have saved an immense amount of cash, a 10% hedge would have saved ~$4M (which can fund A LOT of cool nounish things).

You might think that ETH can't go any lower, but keep in mind that it went from $1400 to $70 (-95%), right now we are at (-72%) with -95% being at around a price of $250. That would leave our treasury at $6.5M. 

I'm not saying that ETH is going that low, but it's not out of the question in crypto.

To add, we can always buy the ETH back. We have so much ETH, would it hurt to hedge against the chance of an additional 80% drop?

Do the prudent thing. Protect our treasury. Convert 10% of the treasury to USDT.

I'm not adding a transaction because there are a lot of ways to skin this cat and it may best be done with a TWAP.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wU9Daiu5XoM

~ Honk diddly.

# MOO√òNBEANS: Nouns Baked Beans

**TL;DR**

MOO√òNBEANS is a project that produces and sells premium OpenSauce baked beans, and proliferates Nouns by getting them into grocery stores. This is a world first: a community-owned baked bean brand, and a true collaboration between Nouns and Sublime Butter (that‚Äôs us). To deliver on this vision, we‚Äôre asking for $150,000 (c.135 Ether).

---

**Who we are**

We‚Äôre Sublime Butter Ltd. We‚Äôre a UK-based butter company with a huge array of awards under our belt. We have excellent in-roads with distributors, a proven track record of amazing product development, and a profound understanding of brand.

[![https://i.ibb.co/949CgRH/Awards.jpg](https://i.ibb.co/949CgRH/Awards.jpg)](https://sublimebutter.com/)

But that‚Äôs not all. We have in our midst a team of powerful developers, designers, storytellers, marketers and strategists who are at the absolute top of their game. Between us we have won two Emmy awards, three Webby awards, and had two BAFTA nominations.

---

**What are the opportunities?**

1) There are a variety of legal, regulatory and licensing must-haves required to be an FMCG brand. It also takes a lot of skill, knowledge and experience to develop, produce and distribute a successful FMCG product. This makes it a tough market for a DAO to break into. UNLESS you have us as a partner. 

2) The baked bean industry in the UK is ENORMOUS. Brits get through two million tins of them every single day. And yet, it is one of the plainest and most uninventive verticals on a supermarket shelf. We think this makes it ripe for disruption.

---

**Introducing MOO√òNBEANS**

Nouns-branded baked beans, developed according to Sublime‚Äôs incredible recipe. Each 400g tin will be sold for c. ¬£2.50.

We really want to stress that this is a true collaboration, a first-of-type web3/CC0/real-world merger. Nobody has ever done anything like this before, because such a relationship has never been fostered before. It‚Äôs truly symbiotic, totally unprecedented, and paints an extremely exciting picture for the future.

Each tin will feature a Nouns character that is also represented in our marketing and on-site. We‚Äôre thinking four tin variants should be a good place to start for launch.

Nouns DAO will get **20% of all profits** from MOO√òNBEANS sales. 

Moreover, getting this right (which we know we will) opens up a huge range of other opportunities in the FMCG space, and therefore a huge range of prospective revenue streams into the Nouns ecosystem. 

![https://i.ibb.co/mHg8fJr/Can-V2.jpg](https://i.ibb.co/mHg8fJr/Can-V2.jpg)

*Here‚Äôs a mock-up of some tins. Note: This is **super early,** and designed for illustrative purposes only. The actual branding, tins, website, etc. ‚Äî all of which are a part of the scope of work ‚Äî will be truly, abundantly Nounish.*

---

**Why we‚Äôre doing this**

- We believe in web3/CC0
- We love Nouns and everything it represents; we want to raise awareness of Nouns in an area that‚Äôs usually difficult to break into
- We want to position Sublime as a pioneering FMCG brand in the web3 space
- We believe there are a range of collaboration opportunities here, and this is an excellent test case for future disruption together
- We want to build a solid foundation for the wider MOO√òNBEANS ecosystem

**Budget**

We are asking for $150k USD to take MOO√òNBEANS to market (c.135 $ETH at the time of writing). Proposal costings within the model have been denominated in fiat because of the nature of FMCG engagements and their payments.

Budget Breakdown

- Brand & Product Development ‚Äì $25k USD

# Sailing PR campaign, Korea Blockchain Week 2022 [6,7 August]

### tl;dr
Display Nouns glasses on 5 sailboats in the middle of Seoul during Korea Blockchain Week 2022.

### Summary

- Sail 40 km on five J/24 sailboats with huge Nouns themed sails.
- Location: Hangang river, Seoul, South Korea (population 15 million)
- The river is surrounded with two 20+ km highway roads, cycling roads, parks, and high-rise buildings. There are 13 bridges for cars, subways, trains, and pedestrians.
- The goal of the project is to promote NounsDAO during Korea Blockchain Week via online and offline engagement. We hope to put content on twitter and instagram during Korea Blockchain Week.

### Date & Time: August 6-7th, 8:00 ~ 18:00
### Location: Hangang river, Seoul, South Korea
- August 6th: Kimpo Airport‚ÜíGangnam
- August 7th: Gangnam‚ÜíKimpo Airport

###  Description
![https://media.giphy.com/media/XAc2QIWy9ha0ihzFjO/giphy.gif](https://media.giphy.com/media/XAc2QIWy9ha0ihzFjO/giphy.gif)

- J/24 sailboat is the most famous sailboat model of all time! I propose to display nouns glasses on 5 sailboats in the middle of Seoul, South Korea. Seoul is home to 15+ million people and a lot of interest towards blockchain and NFTs among the population. The Korean government, businesses, and people are interested in blockchain and the NFT space. Hangang river is surrounded by two highways and will be a perfect place to reach lots of people during rush hours. The two way distance will be around 40+ kilometers. This could be a great opportunity to advertise NounsDAO and attract potential future members and developers.

I will create a fleet of five J/24 sailboats and sail along the river from Kimpo international airport to Itaewon bridge and back. This event is going to be organized for NounsDAO. - The idea is to make as many people remember Nouns-glasses. I identify two types of impressions offline and online. Images of Nouns glasses on 5 sailboat in the middle of the river will spark curiosity in the minds of the bypassers. This campaign is not a spam like poster or post that many of us learned to ignore without noticing. People would remember Nouns glasses and later when they attend a conference or buy NFTs they would recognize the Nouns symbol and would eventually come straight to the NounsDAO!
- The spinnakers are big and span an area of 8 meters in height and 4 meters in width. They definitely can be used as decoration at different events. I think the best use for sails is to give them to the teams. There are about five good regattas every year in Korea, I will provide more content free of charge when we race at different events. I am sure a pretty spinnakers with Nouns Glasses would be appreciated by the teams and used for many years.
