"# Nounifying Brazil and Web3 Workshops in communities of Rio de Janeiro

*This proposal submission was executed by [Gnars DAO](https://gnars.com).*

Nounify the skate lane in the Gigoia Island community and onboard 120 teenagers ‚Äì from 11 to 14 years old ‚Äì to web3 at the *[Skate Cuida Institute](https://www.instagram.com/skatecuida/?hl=pt)* - both in Rio de Janeiro.

**Why?**

According to [Statista](https://www.statista.com/), **Brazil is the 2nd country with the most people using NFTs (5M users).**

![](https://i.imgur.com/d7fhQsI.png)

Rio de Janeiro stands out as a crypto hub. In June, the 1st international NFT event in Brazil took place in the city. Gathering renowned Brazilian artists, collections of different styles and lectures about web3, NFTs and DAOs, NFT Rio showed the potential of the Brazilian market.

The Nouns DAO featured as one of the main collections during the event. [After the approval of proposal 98](https://nouns.wtf/vote/98), [@beautyandpunk](https://twitter.com/beautyandpunk), [@leoclark](https://twitter.com/leoclark) and [@fabioseva](https://twitter.com/fabioseva) did a great job spreading the noun culture at the conference. We want to further develop this work.

![](https://i.imgur.com/mohS5HA.png)

For this, the plan is to:
## 1) Promote 4 educational workshops about web3 in Gigoia Island, Rio de Janeiro/RJ.

![](https://i.imgur.com/x4A8LV0.png)
*Bob Burnquist with the teenagers from the Skate Cuida Institute*

The workshops are divided in 4 stages:
**a) Wallets and tokens:** first, a ‚Äúmagic trick‚Äù makes money disappear‚Ä¶ and reappear inside the pocket of an attendee. The instructor explains what are ‚Äúthe secret crypto words‚Äù, how they can ‚Äúcontrol magic internet money‚Äù, and how anyone - even kids - can earn, use or store such money.

**b) NFTs:** the instructor shows attendees how digital wallets can hold other digital stuff. A series of these valuable things have been scattered through the Skate Cuida Institute (QR codes linking to a minting page). A treasure hunt leads attendees to earn their first NFTs.

**c) DAO:** the instructor shows a site where they can use their NFTs as tickets to join a club. He tells them there is a proposal there where they can vote for a prize that will be distributed either to half the ‚Äúclub‚Äù‚Ä¶ or to all of its members - depending on how they vote it. The instructor reveals the results (awarding a prize in crypto to every participant) and teaches basic concepts in cooperation and game theory. He tells the audience the workshop was sponsored by a ‚Äúclub‚Äù, too - NounsDAO - that collaborates online to do cool stuff in the real world. And incites attendees they can do the same via the club they now belong to.

**d) Skate & Lunch:** to wrap things up, Bob Burnquist invites the kids for a ride on the Institute‚Äôs track, then **food and drinks** are served for all.

We plan to bring 30 kids in each workshop. The goal is to **introduce 120 people to crypto and NFTs** via Nouns DAO.

The end goal is to find a format ([presentation here](https://www.canva.com/design/DAFHzoOmwAE/OhifeRzHPUSLD7X1YLORVQ/view?utm_content=DAFHzoOmwAE&utm_campaign=designshare&utm_medium=link&utm_source=publishpresent)) that can be replicated in other communities in a cost-effective way.

**The workshops will be conducted by guiriba, a member of Paradigma Education**. Paradigma is a crypto research house in Brazil with experience ranging from [materials for beginners](https://paradigma.docsend.com/view/vzysv4pg3evfqry9) to courses to [analysis for experts.](https://app.paradigma.education/feed/post/view?id=kru2M8m98ePrweKAjXeu)

## 2) Nounify the skateboard track of Gigoia Island, Rio de Janeiro/RJ.

![](https://i.imgur.com/5iJAROf.png)

***Left:** [Bob Burnquist at the skate park](https://oglobo.globo.com/rio/bairros/niteroi/noticia/2022/06/bob-burnquist-leva-projeto-social-para-o-caramujo-em-niteroi.ghtml). Right: the Brazilian version of Skater Noun was created by [Ozzz](https://twitter.com/ozzzmabro), member of the [Mafriends](https://twitter.com/MafriendsArt) collective.*

While the workshop takes place, Nouns artwork by Brazilian artists will be painted at the Skate Cuida Institute, where classes are taught by Bob Burnquist.
We will bring a film crew and later deliver a clip registering the workshops and painting action.

## 3) Make a donation to the Skate Cuida Institute.

Purchase 3 VR headsets and 3 notebooks for the institute, to support the 4 weekly encounters currently held there, where kids receive cognitive training, skateboarding lessons, food and a safe space to play.

### What is the Skate Cuida Institute and who is Bob Burnquist?

Bob Burnquist is the greatest X-Games winner in history.

A Brazilian skateboarder & ex-videogame star, he now aims to empower unprivileged communities through sports, education and technology.

Skate Cuida Institute is a place in Rio with modest infrastructure where Bob and his team receive dozens of youngsters a week to study and skate together.

Bob is also avowedly a crypto-native. In 2021, he launched his first NFT collection, [Burnquist Gold.](https://twitter.com/bobburnquist/status/1446965292836524039) A fan of the Tezos blockchain, Bob has also experimented with Ethereum.

![](https://i.imgur.com/5hWMyOY.png)

Source: [Viva o Rio.](http://vivario.org.br/bob-burnquist-oferece-oficina-de-skate-no-parque-esportivo-e-social-do-caramujo/)

### **What is the motivation for Nouns DAO to fund the proposal?**

1) To foster web3 proficiency among teenagers from Rio de Janeiro communities.
2) To bring Nouns culture to young people having their first contact with the world of NFTs.
3) To seek media exposure in newspapers like O Globo, with [more than 25M readers and 185M monthly views](https://oglobo.globo.com/politica/o-globo-foi-jornal-mais-lido-do-pais-em-2021-25376960); and social media like that of Bob Burnquist, who has more than [160K followers on Twitter](https://twitter.com/bobburnquist) and [770K on Instagram.](https://www.instagram.com/bobburnquist/)
4) Create a cc0 educational material for communities around the world, allowing anyone to translate it and use it to teach web3 to children using Nouns.

### **How much will the action cost?**
**1) 3.5 ETH for the web3 educational program at the Skate Cuida Institute.**
 
- 1.2 ETH: airdrops for the attendees during the 4 workshops (120 x 0.01 ETH per person). The amount in ETH sent to the teens will be done via Polygon. A local business will be on the location, selling snacks and accepting crypto as payment.
- 2.3 ETH: event expenses:
	- 1 ETH for instructor‚Äôs transport and accommodation: will be 4 weeks traveling from Minas Gerais to Rio de Janeiro. He will travel to Rio de Janeiro every week, just to give the workshops.
	- 1 ETH for to organize breakfast, lunch, and afternoon coffee for the teenagers to spend the day at the Skate Cuida Institute
	- 0.3 ETH for the costs of printing QR Codes on the skateboard track.
	- 0.7 ETH for to pay the instructor in charge of workshops.

**2) 3 ETH for the artistic initiative.**

- 1 ETH: The money will be used to pay Brazilian artists who will create Brazilian versions of the Nouns. 0.2 ETH will be paid to each of the chosen artists, making it possible to create 5 unique arts. One of them is already created.
- 1 ETH: destined to purchase the materials used in the painting
- 1 ETH: to the artist responsible for painting the Noun on the institute‚Äôs skate track. In each of the workshops he will be present, nounifying the skateboard track of the Skate Cuida Institute with the artists‚Äô designs.

**3) Donation of 4 ETH to the Skate Cuida Institute.**
- 1 ETH: for maintenance of the skateboard track at the Institute while the workshops are happening.
- 3 ETH: equipment to encourage teenagers to [learn about web3:](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UDuKAded86Y)
	- 3x AR Oculus Quest 2 (to introduce concepts of virtual worlds more easily and foster the creation of 3D art).
	- 3x Notebook [Ideapad 3i:](https://www.kabum.com.br/produto/254192/notebook-lenovo-ultrafino-ideapad-3i-intel-core-i3-10110u-4gb-ssd-256gb-windows-11-15-6-prata-82bs000jbr?gclid=CjwKCAjwrNmWBhA4EiwAHbjEQI7OaPM7XOhSlqUKD_bRjiN5Pf-8Ty16Ulmszeq3mRP6yCQZvgTZWxoCft0QAvD_BwE) to allow the classes that already take place at the institute to handle more students per lesson.

**4) 2 ETH for film crew to cover the workshop and further publicize the initiative.**

Therefore, **we require 12.5 ETH** for the execution of all the actions listed above."

# nounish ‚åê‚ó®-‚ó®  ‚Äì Telling the stories of Nouns DAO through videos

**TL;DR**
* **Fund *nounish*, a creative agency dedicated to telling the story of Nouns, and the stories of its builders, through video.**
* A team of 10 people; Essentially dedicating Pixel, Goldy‚Äôs production company, to Nouns full time.
* Lead by Goldy & 142.
* 6 months of operations.
* $969K requested.

### Summary
* **Long-term Vision:** Help make Nouns a highly recognizable brand globally and inspire ambitious builders to build on the protocol. 
* **Objectives for this proposal:**  
	1. Help anyone who is curious about Nouns, including non-crypto audiences, ***understand* what Nouns is about**.
	2. Onboard new builders & inspire current builders to **make ambitious and impactful proposals**.
	3. Rally the Nouns community around projects that we've funded and **empower it to share our content**. 
	4. Enable builders to use our content to **ease interactions with brands & non-crypto organizations**.
* **Strategy: Focus on Middle of Funnel (read more below)**
	* Make our [YouTube channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCP4kPIzNhpTGrn75XeLVVXg) an **onboarding tool to Nouns DAO**.
		* Make the channel's page a shareable, digestible, and entertaining repository of videos that cover what Nouns DAO does and funds.
	* Produce & publish **high quality videos about the most promising projects Nouns DAO funds**, to tell their stories in an accessible way.
	* Publish dozens of **"Nouns Explainers"** covering the many layers of Nouns.
	* Keep a pulse on projects' progress and **share compelling updates on our social media accounts daily**.
* **Measuring Success**
	* We want to spend the next 6 months experimenting with different types of video formats, channels, storytelling, and more.
	* We will track the most relevant metrics to understand what works and what doesn't. Aside from reach (views), here are some key metrics we plan to measure: 
		*  **Builder recruitment** (how many people get noun-pilled thanks to our content and join our community?)
		*  **Content leverage** (how frequently and in what ways is our content used by other builders to further the DAO's interests?)
		*  **Content proliferation** (how and where our videos get re-uploaded, remixed, or used in a new context)
		*  **Video retention** (when & why do people drop in our videos?)
		*  **View sources** (where do poeople come from to watch our videos?)
	*  We will share these metrics publicly to engage the community and learn together.
* **Deliverables**
	* 8-10 high production value long-form videos (similar to [these](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eAenRhD8Whk) [ones](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S_GgY3WAKAQ)).
	* 140+ short form videos (similar to [these](https://twitter.com/nounish/status/1539991656988114946) [ones](https://twitter.com/nounish/status/1547686340564697088)).
	* Daily posts sharing updates from builders on our social media accounts (examples [1](https://www.instagram.com/reel/Ch49qrcItt8/) [2](https://twitter.com/nounish/status/1566003680482148353) [3](https://twitter.com/nounish/status/1565058557829070848))
	* Publish a CC0 video bank with our raw footage for anyone to use.
* **Accountability**
	* **Form a Steering Committee:** comprising of 4156 & 2 more trusted community members or subject matter experts.
		* Provide this committee with frequent updates on our strategy and get their feedback & guidance. We want this committee to keep us accountable.  
	* **Community involvement:** Monthly reports + open discord call with the DAO.
* **Staffing & Resources**
	* A team of 6 full-timers & 4 part-timers (142, Goldy & the entire Pixel team)
	* At least 10 shoot days around the world.

# The next 6 months

## The Challenges We Want To Tackle

[From Prop 64:](https://nouns.wtf/vote/64)
> * Prop builders don‚Äôt necessarily have the skills/resources/time to execute a marketing campaign for their projects.
> * Wonderful projects with really great output are not being amplified and we are missing out on a lot of noun proliferation potential.
> * It‚Äôs difficult to explain what Nouns are to the world. 

We believe that the problems we outlined in Prop 64 still exist. Most of the amazing projects that Nouns funds need help telling their story, and video is the best way to do so.

It is safe to assume that without the videos we published, Nouns DAO would have missed the opportunity of amplifying the stories of these wonderful projects. 

With video, we are able to tell a much deeper and colorful story and evoke much more emotion. We believe this must be 10Xed to recruit more builders to help the meme proliferate. 

## The Nouns Funnel

We think of builder & community onboarding as a funnel: 



* **Top of Funnel**: People who heear about Nouns from a friend, stumble upon a Nouns project in their city, enjoy a piece of nouns art on twitter etc. 
* **Middle of Funnel**: People who become curious to understand what Nouns are, want to learn how to get funded, or want to join the community.
* **Bottom of Funnel**: People who are ready to submit a proposal, buy a noun (or nounlet), or to join the community or a sub DAO.


In the next 6 months we want to focus on the **Middle of the Funnel**. We want to help explain what Nouns are to the world and get many more people noun-pilled. 

**Why focus on Middle of Funnel first and not Top of Funnel?**

The majority of people that have heard of Nouns do not really grok what it is, never-mind all the potential builders outside the NFT bubble that we are missing out on because it‚Äôs too esoteric to dive in to. In reality, almost no one gets what we‚Äôre doing, and it‚Äôs impossible for them to have a vision for Nouns.

The hurdle to understand what Nouns is and how to interact with the community is absurdly high for someone not native to our ecosystem.

It‚Äôs imperative that there‚Äôs quality consumable content out there that helps people **not only understand what Nouns is doing but be inspired to join in**. What we need is social media channels (eg. YouTube and Instagram) that have a significant catalogue of content you can just sit and consume. 

* We are going to try to answer questions that are not easily answered today like:
	* **‚ÄúSo what does nouns actually do and stand for?"**
		* This is a branding exercise, this is key for our work to answer.
	* **‚ÄúWhat is Nouns actually to me?‚Äù**
		* The answer is not NFTs, or a DAO (that is just infrastructure), it's an open source brand that you can be funded to build on (or build on permissionlessly). It‚Äôs an energised and broad community. It‚Äôs a movement. We need to demonstrate this through our videos.
	* **‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs a nounish concept / proposal?‚Äù**
		* Current way to understand this: read hundreds of proposals on nouns.wtf/vote, tally their results, investigate if they were ‚Äúsuccessful‚Äù or not, if the dao likes them, analyse all this data‚Ä¶ etc. What if instead they could watch a handful of nounish videos that show the things we‚Äôre proud of?
	* **‚ÄúHow do I get funded?‚Äù**
		* Videos about this will be hugely valuable, currently it takes a lot of effort to understand this. Our top priority here is to make a few videos focused exclusively on getting funded via Prop House and then other videos about the other ways as a whole, and individual videos on specifics (on chain, nsfw etc.)
	* **‚ÄúCan it be any cultural domain?‚Äù**
		* Here are some screenshots from version 1 of our intro. We will continue to experiment and iterate with ways to tell this story all the time. This is hugely important to be understood if we want to experiment in every vertical.

![](https://i.imgur.com/xeVv9Yh.jpg)

# One-Click Bots for the Nouns Ecosystem

**TL;DR** Enable any Nouns-derivative to launch customizable bots in minutes, with no code.

---

**How is this different from existing bots?**
No coding required! Fully customizable bots capable of sharing full spectrum of DAO's activity - New Proposals, Votes, Auctions, Secondary Sales, Listings, Collection Analytics etc.

**Who is this for?**
Any existing or future Nounish projects. 


---
Our Twitter and Discord bot would share ALL Nouns contract events, including proposals, auctions, votes, sales, and more. And with a simplified UI, any Nounish project can launch a customized bot in minutes in three easy steps:

1. **Connect the bot's social account to BotFrens**
2. **Specify Nounish contract address**
3. **Select behaviors the bot will perform**

We know that this sounds too simple, but we have the experience and tech chops to make it happen! We even built a prototype to illustrate how this will work: **YouTube Demo [https://youtu.be/2hjr5YcPGQg](https://youtu.be/2hjr5YcPGQg)**

![](https://i.imgur.com/JkpVeLM.png)


This is [Andrei](https://twitter.com/andreitr) and [Cody](https://twitter.com/itscodybraun) and we are the founders of [BotFrens](https://botfrens.com). Over the last year we launched bots for a number of NOUNISH projects, NFT Marketplaces, hundreds of individual creators, and we are excited to build something powerful for the Nouns ecosystem ‚åê‚ó®-‚ó®

---
**Simplified Technical Overview**
BotFrens listens to events emitted from a Nounish contract, saves and aggregates emitted data, applies user-defined templates, and shares content to a specified social channel.

![](https://i.imgur.com/V4UwIn9.png)


---

**Bot Behaviors and Events**
‚úÖ Behaviors already working on [BotFrens](https://botfrens.com)

10-8 weeks after funding:
* NFT Behaviors: **2 weeks**

* Discord Integration: **2 weeks**

# Noundry Community Compensation

This proposal aims to retroactively compensate the Noundry community for their part in making Season 0 a success. Total ask of 25 eth.

We believe the community is largely to thank for making Noundry into something more than a mere contest. Instead, the Noundry evolved into a collaborative experience ‚Äî a festival ‚Äî where artists from around the world came together to inspire and build upon each other's ideas, using Nouns pixel art as a canvas to unite around.

The artwork we eventually added to the Nouns Descriptor contract resulted from a group effort and would not have been the same without the participation of the larger community.

With this proposal, we want to acknowledge that the collaborative, explorative side of the Noundry is as vital as the outcome and hope to set an example for upcoming Noundrys.

## Compensation

### Community compensation

We think community compensation is best left to the community to decide. The alternatives would be equal distribution to all participants or attempting the almost impossible task of centrally deciding who had a meaningful impact on the Noundry. None of these options feel exciting or in the spirit of the Noundry.

To manage this, we're using [Coordinape](https://coordinape.com/), a community compensation platform, and want to allocate a pool of 24 eth for the Noundry season 0 community to split up amongst themselves.
 

**Coordinape rules**
- Participants eligible to vote: [https://hackmd.io/@krel/noundry-coordinape](https://hackmd.io/@krel/noundry-coordinape)
- Each participant receives three votes
- Participants allocate votes based on who they think had the largest positive impact on their own experience
- Participants cannot vote for themselves
- Participants cannot vote for artists with winning traits in Noundry Season 0
    - Facu, Gremplin, Goldy, Modrovsky, LuckyCryptoCats, Fuyu, Nountris

**Total: 24 eth**

### Summary
- Coordinape round: 24 eth
- Administration (run by maty): 1 eth
- **Total compensation: 25 eth**

### Transactions
-  1 eth to maty
    -  0x3E3928d651b431608F81Dd1129a56344d6A256EC
-  24 eth to Gnosis Safe with 3/5 signers
    -  0x8a4eb8f3383909a8138101F6E17cd8281a26eA3a

# Noundry Winners & Committee Compensation

**This proposal aims to retroactively compensate winning artists and the curation committee of the first Noundry. Total ask of 142.69 eth.**

We believe that Noundry compensation is more than a box-ticking exercise. Pixel art is part of who we are; it's in our bones, and adding new pixels to the Descriptor contract is a big deal. It's an opportunity to celebrate nounishness, reinforce our culture, and create new traditions.

We want the Noundry to become a continuous event, a new tradition, and a significant driver of Nouns proliferation within artistic circles. In that light, the compensation outlined in this proposal is not just about the work that was completed, but also about future signaling.

We think one of the most exciting possible outcomes of the Noundry would be if every artist in the world aspires to put their artwork into the Nouns contract (and by extension, the public domain). And while high compensation may not be the primary motivator, it can help initiate the right feedback loop and create the breeding ground needed for future Noundrys to thrive.

## Compensation

### Winner compensation
*[https://nouns.wtf/vote/125](https://nouns.wtf/vote/125) (Integrate 8/8 Anniversary Art)*

Noundry Season 0 winners are compensated per winning trait. Artists with multiple winning submissions are rewarded for each submission.

Noun Head traits are more generously compensated as they are the most visually striking, tend to create the most excitement within the community, and are responsible for driving much of the Twitter discourse and enthusiasm around the Noundry.

- **Head trait winners**
    - Facu x 3 (Snowman, Vending Machine, Wine Barrel)
    - Gremplin x 2 (Capybara, Treasure Chest)
    - LuckyCryptoCats x 1 (Hanger)
    - Goldy x 1 (Couch)
    - Modrovsky x 1 (Index Card)
- **Accessory trait winners**
    - Fuyu x 2 (Uroko, Tatewaku)
    - JMA Nountris x 1 (Grease)

*Note: Gremplin declined compensation for the two glasses traits added in the upgrade, arguing that there should be a minimum degree of effort required for compensation.*

**Winning traits compensation**
- Heads: 15 eth / trait
    - (8 x 15 = 120 eth)
- Accessories: 4 eth / trait
    - (3 x 4 = 12 eth)
- **Total: 132 eth**

### Curation committee compensation
The curation committee played a crucial role in making Noundry Season 0 a success. They are compensated for organizing the event, curating, and fine-tuning the winning contributions. 

It's hard to put a figure value on the committee's efforts ‚Äî in many ways it's priceless. We propose compensating the committee with a symbolic sum of 10.69 eth to distribute as they see fit.

- Committee members for Season 0:
    - Goldy
    - Gremplin
    - 4156
    - 9999
    - Solimander
- **Total: 10.69 eth**

### Summary
- Winner compensation: 132 eth
- Committee: 10.69 eth
- **Total compensation: 142.69 eth**

# Agora continuation
*Note: for full discussion of the prop on discourse, please see this [link](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/proposal-agora-continuation/2478).*

## TL;DR

We‚Äôd like to seek funding for a quarter (3 months) to keep developing [Agora](https://www.nounsagora.com/) in order to improve the governance efficacy of Nouns through delegation.

## Progress so far

We got [funded on August 31](https://prop.house/proposal/1023) via Prop House mandates to build an MVP. In less than one month, we‚Äôve built a delegate platform for voters to broadcast what they want to see, and for builders to find voters who might support their prop. To illustrate the outcome with some numbers, so far we‚Äôve seen:

* 17 statements from delegates representing 125 nouns (>25% of all votes!)
* 16 statements from builders who are seeking delegation
* 5 nouns delegated via Agora (that we know of)
* Proposal passed to [deploy a beta](https://lil-nouns-agora-dev.act.workers.dev/) on lil nouns

In sum, Agora has created a hub that turned delegation from an invisible, behind the scenes activity, to something the community can see, participate in, discuss, and improve upon.

## What‚Äôs next?

Our goal has always been to greatly improve the effectiveness of the Nouns DAO. We recognize that while the DAO lives and dies by the quality of its decision making, the time demand of being a good voter is such that we cannot expect most token holders to participate to the degree required. Therefore focusing on driving delegation of votes into the hands of qualified and engaged delegates is the highest leverage activity we can invest in ‚Äì especially given that constant issuance means that delegation and governance engagement is naturally trending downwards.

Although creating a client like Agora to reduce friction and provide transparency is a necessary first step, we don‚Äôt think that alone will be enough to drive meaningful delegation. That‚Äôs why the next phase of Agora will not only continue to improve the delegation client, but also deliberately invest in programs and mechanisms that can greatly increase delegation and participation. We outline below the key areas we‚Äôll focus on in the next phase of Agora.

## Focus areas

**Incentivize effective governance:** We believe there‚Äôs tremendous potential in creating incentives to reward effective governance, but also recognize the pitfalls of designing poor mechanisms. As such, we will be running a series of small scale incentive programs over the next months, with the goal of finding the best one to turn into a mechanism we can invest in for the long run. Below are some examples of incentive designs.

If we are successful, this is what things would look like in a quarter:

* A full fledged Agora app that is a more powerful version of Tally & nouns.wtf when it comes to voting and delegating.
* Strong conviction around the most effective mechanism to incentivize voter turnout

## Funding request

210 ETH to the team

20 ETH to incentivize voter participation

Total ask 255 ETH (of which 20 will be given back to community via participation incentives)

# heyanoun - pseudonymous messages about props

*thanks to Will Price for the delegated noun allowing us to make this proposal*

### tl;dr

A way for snapshotted nouners at a given proposal to pseudonymously submit messages about the proposal.

### proposal

We believe that Nouns DAO is where the most interesting public DAO conversation is happening today. 

Sometimes, not every opinion held is voiced though. In the past month of participating more in the DAO (noun 416), we‚Äôve observed situations where privately held opinions don‚Äôt make it to the public discourse because they‚Äôre somewhat controversial. We believe that this is dangerous for governance. Unspoken and unresolved opinions can fester into resentment and political turmoil over time.

With this in mind, we‚Äôre building heyanoun, a way for nouners snapshotted by a proposal to comment on that proposal pseudonymously. 

![heyanoun mock](https://i.ibb.co/3BkBdHw/Untitled.png)

Nouners post a message on the heyanoun site, along with a zero-knowledge proof showing that they are in the snapshot to the relevant prop:

Messages will then be passed on to a designated channel (initially could just be the funded prop‚Äôs channel) in the nouns discord server:

![discord mock](https://i.ibb.co/9n3zpPW/Untitled-1.png)

All proofs will be hosted on IPFS and messages will have a link from which a user on discord can verify the proof‚Äôs veracity themselves.

We believe that this product, while simple, can surface unspoken opinions to the nouns public square and could be a huge boon to governance.

### about us

Personae Labs is a new R&D lab out of [0xPARC](https://0xparc.org/) investigating how new cryptography like ZK-SNARKs changes the way we communicate online. 

Read our manifesto [here](https://www.notion.so/Personae-Labs-d46a90c64953416eb386a0ae2ee7679b) or watch this recent announcement talk from one of our founders [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lpb1RkUoWEw).

We‚Äôve built (to our knowledge) the earliest Eth-based pseudonymous social apps like [https://www.heyanon.xyz/](https://www.heyanon.xyz/) and [https://www.cabal.xyz/](https://www.cabal.xyz/) and are committed to furthering the technical and product frontiers here. 

Find us at 

- [https://twitter.com/personae_labs](https://twitter.com/personae_labs)
- personaelabs.eth
- noun 416

### compensation

We foresee this project taking ~1.5mo. of dedicated effort by a team of:

- 2 engineers
- 1 designer
- 1 PM

Components to be delivered:

1. website for submitting message + ZKPs for all proposals
2. all relevant zkp circuits
3. discord bot for posting messages
4. website for verifying proofs of messages (from bot)

Given a rate of 10 ETH/mo for each contributor, we‚Äôre requesting **60 ETH total** for delivery of this first app.  

### future work

We hope this app is the first of many experiments around pseudonymity within Nouns DAO.

If this first iteration sees traction, we see a number of further extensions:

- extend the number of places that messages are published, i.e. to a dedicated twitter account as well as discord
- plugins/react components to integrate pseudonymous badges/proving into other governance clients (i.e. agora, discourse killer)
- additional pseudonymous nouner groups, i.e. groups based on voting history (I voted in 10 of last 15 proposals)

# Nouns DAO V2 Upgrade

## Summary

This proposal updates the Nouns DAO logic contract to a new version, with the following improvements and additions:

1. **Dynamic Quorum**: In V1, quorum is a fixed percentage of total supply. In V2, quorum has a dynamic range, rising as a function of against votes up to a defined cap. Read [this post](https://mirror.xyz/0x10072dfc23771101dC042fD0014f263316a6E400/96zSoFfiT_RM2o2P9UbVKxPzVpB_trZqUjzllBE00BE) for more info.
2. **Vote with Gas Refund**: Allow Nouners/delegates to vote and receive a gas refund. The vote still takes place in the case of insufficient ETH to refund.
3. **Voting Delay Editing Bug Fix**: In V1, editing voting delay was unsafe. V2 makes it safe to edit anytime. More info on the bug [here](https://github.com/nounsDAO/nouns-diligence/blob/main/reports/proposal-58.md#major).
4. **Cancel Proposal Bug Fix**: The DAO has a spam mitigation feature, allowing anyone to cancel a proposal if the proposer has an amount of votes less than or equal to proposal threshold. In V1, this feature didn't work when proposer had exactly proposal threshold votes; in V2 it works as expected.
5. **Vetoer Change Is Now 2-step**: We received audit feedback that V1's vetoer change process was risky as a single-step process. In V2, the risk of setting a wrong vetoer is mitigated using a 2-step process where the current vetoer sets a pending new vetoer. Once set, the pending vetoer must accept for the change to take place.

## Audit

1. The code has gone through internal reviews and a [code4rena audit](https://code4rena.com/reports/2022-08-nounsdao/).
2. **No high-risk issues were found in V2**.
3. **Unrelated to this proposal**, one high-risk issue was found. See [this audit summary on discourse](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/nouns-dao-v2-audit-summary/2525) for more information.


## Dynamic Quorum Parameters

As articulated in this [detailed post](https://mirror.xyz/0x10072dfc23771101dC042fD0014f263316a6E400/96zSoFfiT_RM2o2P9UbVKxPzVpB_trZqUjzllBE00BE), three parameters need to be set for dynamic quorum. This proposal sets their values, and we‚Äôre offering the thinking behind them here:

1. **Minimum quorum %**: keeping it at 10%, the same as today‚Äôs quorum.
2. **Maximum quorum %**: setting it to 15%, taking into account recent participation levels around 30%, allowing proposals with more than 15% For votes to be decided by simple majority; the intent is for this value to provide extra protection from voter apathy, while allowing most all proposals to be decided by simple majority rather than quorum.
3. **Coefficient**: setting it to 1, such that each against vote raises the quorum requirement by one vote, until the maximum quorum is reached.

These parameters can be edited at any time via a proposal; treat these values as the first experiment.

## Vote with Gas Refund

A bit more on how this feature works:

1. Governance clients (like nouns.wtf/vote) need to update their code to support it.
2. Refunds are subject to certain constraints:
    1. Gas base fee is capped at 200 gwei.
    2. Gas priority fee is capped at 2 gwei.
    3. Total gas is capped at 200K, supporting voting reason text up to roughly 9,190 characters.
    4. If the contract‚Äôs balance is insufficient, voter will receive a partial refund.
3. This feature requires the DAO to maintain the DAO contract‚Äôs ETH balance, which should be done via periodic ETH transfer proposals from the treasury to the DAO contract (this proposal performs the first funding).
4. The DAO can choose to withdraw refund ETH back into the treasury at any time via a proposal.


## Proposal Transactions for Humans

1. `_setImplementation`: upgrades DAO logic to V2.
2. `_setDynamicQuorumParams`: sets dynamic quorum params to:
    1. Minimum quorum BPs: 10% (1000 basis points).
    2. Maximum quorum BPs: 15% (1500 basis points).
    3. Coefficient: 1 (1,000,000 in unsigned integer with 6 decimal places).
3. `transfer`: funding vote refunds with 12 ETH, which should be enough for just over 100 proposals at today's participation rate (excluding honk‚Äôs tendency to paste long paragraphs).

As always, please reach out in the¬†[#54-tech-grants](https://discord.com/channels/849745721544146955/981584123225321503)¬†channel in Discord with any questions ‚åê‚ó®-‚ó®.

# NSFW compensation

Being part of NSFW is a lot of work and currently not being fairly distributed. 

To help fix this, I propose the DAO compensates the current members to incentivise/ensure their participation on NSFW.

Therefore, I suggest an 8 ETH compensation for each member per month. The proposal shall run for 3 months on an experimental base to see if we as a DAO manage to incentivise people enough to stay on NSFW and share the burden of responsibility. 

If effective, we can then continue to pay those active members until the current funding runs out. 

Current active members are:
- Noun 12 (multi-sig)
- Noun 16 (multi-sig)
- Noun 22 (multi-sig)*
- skilift (multi-sig)
- Jarmen
- maty
- Oni
- Sam Ellis
- wiz
- eoj
*Noun 22 is excluded from the calculation, as he is currently compensated for his involvement with NSFW.

For any member that won‚Äôt be actively participating in these three months the DAO would terminate the payment for this individual and would expect them to be removed or replaced.

I would expect once everyone is onboarded that each member has a function and a role within NSFW. If members can‚Äôt participate, they are urged to remove themselves and return the funds to the treasury.

Total ask 216 ETH.

I suggest to send send the ETH to the NSFW multi-sig, from where it will get distributed to the individual contributors on a monthly base.

# Agora Continuation [revised]
*This is a revised version of the Agora continuation prop based on community feedback. We've clarified our deliverables, increased transparency, reduced the ask by 20%, and implemented a payment stream*

## TL;DR
We‚Äôd like to seek funding to keep developing [Agora](https://www.nounsagora.com/) in order to improve the governance efficacy of Nouns through delegation. Our goal is to significantly increase the participation rate of nouns through a combination of software improvements, and delegation drive programs over the next quarter.

## Progress so far
We got [funded](https://prop.house/proposal/1023) on August 31 via Prop House mandates to build an MVP. In less than one month, we‚Äôve built a delegate platform for voters to broadcast what they want to see, and for builders to find voters who might support their proposal. To illustrate the outcome with some numbers, so far we‚Äôve seen:

* 19 statements from delegates representing 127 nouns (>25% of all votes!)
* 25 statements from builders who are seeking delegation
* 5 nouns delegated via Agora (that we know of)
* Hosted a delegate race to ‚Äúauction‚Äù 3 more votes to delegates
* Proposal passed to deploy on lil nouns, as well as inbound interest from many other DAOs

In sum, Agora has created a hub that turned delegation from an invisible, behind the scenes activity, to something the community can see, participate in, discuss, and improve upon.

## Roadmap & Goals
Now that we‚Äôve landed an MVP of a delegate platform, it‚Äôs time to start leveraging it to meaningfully drive delegation & governance participation. We expect to complete these goals and achieve their resulting outcome in roughly one quarter. Note that all points here consist of our best plan of attack today, but as we continue to build Agora, we expect the roadmap to naturally evolve as we double down on what‚Äôs working, and deprioritize what‚Äôs not.

**Goal 1: Dramatically reduce friction to delegation:**
* Integrate with nouns.wtf to propose ‚Äúpost-win‚Äù delegate suggestions
* Enable direct delegation on Agora (where today we borrow the nouns.wtf flow)
* Enable time-bound, fractional, and supercedable delegation by a proxy contract to unblock funds & whales who are currently unwilling to delegate
* Productize delegate race so that Nouners who don‚Äôt want to pick a delegate can let the community pick for them

**Goal 2: Make governance and delegation more transparent and easy to understand**
* Continue investing in surfacing more delegate and voting data on Agora
* Build a governance activity feed that highlights delegation, ownership change, voting, and other governance related activities.
* Make other general improvements to Agora to make it a first class experience for governance participants

**Goal 3: Activate nouns holders to either vote or delegate**
* Direct outreach to inactive Nouners from Agora team to find them a suitable delegate
* Implement an inactive nouner bounty program, highlighting and incentivizing the community to reach out to inactive holders.
* Run a marketplace experiment to allow anyone to rent votes from Nouns holders
* Run a direct reward (in both ETH and NFT prizes) experiment to directly incentivize voting

**Target objectives in 3 months:**
* 75% of new nouns are delegated to voters who vote on more than 50% of props they're eligible to
* 50% participation in a rolling average of past 3 proposals

## Transparency & decentralization
As a governance platform, we will take measures to maintain transparency and avoid centralization of power by taking the following measures: 
* Make Github repo public within 1 month (with proper documentation to come over time)
* Publish all data monthly to public google sheets, or equivalent (such as API or onchain mirror)
* Current Agora team members added together will commit to not represent more than 5% of nouns.

## Team
Yitong ‚Äì Project lead & designer: co-founder of Vector DAO, and previously design + product at Coinbase. Prop builder for #87, contributor to Nouns Vision, delegate.

0xcaff ‚Äì Engineer: Built the v1 of Agora, previously engineer at Coinbase.

Tom Taubkin ‚Äì Protocol Engineer: Contributor to several defi projects, previously engineer at Coinbase

Mrtn ‚Äì Ops / Community: Delegate from nounlets, funded via Prop House as governance historian, deployed Agora on lil nouns, previously pm on nouns.builder, and pm at Google.

## Funding request & terms
**Funding request:**

We‚Äôd like to request $221,000 to fund the team for a quarter (170ETH @ $1300/ETH, a 20% decrease from previous ask) and 20 ETH to incentivize voter participation.

**Fund transfer mechanics**

50% of the team portion & the participation incentive will be immediately deposited to the team‚Äôs wallet

50% of the team portion will be streamed over a period of three months from a 3/5 multisig held by trusted members of the community. Signers for this safe will be: Elad, Krel, Yitong, Seneca, and one more to be confirmed.

As of this writing, $221,000 is 170 ETH. In order to account for ETH volatility, we will request a 30 ETH buffer. Upon fund release, $221,000 worth of ETH will be sold, with half deposited to the Agora multisig, and half deposited to the stream multisig. The remaining ETH will be sent back to the treasury.

## Appendix: some illustrative mocks
These are purely concepts to illustrate some of the areas we‚Äôre going to invest in. We‚Äôll need to iterate on these designs a lot before implementing them, so please take them as general directions vs exact specs.

# CDT Work Continuation

Hey all, my name is Christian. Working on Nouns full-time has been an amazing opportunity. I'd like to continue my work for the next 6 months as well. It's been an incredible learning experience, and I love building projects that serve the DAO and bring joy to the Nouns community.

### **Overview of what I‚Äôve done the last 6 months:**
## **[PROP HOUSE](https://prop.house/)**
I spent most of my time working on the **complete site redesign**. Besides making it more aesthetically pleasing, and cleaning up the codebase (removing unused code as we prepared to open-source it), I worked on new features to **increase the overall user experience** including:
**-** New homepage with statistics
**-** Dynamic social sharing cards
**-** House & Round pages
**-** Voting progress bar
**-** User proposal progress card
**-** Japanese translations

# The Nouns AI Pod

## DESCRIPTION:

The AI generated scripted, voiced over, and visuals created PROMO video for the pod :)

[The AI pod promo Video!!](https://youtu.be/b5Ojfo6gVcU)

### **TL;DR:**

Following the initial AI residency, we wish to create The Nouns AI Pod.

This prop is to fund 3 months of focus on continuing the research of our resident AI researchers:

1. Further empowering Roko to be an AI secretary/assistant for the DAO! Helping information flow better with summaries, transcripts, reviews, answering questions and more. 
2. Generating Nounish rich media (images, gifs, videos) and making the tools to generate such media accessible to the community at large to unleash their creativity
3. Empowering other pods (e.g. ai-based team drafting for e-sports, planning events for otg)

With each of these being built with monetization / expansion to other organizations in mind.

---

### WELL HOW DID THE INITIAL RESEARCH GO?

You can see the initial small grant proposal here [https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/small-grants-the-nouns-ecosystem-and-ai/1929](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/small-grants-the-nouns-ecosystem-and-ai/1929)  and Honk's extension post here [https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/nouns-ai-honk-residency-extension/2357](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/nouns-ai-honk-residency-extension/2357)

![https://imgur.com/JPkgn07](https://imgur.com/JPkgn07.png)

[https://staging.roko.dev/](https://staging.roko.dev/) Is a live website where the team is experimenting and adding features with the goal of building a production ready webapp.

We initially set out to accomplish two sprints, the first to be able to break down proposals into understandable summaries / reviews. The second was more focused on demonstrating some of the possibilities of AI and what it could bring to Nouns.

I am happy to report that, thanks to an engaged community and support from key contributors Honk and Evets.eth we blew that goal out of the water.

Together, we:

- Held weekly sessions on Tuesdays which about 30 people regularly attended that shared developments with the project as well as educating them on fundamentals as well as cutting edge developments in machine learning
- Built a pipeline that can breakdown proposals into reviews automatically as they as proposed on-chain (and post them to Twitter!!)
- Built pipeline to turn recorded calls into text using SOTA voice to text then using a large language model to convert them into a bulleted summary

![https://imgur.com/voyrcfZ](https://imgur.com/voyrcfZ.png)

- Built a web interface that enables participants to easily consume summarized proposal content as well as edit them to better reflect their opinions
    - [https://staging.roko.dev/](https://staging.roko.dev/)
- Tested the ability to finetune our model using user generated content as guidance
- Setup a backend infrastructure setup to support the ongoing development and improvement of the web interface
- In addition, due to popular demand we began diving deep into AI generated media, we were able to generate images and video content (reactive to sound!) that features custom content (Noggles!)

![https://imgur.com/hCb6gWe](https://imgur.com/hCb6gWe.png)

![https://imgur.com/J1KHLy6](https://imgur.com/J1KHLy6.png)

![https://imgur.com/gKTir4X](https://imgur.com/gKTir4X.png)

![https://imgur.com/Vd9t0po](https://imgur.com/Vd9t0po.png)

[The AI pod promo Video!!](https://youtu.be/b5Ojfo6gVcU)

---

### NEXT STEPS: THE AI POD

The proposed AI Pod will have 3 main focuses:

1. Continue Bringing Roko to life in the form of an AI Assistant to DAO members:
- All Nouners and teams of funded props should have access to Roko's summarization capabilities for their related audio or text content (as long as they provide feedback on their results!!)
- Work towards improving Roko‚Äôs corpus of data (e.g. Discourse posts, Discord messages) and learn how to incorporate these into a model to improve Roko‚Äôs Nounish knowledge base.
- Roko's website could also be updated to include a search page where people could semantically search across that knowledge base whether it is just meeting / proposal content or if Discord / Discourse content was included.
2. Explore AI Generated Media
- Implement and host SOTA open source image generation models customized to be able to generate Noggles on powerful GPU servers so any DAO member can access it. 
- Implement cutting edge developments as they are released (e.g. text to video, img to img, text to 3d, etc.), share our knowledge with the community, and incentivize their use!
3. Community Engagement, Marketing, and Outreach (Competitions!!)
- Put together competitions (with prizes!!) alongside groups like NoC to show off the best showcases of AI generated media leveraging Nouns AI tooling.
- Assist various pods and DAO members with content generation - we've already had suggestions from helping visualize proposals to making and AI content generated coffee book and I know the community will have plenty more great ideas!!
- Potential prop house round for utilizing the tooling?
- Seek out partnerships with these opensource or other organizations to see if they would be interested in collaborating to try and further proliferate the brand!
    - I‚Äôd LOVE to see us partner with some musicians to work with them to make them free music videos they could post that have Noun glasses in them or have a live show with AI generated visuals featuring Noggles

---

### THE FUTURE OF AI POD:

Hopefully, during these three months, we will be able to not only share significant advancements in AI with the community, but also have a plan for how to take the next steps to grow the AI Pod further.
We want to be able to show a path where this could become a self-sustaining effort that could grow and expand to other organizations, opening up a pipeline for monetization.
We believe that this is a great opportunity to only grow and expand the Nouns ecosystem but give everyone who is a part of it superpowers that help proliferating the meme!!

---

### TEAM:

- The Hero Shep (Background in AI/Education/Product Management)
- Honk Diddly (Wizard [elite full stack developer])
- Evets.ETH (Wizard [full stack developer])

- 10% for all related infra (5k/mo)
- 30% for The Hero Shep (20k per month)
- 25% for Honk (15k per month)
- 15% for Evets.ETH (10k per month)

**SUMMARY**

After the success and funding of Nouns News Seasons 1-3, we have expanded our team and efforts to reach a wider audience.

Our strategy is focused on **Top of Funnel marketing** tactics, to capture as many eyes as possible with content that is entertaining, educational, and engaging.

**Objectives**

1. Drive awareness and favorability of Nouns DAO as an innovative leader in the web3 space.
2. Engage audiences outside of mainstream Web3 with Nouns brand.

**TikTok** is the platform for **virality**. Trending content on TikTok has the ability to inspire people to take action and learn more about Nouns. We will be focusing on staying on top of the trends and tying it into Nouns DAO and Nouns projects. 

We have a 1M views goal we are trying to reach, but the opportunity goes beyond the metrics. # Set proposal threshold

Currently we have a threshold in place which requires 2 nouns to put a proposal on chain. The intention of the threshold is to reduce spam. For the current size of nounsDAO it is not necessary. This is a built-in threshold which can be adjusted at any time with a proposal.

**Proposal to change the threshold from 2 nouns to 1 noun for putting a proposal on chain.**
This would allow any address with a minimum of¬†**1 NOUN**¬†to formally propose to the DAO, until the Noun supply reaches¬†**1000**. After that the threshold will be set to 2 again.

This is an updated version of [Prop 134](https://nouns.wtf/vote/134).

# Set Voting Period to 5 days

As the number of nouners and nouns sub-communities increase, we will see more proposals appear on-chain without prior off-chain coordination. This is a proposal to increase the 'Voting Period' (from the current 3 days) to 5 days, so that nouners have more time to diligence proposals and to decide how they will vote.

The 'Voting Delay' is currently 2 days and is not changed by this proposal. If this proposal passes, it will take ~1 week between proposal submission and the conclusion of voting.

# Set Voting Period to 5 days and Voting Delay to 2 days

As the number of nouners and nouns sub-communities increase, we will see more proposals appear on-chain without prior off-chain coordination. 

This is a proposal to: 
- set 'Voting Delay' to be 2 days. This is a minor change that accounts for block times changing to 12 seconds after the merge.
- set 'Voting Period' to 5 days, so that nouners have more time to diligence proposals and to decide how they will vote.

# Nouns Fair @ ETHSanFrancisco

## TD;DR
NounsDAOAmigos was invited by ETHGlobal to make the third edition of the Nouns Fair at ETHSanFrancisco this Nov 4-6, 2022. We are asking for 23.25 ETH.

## Context
We are NounsDAO Amigos. We are building a Spanish-speakers community for LatAm and beyond. We‚Äôve been proliferating the ‚åê‚ó®-‚ó® adding some spice and a pinch of √ës.

We recently hosted the second edition of the Nouns Fair. An¬†IRL fun experience aimed to proliferate Nouns at the ETHBogota hackathon. We‚Äôve confirmed the importance of this kind of event that helps increase awareness of the DAO, onboard potential builders, and put noggles in the eyes of hundreds.

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qe1R5WFT9_E](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qe1R5WFT9_E)

More detailed info can be found here - [https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/nsfw-nouns-fair-ethbogota/2326](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/nsfw-nouns-fair-ethbogota/2326) & [https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/nsfw-nouns-fair-ethbogota/2326/7?u=mono](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/nsfw-nouns-fair-ethbogota/2326/7?u=mono)

## Nouns Fair @ETHSanFrancisco
Given the success of the Nouns Fair in Colombia, **the ETHGlobal team invited NounsDAOAmigos to make a new edition, this time at ETHSanFrancisco!** We believe it‚Äôs important to keep having a presence at IRL events like this. As we saw in Mexico and Colombia, this is a great environment for spreading the ‚åê‚ó®-‚ó® and growing our Spanish-speaker community.

**Goals**
- Make a new amigo, San Francisco
- Onboard potential contributors
- Put Nouns in the eyes of hundreds of builders

**Details**

Place:¬†San Francisco, California
Venue:¬†Palace of Fine Arts
Dates: November 4 - 6, 2022
Team: NounsDAOAmigos

The Nouns Fair will be a 3-day cultural experience focused on builders where they will be able to engage with others and learn about Nouns. This activation will be a localized nounish experience with photo opportunities, games, merchandise, and an NFT gallery. The proliferation of culture √° la nounish. The following are examples of what happened in Bogot√° and what we‚Äôll create for San Francisco with a different flavor:

**Photo-opportunity & noggles**
A fully Nouns-branded photo station where attendees can take selfies and full-body photos will serve as a welcoming station. We want to create a photo set where people can feel nounish and share it on the internet. Of course, physical noggles are key.
![](https://i.imgur.com/XGMsKWG.jpg)
![](https://i.imgur.com/i9Ww7cU.jpg)
![](https://i.imgur.com/W9LifGd.jpg)



**Games**
Two different games will be available at the place: **foosball**, and **a traditional local game**. We believe these games have a nounish feeling and will serve as an engagement factor.
![](https://i.imgur.com/14ONVu1.jpg)



**Merchandise**
Pins, stickers, and T-shirts will be distributed as rewards for spending time and engaging with the Nouns Fair by playing games and taking photos.
![](https://i.imgur.com/TEqCnbF.jpg)
![](https://i.imgur.com/exzjPyD.jpg)



**NFT gallery**
A 5 screens NFT gallery representing local artists and some nounish representatives.
![](https://i.imgur.com/SvvfxNS.jpg)
![](https://i.imgur.com/iCu328D.jpg)


**Costs and execution**
Given our past experiences and the recent Nouns Fairs at ETHMexico and ETHBogota, we came up with this budget to make it suitable for ETHSanFrancisco in the US. **We are asking for 23.25 ETH**.
![](https://i.imgur.com/XSlixrD.png)


Costs are approximate. ETH avg. price of 1,200 USD. Prices in red are not final and we'll seek to reduce costs as much as possible. The difference in these prices will be returned to the DAO.

We are excited about this new opportunity to keep creating nounish experiences IRL that can be replicated in other countries. But most of all, to spread the ‚åê‚ó®-‚ó® in a fun way!

**Transactions**
Due to the time sensitive nature of this proposal, NSFW has already funded NounsDAOAmigos to execute on this project.  The 23.25 ETH transaction in this proposal will go to refund NSFW.

# NFT Fest Australia

![](https://i.imgur.com/BDhKUAS.jpg)

**Requesting 22 ETH** for [Nouns DAO'n Under](https://twitter.com/nounsau) to facilitate an IRL activation as the official "optical sponsor" of [NFT Fest Australia](https://nftfest.com.au/) in Melbourne from 23-24 November 2022.

Following the continued success of [Nouns Fair](https://nouns.wtf/vote/162), the opportunity has arisen for Nouns to make a lasting impression at Australia's biggest NFT event, right when our local industry is popping off.

This proposal is brought to you by Aussie proliferatooooors: [Gami](https://twitter.com/0xigami), [Benbodhi](https://twitter.com/benbodhi), [Jarmen](https://twitter.com/jarmen43), [Mr Boney](https://twitter.com/theboneys), [ThaSwami](https://twitter.com/tha_swami) and [LilPurpBerry](https://twitter.com/lilpurpberry).

## TL;DR

**Showcase Nouns to Aussies** from iconic Melbourne, our cultural mecca for sports, music and the visual arts:

1. **Dioramic POAP powered photo booth** activation so everyone can help us proliferate Nouns to 5,000+ attendees and potential DAO members
2. **Live nounish panel discussion** alongside Kevin Rose, J1mmy, Zeneca, Cooper Turley, Anthony Sassano, Matty (DCLBlogger), Betty (Deadfellaz) and Kieran Warwick (Illuvium) [as announced here](https://twitter.com/NFTFestAus/status/1585080621843746817)
3. **Noggles worn by event staff** with Nouns as the official "optical sponsor," defining our own category inclusive of Gold sponsorship benefits
4. **Street poster campaign** with 200 x A0 colour printed posters targeting the St Kilda area for the leadup and duration of the event

Despite many Aussie nouners and builders, awareness of Nouns in Australia is surprisingly low. But our local industry is booming and we're a home to many Web3 builders, crypto investors and influential Ethereum personalities.

*Global NFT adoption ([finder.com](https://www.finder.com.au/nft-statistics)):*

![](https://i.imgur.com/x3EJ0vs.png)

[Gnars DAO](https://gnars.com) will also be representing Nouns through Silver sponsorship and a screening of [our nounish film](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JQSmfSnRGVk). This engagement has already led to media partnership discussions with [ONE37pm](https://www.one37pm.com/) (Vayner Media) -- feature coverage coming soon!

## NFT Fest Australia

[NFT Fest](https://nftfest.com.au/) has attracted 5,000+ attendees across streaming platforms in previous events and will be running this November's event for over 1,000+ IRL attendees whilst making all content available for free a few weeks following the event. 

![](https://i.imgur.com/Bj9rOqu.jpg)

NFT Fest 2022 will include the who's who of Aussie Web3 as well as representation from all the major Aussie sports leagues and teams, business involvement from Salesforce, KPMG, Deloitte, EY and media publications such as The Chainsaw, ONE37pm, Australian Financial Review and Ticker News.

### Dioramic POAP powered photo booth

Nouns-branded photo station tailored to Australian taste referencing culturally popular memes. Taking inspiration from the Nouns DAOmigos and their incredible success at ETH conferences:

![](https://i.imgur.com/5j9biPW.jpg)

Nounish stage props and noggles will be made accessible for attendees to share the joy of Nouns across social media. Expect it to be a "bloody nounish shindig with all ya mates" ‚Äì an invitation to join [Nouns DAO'n Under](https://twitter.com/nounsau).

### Live nounish panel discussion

Leaning on a previous [nounish panel discussion during NFT London](https://nftlondon.sessionize.com/session/382247), we will focus on explaining what it means to be nounish, through the lens of building atop Nouns DAO and highlighting case studies such as Gnars. 

![](https://i.imgur.com/wgYSrFJ.jpg)

The goal of such an approach is to inspire others to come and build on Nouns while showing future nouners the potential unlocked by joining the DAO. Our own launch of Nouns DAO'n Under also serves as a [Nouns Builder](https://nouns.build) case study. 

### Noggles worn by event staff

Our iconic noggles are wildly underutilised, especially in the context of collaborative branding and marketing opportunities. We are paving the way and defining our own category as the official "optical sponsor." 

![](https://i.imgur.com/tb9UvSm.jpg)

Additional to Gold Sponsorship benefits:

* Panel speaking opportunity 
* Branding on homepage
* Branding across social collateral 
* VIP access to all events
* Speaker concierge service

* Branding on NFT Fest '22 banners

* Bespoke collateral

NFT Fest's organisers and event staff have proudly agreed to wear noggles to show their appreciation, make the event unforgettably nounish and of course, have fun!

### Street poster campaign

To raise awareness in the leadup to and during NFT Fest, we will print and distribute 200 x A0 sized street posters in key locations around St Kilda.

![](https://i.imgur.com/iUV8NCU.jpg)

Mr Boney has run similar campaigns in Melbourne to great effect. Prior to rebranding Douns to Nouns DAO'n Under, he received funding from Nouncil to run a tracked experiment and we're able to leverage the relationships built.

# Nouns x Never Sit Still

![](https://i.imgur.com/tiKHExD.png)

## TL;DR

- Create a visually rich, enticing hype video to be a catalyst for the gravitational pull of people into the Nouniverse.
- Sitting above the funnel in the attention marketplace, this hype video will differentiate its positioning from existing Nouns productions, such as [Prop 113](https://nouns.wtf/vote/113), and will compliment these videos by enticing people to WANT to watch more about Nouns.
- Made by a talented team of creatives from Never Sit Still with experience working with some of the biggest web3 brands.
- Perfect to use for openers in digital, trailers, conferences, and meetings, along with use in traditional advertising placements and overall attention attraction.
- Proposal artwork is indicative only, subject to change with further development.
- All CC0 assets.

## Description

Fund NeverSitStill to create a highly crafted, animated 30-60 second brand film. Seeking to catch fresh eyes and celebrate the strides made so far, the future potential and why it‚Äôs such an exciting time to get involved in the Nouns project.

See more here: [Full video](https://create.zora.co/collections/0xdcbca59d38eb3abfcb5055fe7bd7f5ce027d03c3) | [Artist BTS & NY billboard footage](https://twitter.com/SeaksMr/status/1553862678795661312)

![](https://i.imgur.com/8ja4qFe.png)

## Proposal

### What will we make for you?

A 30-60 second, crafted hype video that represents Nouns in an exciting way. Exploring Nounish themes through visual metaphor, celebrating the culture with existing users, and onboarding the new.

Think of it as an above-the-funnel video encapsulating the key themes of Nouns in a punchy, artistic, and fresh video to make people go WTF is Nouns?

The look and tone of the piece will be designed to capture attention, potentially becoming an ownable style for future Nouns advertising and messaging material. 

It's a catalyst video to start the gravitational pull that is Nouns.

### What is the video going to be about?

The video will represent strong themes that Nouns focuses on through visual metaphor:

- Use case of NFTs for raising funds for positive change
- Evolution and growth of Nouns
- DAOs/community
- Bootstrapping/launchpad
- Interaction of Nouns and IRL, bringing the power of crypto to IRL

With these ideas at the core, we spin them into a powerful narrative that follows the birth of the Noggles and its exponential growth to become an object of power, one for positive change in the world.

To represent the multi-faceted nature of the Nouniverse, we intend to use a mixed-media approach, with input from various artists within our team. Distinct flavours coming together to create one visual style in a seamless video.

We feel this approach also carries the spirit of the Nouns DAO. A diverse pool of people building something great together.

![](https://i.imgur.com/A0oZVgy.jpg)

### The Nouniverse & Big Bang

In the beginning, at the centre of it all is the Noggle. The Noggle atom, molecule, cell, animal, vegetable, mineral. We want to place the Noggle at the centre of this big bang and follow the narrative of it's growing impact on the universe.

This rippling wave will take effect on the world around it, transforming and creating. What does the world look like through a Nounish lens?

### Why hype video?

The current state of our fast-paced digital world needs information to be condensed into a highly digestible format to relay anything valuable.

[Prop 143](https://nouns.wtf/vote/143) spoke to the fantastic concept of the video marketing funnel. To borrow a term from the Nounish team, we want to talk to the top of the funnel and go even more front-facing, above the funnel. This is why it‚Äôs important to create a first point of contact with broader audiences that inspires them to care about what they‚Äôre seeing. We want to ignite a spark within viewers to seek out and learn more about Nouns of their own volition.

A hype video executes this perfectly. A short, visually rich video, presented in an artistic, eye-catching way, that grabs people's attention and hooks them in, down the Nouns rabbit hole.

### Do traditional hype videos work in web3?

It‚Äôs well known that video is a perfect medium to promote and create awareness of a brand/product. Hype videos are a tool used by luxury brands within web2 and we want to bring these tried and tested methods to web3 and Nouns.

Take the promo video for [Doodles v2](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sv9TaQ5z9jw), or the [Otherside](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qt1equGhkQE) Yuga Labs video. These are both great examples of highly crafted, short animated hype videos to blow up awareness of a brand/product to funnel new audiences into web3 and their brand.

These videos aren't about explaining how, but what and why.

![](https://i.imgur.com/IbzEFzH.gif)

### Video Lifespan

A hype video has a long shelf life and is easy to re-use. Whenever you need promotional content, take an already existing hype video and place it at the front of marketing to interest viewers.

Combine the re-usability of a hype video with assets that are CC0 and you have a piece of art that can be re-used, re-jigged, and a video that can live on for a long time.

Render characters, assets, scenes, and the entire video as CC0 for all to share and spread Nouns proliferation.

### Meta

Air-drop current Noun owners their very own piece of this hype video in the form of NFTs created from scenes of the entire piece. This will create a collection of different NFTs from the entire video.

Owners could even trade/swap/collect these separate NFTs to piece together the sequence and receive a rare airdrop of the entire video minted as an NFT. This is a way to celebrate the creation of the work, and reward holders who were already a part of the ecosystem when it happened.

POAPs for voters. Incentive to vote, a reward for being involved in bringing this project of Nouns proliferation to life.

## Process

![](https://i.imgur.com/pjCL5wT.png)

### Process

We use a traditional linear pipeline for development, from concept through to mastering. This stepped approach allows us to spend an appropriate amount of time in each phase, delivering top notch work in an efficient timeline. At each major milestone, our clients give condensed feedback to ensure that the work is communicating its message clearly.

To ensure the work is original and ownable, we use a period of time for high level research and development. This means we aren't aiming to re-create a reference, but build something new and ownable for the Nouns DAO.

### Pre production

- R&D (Community liaisons to guide content)
- Concept art, thumbnails
- Design, visual language development
- Storyboarding
- Animatic

### Production

- Animation
- Music development
- NFT + POAP creation

### Post-Production

- Compositing, Grading
- Sound design
- Mastering

### Deliverables

- Brand hype video (Widescreen 16:9, 4K, 30fps) [archival master + web ready]
- Working files
- NFT ready exports (TBD with community)
- POAP artwork (TBD with community)

### Production Schedule

Pre production to begin before EOY if approved.

Full production starting no later than January 8th, taking approximately 10-12 weeks to complete the final piece.

### Communications

Regular updates and WIP process interaction with the Nouns community is important. We want to build in public and share progress openly. Our team is comfortable with Discord and presentation, major milestones will be submitted for the community to feedback as well as enjoy the process.

# NounsOTG x Stoopid Buddy x Rose Parade

**What do 2 on-chain Props, 1 fifty-foot float made of flowers, and 6 life-sized Nouns have in common?**



They will all be in one place to ring in the New Year for the largest nounish proliferation event ever! [NounsOTG](https://nouns.wtf/vote/110) is partnering with the team at [Stoopid Buddy Studios](https://nouns.wtf/vote/73) for the [Rose Parade](https://tournamentofroses.com/) in Pasadena, CA after New Year's Day, to help Nouns reach an audience of over 38 Million individuals nationwide.

![](https://i.imgur.com/HOT1b1T.jpg)


What will this collaboration look like? NounsOTG will be working directly with the team at Stoopid Buddy in person on the ground for 10 days during this event. The Stoopid Buddy team has covered all build and production costs for the float during this event in [Proposal 73](https://nouns.wtf/vote/73). After multiple conversations discussing how this event could be further bolstered, Aubtoshi and NounsOTG have been asked to be a part of this event. NounsOTG plans on adding to the already-established effort that Prop 73 has put forth in the following ways:

**10 Days of On The Ground Activations + Brand Ambassadors**

After Christmas, all of the floats for the parade (which are being framed out and built off-site) are transported to their final location prior to the parade, which is where thousands of volunteers come to help decorate the floats with flowers. This time period will include full days of OTG (On The Ground) interviews, filming, activations with volunteers, activations with people who are waiting for the event to begin, and more. We will also be filming with the life-sized nounish ‚Äúwalk-arounds‚Äù (nouns costumes made by Stoopid Buddy, creators of costumes seen on the celebrity singing show ‚ÄúThe Masked Singer‚Äù) during this time. Post-event, the floats will be staged in a different holding area to be observed and photographed one last time.

![](https://i.imgur.com/5jlT56O.jpg)
*Nounish "Walk-Arounds" by SB*


Additionally, NounsOTG will scout and hire 10 trained brand ambassadors that will be active the day before the parade, during the parade and afterwards, and at the Rose Bowl when handing out the mini limited edition footballs. The responsibilities of these ambassadors will include being on-brand, walking (waving, jumping, dancing) in a 5-mile parade line. We have allowed for the cost of their food and beverages during specific meal times, transportation to and from the event from the staging area, additional hours on the day prior during the final prep; as well as team meetings, zoom calls and fittings prior to the event, as we plan to deck them out in Nouns Brand and other nounish swag.

![](https://i.imgur.com/sbu1t1L.png)

**Special Guest DJ + Custom DJ Set On The Float + Over 18,000 Nounish Giveaways**

The DJ will be none other than **Richerd Intern**, and his crew will perform with a full/unique set during the live event! Although the parade float images are still not public or released, I can reveal that there will indeed be room for Richerd... 

His team is London based and the cost comes directly from their team and includes their travel and accommodation. We couldn't be more nounish with the Noun266 (Chart Bars Noun head) if we tried!

![](https://i.imgur.com/JiJ5BwX.png)

Over the course of 10 days, we will be handing out over 18,000 unique nounish items, including limited edition mini footballs and shirts, low-fi paper noggles, sticker packs and nouns temporary tattoos. Our goal is to get these items national television coverage during both the parade and rose bowl game. Noggles on the faces in the audience and children throwing nounish mini footballs would be a lasting image during this important holiday event. This opportunity has allowed OTG to connect to other nounish builders and we are open to further collaborations with Nouners and builders.

![](https://i.imgur.com/jp42GOh.jpg)


**Immediate Impact**

If you are unfamiliar with the Rose Parade or its impact, it is one of the major events of the year as the 5 mile parade ends with the start of the Rose Bowl football game. Outside of the 37 million viewers at home, the entire area of Southern California is focused on this event for several weeks prior!

Over **1 Million people** will be in attendance on the day of the parade with a live broadcast to over 37 Million additional individuals nationwide. With a 5 mile parade line and an entire week of content creation and nounish item giveaways prior to the parade as the float is brought to completion, this will be one of the key proliferation event opportunities of the year for NounsDAO. Not to mention the day after the event sees 60-100k attendees that visit the floats to get a close up look at all the details - another amazing activation opportunity.

# Nouns Builder Protocol

# Nouns Builder Protocol
### Public Infrastructure brought to you by Zora and NounsDAO

![](https://i.imgur.com/JycpSjR.png)

**Mainnet Launch:** November 1st
**Expected DAO Launch:** November 15th
**Website:** [nouns.build](https://nouns.build)
**Twitter:** [@nounsbuilder](http://twitter.com/nounsbuilder)

Like you, we believe that Nouns DAO is a significant form factor innovation for NFTs and DAOs. Instead of giving all power and capital solely to a project‚Äôs founders, the Nouns model enables communities to emerge progressively, and to be active participants in how their brand and community evolves.

We believe that more Nouns forks should exist - so we‚Äôre building a tool anyone can use to build them.

For the past couple of months we have been working on the Nouns Builder: a product that makes it easy for anyone to create their own Nouns DAO with any art, any auction cadence and flexible DAOs that can evolve over time.

As we‚Äôve been building this tool, we‚Äôve increasingly realized that it makes sense to use this very tool to create a DAO that will govern, sustain and develop the Nouns Builder project itself. By doing so, Nouns builder can:
* Demonstrate the utility of Nouns Builder as a public good
* Utilize the ecosystem of tools in Nouns: Prop House, Agora
* Experiment using the NounsDAO model as an alternative to the subDAO multisig
* Experiment using the NounsDAO model to proliferate a protocol and products
* Expand use of the NounsDAO model as a more effective governance model for collective decision making
* Share governance of this DAO with Nouns, Zora, and future contributors as interested in expanding the horizon of this public infrastructure as we are. 

We are going to call this DAO ‚ÄúBuilder‚Äù, with its own art and NFT that will be minted each day. Builder will be NounsDAO from day 1, with the goal of proliferating this infrastructure.

**Core details to note:**

* Based on extensive feedback from the Nouns community, the protocol is entirely free. There is currently no protocol wide fee.
* DAOs can opt in to gift a certain amount of their NFTs to Nouns or any other DAO or platform
* In prior versions of the proposal, we proposed that NounsDAO would be the deployer of the Builder DAO. Based on feedback from the community we have removed this aspect of the proposal.
* The protocol development has been extensive, with careful consideration made to
    * Enable DAOs to easily upgrade and evolve themselves over time in a safe manner
    * Be gas efficient
    * Open up room for exploration around new distribution types like VRGDAs
* The protocol has been audited via Code4rena, with Zora paying $129K USDC ($90k in prizes) to complete it.
* We have built an easy to use tool at [nouns.build](https://nouns.build) where over 60 testnet DAOs have been created in the process of testing and refining the user experience.

**Ask:**

1000 ETH contribution to seed the Nouns Builder DAO treasury to help this public good reach its full potential. 


**Completed Work:**

Rather than requesting retroactive reward for development, ***we are asking NounsDAO to pay it forward* by seeding the Builder treasury with ETH** for funding the development of the Nouns Builder protocol as a public good and expansion of the ecosystem by the community. 

Zora contributed ~4 months of development time on creating the Nouns Builder protocol
* Full time contributions from the Zora solidity, backend, and front end engineering teams
* Full time design and creative direction for Nouns Builder artworks.
* ~100 ETH spent on the Code4rena audit.

This contribution to the Nouns Builder DAO treasury means there is sufficient Day 1 capital to immediately conduct prop house mandates and funding rounds for the development, proliferation, and accessibility of the protocol and ecosystem for the benefit of the public.

**Deliverables:**
* Audited Nouns Builder smart contracts.
* Custom Nouns Builder generative artwork (CC0).
* Builder DAO for anyone in the community to join and contribute.

**All of the ETH will be going to the Nouns Builder DAO treasury.**

**Builder DAO:**

The Builder DAO is created using the Nouns Builder tool and protocol. It is the entity onchain that will be responsible for funding the proliferation of the ecosystem and development of the protocol over time. 

We believe Nouns Builder represents critical public infrastructure for community decision making, and we want to use the full power of the NounsDAO model to further this protocol and ecosystem of different apps built on top of it, as well as being able to natively tap into tools in the ecosystem like Prop House and Agora.

BuilderDAO creators will receive the following governance rights in the Builder DAO for a period of 5 years after Builder DAO‚Äôs launch to allow the creators to support of the growth and development of this public good while in its nascency:
* 1/10 to zora.eth
* 1/20 to nouns.eth

For clarity, DAO members shall not receive any revenues from Builder DAO daily auctions. All funds in the Treasury shall be dedicated to improving the Builder DAO protocol and its public good function, and growing the community, brand, and ecosystem. 

The Builder DAO will start with a daily auction. The NFTs that will be minted each day are a nounish artwork that expands on the ideas of ‚ÄúInternet flags‚Äù, a collection of unicode symbols that communities can organize around, with the nounish colors at its core, as well as the noggles.

Here is a sample of the codex below:
![](https://i.imgur.com/kArgmJn.png)


**NounsDAOs for Public Infrastructure:**

We believe it is important to experiment with Nouns forks as a way to further particular pieces of infrastructure within the nounish ecosystem. Instead of funded LLCs and companies to ultimately manage tools like Nouns Builder and things like Prop House, we want to actively explore using a Nounish DAO as the primary entity to further a public protocol and an ecosystem of many platforms built on top of it. 

This is why we are leading from the front with the Builder DAO. We are also optimistic that this can become a blueprint for any team that is developing protocols‚Äîlike Zora itself. 

**Sustainability:**

In prior proposals there have been open questions around the future models for sustainability without need for persistent funding from NounsDAO all the time. We believe that this is the first meaningful step in this direction, and we hope to set a precedent and blueprint for future teams to build sustainable Public Infrastructure that is native to the Nouns ecosystem and DAO itself.

**Transaction Details:**

1000 ETH transferred to an escrow smart contract that will hold the funds until the Builder DAO is live and operational. We are expecting this to be live on approximately November 15th.

**References:**
[Discourse post](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/proposal-nouns-builder-draft/2007)
[Prop house](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/prop-house-protocol-public-infrastructure-by-nouns-dao/1594)
