## **VALUE PROPOSITION**

The Snap filters I created previously were used by the Dota2 Esport team (See [Grand Finals livestream](https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1312698913)), the Noun Square team (see [PropHouse winners interview](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dOP8N49QBTc)), Nounish videos (currently in production) and can be seen in some on-chain proposals and memes across Twitter and Discord. 

There is an increasing demand for Nounish content creation tools, and I often get the question: **"Wen my Noun in AR?".**

We are in the media propagation phase of Nouns, and with the expectation of AR-VR glasses becoming a main computational platform in the near future, Nouns should be AR-ready.

I propose to craft an initial set of 50 heads as expressive Augmented Reality filters, with responsive eyes, mouth, and eyebrows motion, as well as fun animations, depending on each Noun (e.g. a dripping brush, a fin flapping shark etc).

These filters will be simultaneously published on Snapchat, Instagram, and TikTok.

Nouns AR filters can be used for :
* Nounish Videos / interviews / social reels
* Live streaming / podcasts
* Undoxxed video calls
* Memes and GIFs. See my Tenor page https://tenor.com/users/coralorca
* Side proliferation on large social networks with common keywords. Get traffic by appearing on top of the "Retainer" and "Fire Hydrant" search engine for billions of users.

## **SCOPE: TIKTOK + INSTAGRAM + SNAP**

I initially received funding from NSFW to create the AR glasses on Snapchat, then won two Prophouse rounds ([round 5](https://prop.house/nouns/round-5/498) and [round 7](https://prop.house/nouns/round-7/860)) which funded 8 additional filters bringing the total on Snapchat to 13.

The frog head has been ported to TikTok and Instagram as a feasibility test.


For this proposal I will create:

## **PROCESS**

![](https://imgur.com/dsON2XB.jpeg)

###### Consistency across the different authoring software: Snap‚Äôs *Lens Studio*, Meta‚Äôs *SparkAR*, and TikTok‚Äôs *Effect House*.

I have been optimizing this pipeline for some time, and each trait needs custom animations depending on its shape. The geometry has to be considered individually, and some traits are more challenging than others. This is a similar process to what I went through when translating all 2D Nouns to 3D voxels with 3Dnouns.com. You can speed up the pipeline with work habits and experience, but each head requires specific attention to craft the Nounish details that make the difference.

## **PORTING MODELS TO INSTAGRAM AND TIKTOK**
I will import the 50 models to Meta‚Äôs and TikTok‚Äôs AR authoring software (respectively *SparkAR* and *Effect House*) to publish them to Instagram, Messenger, Facebook, and TikTok and reach a wider audience. 
Regarding the workflow, the 3D assets will be re-used, however, they still need to be imported, positioned, scaled, lit and the animation triggers need to be configured on an individual basis and depending on each software capabilities. 
From a technical standpoint Snap Lens Studio > SparkAR > TikTok Effect house. My goal is to make each Noun head as consistent as technically possible across all different platforms. See Frog head above.

## **COMPENSATION**
For the Prophouse winning rounds, I suggested 4 filters for 2 ETH, when ETH was around 1800-2000 USD. The market price for such 3D AR lenses sits between 1500-5000 USD per filter. 
For reference, [this MAYC filter I created](https://www.instagram.com/ar/1025321405001469/) was commissioned by LollaPalooza for Snapchat and IG and was around 5k USD - It is a little more complex with many eyes and snot coming out of the nose.

With ETH currently around 1200 USD, I adjusted the price to 3 filters for 2 ETH, around 800 USD.

- Setting up the geometry and creating the expressions system for each of the 37 heads in Blender.
**(37/3) * 2 = 24.7**

- Porting the geometry to TikTok, Instagram, Snapchat, setting up the animation triggers and publishing to these platform with consistent tagging and video previews.
I am estimating this work at 0.18 ETH per filter for a total of 137 filters.
**(50 on TikTok + 50 on Instagram + 37 on Snapchat) * 0.18 = 24.7**

This brings the total ask at **49.4 ETH** with an average price of 0.36 ETH per filter.

# Prop House Mainnet

[![](https://i.imgur.com/zcJlAJu.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iJsYV5eDEX8)

*(üëÜ click on video for a Nouns Prop House teaser)*

---

***tl;dr:**
We‚Äôve reached the one year mark since the inception of the idea for Prop House! Over that time period, Prop House has become a core piece of infrastructure for the development of the Nouns ecosystem ‚Äì onboarding a sizable percentage of the most impactful builders while spreading the Nouns meme far and wide. We are requesting 570 ETH to continue to fund development of Prop House over the next 6 months (Jan ‚Äò23 - Jun ‚Äò23).*

---

***State of the Prop House(s):**
On Dec 1st, 2022, Seneca hosted an open call to update the community on what we‚Äôve been up to since the [proposal #105](https://nouns.wtf/vote/105). You can view the [slides](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1TbJsbXWCPxbMyE25Xr_kfQjJJYMtGw0HEYuLrtdkndI/edit?usp=sharing) and recording of the talk [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qD9v1ihIRmw).*

## Onboarding builders
The most important outcome of Prop House for Nouns has been its ability to onboard a large percentage of the most impactful builders in the ecosystem. **More than funding, the core feature of Prop House is about activating builders**. Whether it be for folks who had never heard of Nouns before or those who were just hanging around, Prop House was the mechanism that took them from inactive to building within the ecosystem.

Given Nouns is about bottom-up brand building as opposed to top-down centralized direction, we hope that Prop House can continue to serve as a tool to execute on that Nouns vision. Below is a list of some of the builders who‚Äôve been activated by Prop House:

![](https://i.imgur.com/2ZeeWk9.png)

## Where we are today by the numbers
Our last proposal ([#105](https://nouns.wtf/vote/105)) passed on July 18, 2022. Since then, we‚Äôve made substantial progress on all core Prop House KPIs:

![](https://i.imgur.com/JtrkRUm.png)

All our charts are seeing sustained month-over-month growth despite market downturns:

## Spreading the Nouns meme
Over the past 5 months we‚Äôve onboarded several communities, most notably [Meebits](https://prop.house/meebits) via [Ape Coin DAO funding](https://forum.apecoin.com/t/aip-110-meebits-prophouse-sponsored-by-apecoin/8219). By doing so, Prop House has spread the Nouns meme far beyond our immediate community. In tandem with Prop House growth comes furthering the reach of the Nouns meme along with what Nouns stands for: building.

![](https://i.imgur.com/nTQsPIo.jpg)

## Product
The Prop House team has been busy working on the core product ([prop.house](https://prop.house)). A brief summary of what we‚Äôve done follows:

- Contracted one the best designers in the space (0xHab from Rainbow)
- Revamped UI across the entire app
- Implemented multi-round houses
- Upgraded voting UX
- Open sourced the [repository](https://github.com/Prop-House/prop-house-monorepo/).
- Released a [GraphQL interface](https://prod.backend.prop.house/graphql) for Prop House data which lead to projects like [NounsAtlas](https://nounsatlas.com), [Voters.wtf](https://voters.wtf) and [Nounish.cv](https://nounish.netlify.app/)

## Protocol
We‚Äôve also made strides in the development of the Prop House protocol.

The protocol leverages both Ethereum and Starknet in an effort to provide the best possible user experience. This dual-chain architecture enables Prop House users to propose and vote by signing a message, while decentralizing the entire funding flow.

We use Ethereum as the operations and execution layer, where houses are managed and payouts are made, while Starknet handles all user actions that occur within a funding round.

All of the code is publicly available today in the [Prop House repository](https://github.com/Prop-House/prop-house-monorepo/tree/protocol).

Below are some of the core pieces of infrastructure we‚Äôve developed to support the protocol, where we are currently, and what to expect as we near mainnet launch:

- The [protocol](https://github.com/Prop-House/prop-house-monorepo/tree/protocol/packages/prop-house-contracts) itself, which has been deployed to Goerli.
- The [Prop House SDK](https://github.com/Prop-House/prop-house-monorepo/tree/protocol/packages/prop-house-sdk), which simplifies interaction with the protocol (L1 & L2).
- The Starknet Relayer, which is responsible for submitting signed proposals and votes to Starknet on behalf of users.
- Ethereum & Starknet subgraphs, which are currently in development.
- Current blockers:
    - [Cairo V1 Migration](https://medium.com/starkware/open-sourcing-cairo-1-0-b3100a664bb0)
    - [Support for V1 on StarkNet](https://medium.com/starkware/starknet-regenesis-the-plan-bd0219843ef4) (expected Q1 ‚Äò23)
    - Protocol audits (pending testing on testnet)

Assuming no major hiccups, we aim to deploy the protocol to mainnet before the end of Q1 2023.

## Financials
*The Prop House financials doc is publicly available [here](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1iKGgedZmAzMNCFkd2PqjBd-ZgutrOjuYqfirDG1wS3g/edit?usp=sharing)*

Over the course of one year and three proposals ([#23](https://nouns.wtf/vote/23), [#62](https://nouns.wtf/vote/62), [#105](https://nouns.wtf/vote/105)), Nouns DAO has funded the Prop House team 555 ETH for deploying towards Nouns builders and 695 ETH for development and operating expenses.

![](https://i.imgur.com/oxC4c8l.png)

*Note: current burn rate for Nouns funding rounds is low (~20-30 ETH / mo). If at any point the DAO chooses to have another party deploy Nouns House Funding, we will return all remaining funds to the DAO.*

## What‚Äôs next?
### Protocol launch
We are aiming for a mainnet launch by the end of Q1 2023. What follows is the timeline we are executing against to get to launch:

- Migrate to Cairo V1
- Complete Goerli testing
- Finalize Prop House SDK & Starknet Relayer
- Launch subgraphs for Ethereum & Starknet
- Developer documentation
- Protocol audit

### Product development
Alongside the transition to the protocol as the data layer, we will continue to develop the UX of app:
- Core UX: better proposing, discovery and voting user experiences.
- The launch of house and round managers such that anyone can create a house, deposit funds and initiate funding rounds.
- Implementation for infinite rounds for grant pods to run their entire operation via Prop House.
- Develop social features for communities. 

## Sustainability
There are several avenues to explore on how to make Prop House sustainable. For the time being, we are continuing to pursue funding by Nouns DAO as we believe it to be a positive sum engagement. Below we dive into potential avenues:

### Nouns DAO funded (current)
To date, Nouns DAO has funded development costs of Prop House over the past ~12 months (695 ETH). For the current model to continue to work, Nouners would have to agree that the value created for Nouns by Prop House is higher than that of the development costs. In this framing, Nouns DAO is a patron to Prop house where its ROI is the onboarding of high impact builders, the attention generated by Prop House as public infrastructure by Nouns DAO and it being infrastructure for Nouns to run on.

### Fees for usage
The true and tried approach is turning on fees at the client and/or protocol. This approach would require a substantial increase in volume (to the order of about 50-100x) to maintain current burn rates. So while feasible, it is not a solution for the short term. 

### Experimental
**Nounish DAO**
In prop [#105](https://nouns.wtf/vote/105), we posed Prop House DAO as a plausible avenue to making Prop House sustainable. While it is still a potential route, there are concerns as to whether or not the DAO makes sense at all. At the core of it is whether the Nouns DAO format is appropriate for non-purely meme driven protocols. There‚Äôs also the question of whether every protocol needs a DAO and a corresponding governance token. So while the DAO is not out of the question, we believe that with experiments like [Nouns Builder](https://nouns.build/), the answer will become clearer over time. 
**Pure Meme NFTs**
There‚Äôs a case to be made where Prop House NFTs are minted to hold provenance value. This alone could capture long-term upside in the same way a visual artist and their collectors do.

# Nouns funding ZachXBT

**NOTE: This prop is a resubmit of prop 177 since it was cancelled in the "queued" stage due to [my error](https://twitter.com/noun40__/status/1600889013216235525). I had delegated my nouns to the houseofnouns team without knowing that until a prop reaches execution (even after voting passes) removing voting power from the proposer's address can mean that anyone can cancel the prop. Unfortunately it was cancelled as a result. My sincere apologies for the need to revote.**

------

[@ZachXBT](https://twitter.com/zachxbt) is a public good serving the crypto ecosystem through tireless research exposing [countless scams](https://investigations.notion.site/). Recent events have highlighted the dire need and importance of such work. This prop proposes to fund 100 ETH to their donation address: zachxbt.eth (address can be verified from their twitter profile).

Donations have always been somewhat controversial within Nouns governance. [Prop 21](https://nouns.wtf/vote/21) donating 169 ETH to Gitcoin grants was one of the most contentious votes in our early history. [Prop 108](https://nouns.wtf/vote/108) donating 500 ETH to Ethereum protocol development (via the Protocol Guild) was much more unanimous but still there was discomfort and discourse around whether the DAO was becoming "a tax inefficient way for DAO members to make donations."

I agree that we shouldn't resort to becoming a complacent vehicle of passive philanthropy. We should instead aim to actively contribute and be a net producer of public goods ourselves such that our meme (brand) can fully capture the provenance value (claim on originality of) the public work and thus leverage the virtuous cycle to do more than what capital alone could have done. However, there should be exceptions to this rule if there is an urgent and common public cause that warrants highlighting. I would like to suggest that this is such a case. Crypto needs more validators like ZachXBT.

With donations we need to be extra wary of conflicts of interest or self-dealing. Unfortunately there is no way to prove this cryptographically, but I attest that I have no prior (or planned future) relationship with ZachXBT and that today was the first time I contacted them (via twitter) to ask for their permission to make this proposal.

# Distributing Nouns Vision Noggles for Proliferation Purposes

Written by [Sasquatch](https://twitter.com/PartSasquatch), [Toady](https://nounsagora.com/delegate/toadyhawk.%E2%8C%90%E2%97%A8-%E2%97%A8), [Maty](https://nounsagora.com/delegate/maty.%E2%8C%90%E2%97%A8-%E2%97%A8), [Benbodhi](https://nounsagora.com/delegate/benbodhi.%E2%8C%90%E2%97%A8-%E2%97%A8) and [Gami](https://twitter.com/0xigami).
Special thanks to [9999](https://twitter.com/lastpunk9999) for helping by creating the [custom contract](https://etherscan.io/address/0x6ff4FF4Fe59D7EC571f36e36961B032027e68ceE#code).

## Intro:
[Prop 57](https://nouns.wtf/vote/57) funded the creation of 8,250 pairs of luxury sunglasses made by Nouns Vision.  Approximately 560 of those have been sold to individuals.*

As per the on-chain proposal, 500 tokens of Nouns Vision NFT's (each redeemable for an individual pair of physical glasses) were transferred to the Nouns DAO treasury. 

## Proposal: 

The authors of this proposal are asking the DAO, on behalf of the communities they represent (Nouns Esports, Gnars, The Noun Square), for an allocation of these sunglasses to be used to further proliferate Nouns DAO as well as help market and drive new buyers towards Nouns Vision.

By distributing these tokens across various sub-communities, we can further proliferate Nouns through physical interactions with the highest quality noggles available.

The undersigned sub-communities of Nouns DAO are asking for fifty Nouns Vision tokens each (150 total) from the Nouns treasury in order to continue their efforts of proliferation.

- [The Noun Square](https://twitter.com/thenounsquare)
    - Proposed use: Media appearances from hosts, and distribution via giveaways on Twitter and YouTube, including as prizes for a planned Nouns DAO Awards Show in December.
- [Nouns Esports](https://twitter.com/nounsesports)
    - Proposed use: Primarily the pairs will be kept on retainer and esports operators will coordinate with players to have them used in prominent competitive-gaming events or live-streaming opportunities. Additionally, a portion will be distributed as gaming competition prizes.
- [Gnars](https://twitter.com/gnars_dao)
    - Proposed use: Extreme athletes could wear these in social media posts, at IRL events, and in interviews. All of which have high potential for visibility, especially outside of the Nouns ecosystem.

Conversation towards this effort has already been taking place in the #57-sunglasses channel of the Nouns Discord server. For further context, see the initial post towards this idea [from Gami](https://discord.com/channels/849745721544146955/940715393901789336/1012904461380882503) and continued discussion [from Worthalter](https://discord.com/channels/849745721544146955/940715393901789336/1025188064877879316) who suggested distributing pairs from the treasury.


Additionally, our sub-communities would be interested in exploring Zora's functionality of a "[Finders Fee](https://support.zora.co/en/articles/5961853-how-to-set-a-finder-s-fee#:~:text=Sellers%20can%20set%20the%20Finder%27s,paid%20to%20the%20referrer%27s%20address)" to further incentivize the promotion of Nouns Vision, with the goal to aid in selling out the entire collection.

*(`*`) Even though the total number of mints is around 1800, this includes 500 for Nouns DAO, 500 presumably reserved for the special edition disco noggles, and 250 for the team.*

# House Of Nouns

![house of nouns (1).png](https://imgur.com/ZdV5hbZ.png)

[Click to watch trailer **‚åê‚ó®-‚ó®**](https://youtu.be/8YKFK_h4kQU)

# **TLDR**

We're requesting 340 ETH for 6 months to continue building [House of Nouns](https://twitter.com/houseofnouns), a supercharged platform + context layer for Nouns governance. We want to make governance participation fun. 

Our vision is to create a governance platform that is both delightful and easy to use, empowering voters to effectively govern NounsDAO. The client is being created on top of an upcoming open-source framework, built by nounish developers, for nounish developers.

# Current progress

We've had early success with [House of Nouns](https://houseofnouns.wtf/), with many Nouners and non-Nouners alike expressing their love of the intuitive interface. We want to continue building on this success and make it easier for people to participate in governance in an engaging way.

![Screen Shot 2022-12-07 at 9.40.34 PM.png](https://imgur.com/D7F1Q0a.png)

Not familiar with House of Nouns? You can discuss proposals with others, view important context, and vote all in one intuitive interface on [https://houseofnouns.wtf](https://houseofnouns.wtf). 

**Some data:** 

- MAUs - growing 100% month / month
    
    ![Screen Shot 2022-12-08 at 7.03.38 PM.png](https://imgur.com/aKCSwBO.png)
    
- Working with Nouns, Lil Nouns, and Gnars. In talks with many more communities.
    
    [https://houseoflilnouns.wtf](https://houseoflilnouns.wtf/proposals/69)
    
    [https://gnars.house](https://gnars.house) 
    
- ~13.5% registered-user market penetration
    - 170 registered users / 1263 total members in Nouns (delegates + Nouners + anyone who has voted or made a proposal on-chain or in Prop House)

# **Core vision and goals**

Our vision is to make it easier for voters to participate in Nouns governance by providing rich context, intuitive conversation tools, and seamless integrations with other Nounish platforms. This will be built on top of an open framework, empowering developers and solving impactful problems specific to nounish governance. 

In short:

- Provide all context on proposals, voters, builders, and team members, and view all conversations from Discord, Twitter, and Discourse in one place
- Build a custom forum client directly into HoN that is backwards compatible w/Discourse, allowing users to create and discuss proposal drafts and get early feedback
- Provide first-class support for Nouns forks and Prop House, and deeper integrations with Atlas, Federation and Agora
- Create the open source House of Nouns framework, serving core data displayed on the site through a GraphQL API, paired with a developer friendly SDK for building on top of House of Nouns infrastructure

## Product Breakdown

### **Context layer**

We will attach more information to proposals, such as FAQs, comments, relevant links, conversations from other platforms, video attachments, and more. We're currently working with @maty.eth on integrating data from [proposals.wtf](http://proposals.wtf). 

![Screen Shot 2022-12-09 at 1.20.48 PM.png](https://imgur.com/NWxsu7o.png)

We also will provide more context on Nouners, builders, and team members, such as their past proposals, voting record, and Agora profile, directly in HoN. 

![Screen Shot 2022-12-07 at 9.35.06 PM.png](https://imgur.com/b8zipr3.png)

After a proposal is executed, we will make it easy to see what has been delivered as a result.

### Forums + conversation stack

We're building an alternative forum client like Discourse that pulls data from Discourse, and integrates token signaling and Ethereum-based identities. This will be built into House of Nouns and will allow users to create and discuss proposal drafts, get early feedback, and graduate drafts to proposals. It will also provide context on builders and [members](https://collective.xyz/nouns/members), and allow token-based voting.

![Screen Shot 2022-12-09 at 1.19.55 PM.png](https://imgur.com/oXSPL8Y.png)

We also want to provide more intuitive ways to get early community consensus, such as upvote/idea boards. This will allow users to easily move from an idea to a draft proposal, get comments, and then move to an on-chain proposal with ongoing comments and voting.

### Integrations

Deeper integrations with other Nounish products like Nouns Atlas and Nouns Agora. 

View conversation from Discord, Twitter, Discourse etc. in-line on [houseofnouns.wtf](http://houseofnouns.wtf). 

First class support for Nouns forks, Prop House, Federation, and other governance sources

- one-click governance clients for Nouns forks
- vote on Prop House rounds directly in HoN with intuitive and easy UI
- Federation integration (ex: vote on HoN as a Gnars holder)

While we will make sure our infrastructure can support all Nounish communities, we will focus on solving problems specific to Nouns governance in the next 6 months. We believe this is where we can have the biggest impact.

## House of Nouns Framework

We are building an open source framework to give builders the tools they need to build custom governance and discussion experiences for their communities. We will build House of Nouns on top of this framework, in a similar vein to [Vercel](https://vercel.com/) being both a builder and end-user of NextJS. 

The main components of the framework are:

Open access to core data displayed on the site through a GraphQL API.

React [SDK](https://github.com/collectivexyz/sdk) for developing on top of House of Nouns infrastructure, including hooks to access data, pre-built components etc. 

## Differentiation

Agora approaches the problem of low governance participation from the delegation perspective. Don‚Äôt want to vote? Delegate to someone to do it for you. 

House of Nouns approaches it from the conversation and context-aggregation perspective.  Empowering Nouners to vote independently and be empowered to think for themselves. 

Both approaches are valid and necessary for the ecosystem to grow. We will be working closely with Agora to ensure we don‚Äôt build the same things and otherwise waste valuable energy. 

## Success Metrics

Our goal is to have 30% or more of the Nounish ecosystem using (voting/discussing/viewing) House of Nouns *every week*. Currently, about 14% are registered users. We believe that with further improvements to the proposal conversation stack and better user experience, we can reach this goal. 

Ultimately, our goal is to have the House of Nouns framework and SDK integrated into 10 or more clients by July 2023.

We will use these as the two primary metrics to evaluate our success in 6 months.

# **Transparency & decentralization**

As a governance platform, we want to avoid centralization of power by taking the following measures:

- Building the House of Nouns framework as an open source public good
    - Offer up all data through APIs and a developer friendly SDK
    - Transition discussion data to open data layers as soon as an attractive option has wide adoption / traction
    - Offer a React SDK for components and data fetching
- Current House of Nouns team members added together will commit to not represent more than 5% of NounsDAO.

Our goal is to open-source the core building blocks of governance and discussion, and provide killer developer tooling on top of the HoN rails so anyone can build custom experiences for their communities and subcultures. 

## Sustainability

We plan to generate revenue by offering bespoke upgrades to other DAOs similar to Red Hat, as well as charging hosting costs for larger communities. Our goal is for the HoN client to become self-sustainable within 12-16 months. These upgrades will be built into the broader platform and framework for all users. 

For the HoN framework, we‚Äôre exploring alternative public goods funding routes (Nouns model, Gitcoin etc.) so we can be empowered to continue building something maximally useful for the entire ecosystem. 

# ********Team********

We are a small startup [(collective.xyz)](https://twitter.com/collectivexyz) that has been building for Nouns and won the governance client mandate [round](https://prop.house/nouns/nouns-governance-clients) 3 months ago.

with support from [rocketman](https://twitter.com/rocketman_w) and [jac](https://github.com/jac18281828)

# Funding Request

We compare closely to other proposals, like [Agora‚Äôs 3-month proposal](https://houseofnouns.xyz/proposals/154) (170 ETH for a team of 4 for 3 months (14 ETH per mo./ person), or Nouns AI Pod (12.75 ETH per mo./ person). 

We request 340 ETH in USDC to fund development of House of Nouns framework & client over the next 6 months (Jan ‚Äò23 - Jun ‚Äò23).

‚Ä¢ 330 ETH: 4+ engineers (13.75 ETH per mo./ person)

‚Ä¢ 10 ETH: funding for Prop House round(s) to build out alternative clients and views into governance+discussion on top of the HoN framework.

# Nouns CC0 Animation Generator & Interactive App

![](https://i.imgur.com/iFxuOIn.gif)![](https://i.imgur.com/KG0Tk59.gif)![](https://i.imgur.com/TZkJ9bL.gif)

## TL;DR

We‚Äôre aiming to bring Nouns to life by animating all Nouns assets as public goods for cc0 use. We'll build tools for users to generate & access their own animations quickly and easily for use in any project. There's 20 unique and thoughtfully crafted animations to choose from with over 467,000,000 possible animation outcomes.

* Through a front-end app, anyone can enter a Noun ID or mix and match traits to create their own custom Noun and export animations on the spot.
* Developers will be able to programmatically access any of these animations instantly and seamlessly through an API and/or a URL.
* Interact with your Noun (including custom ones) through an interactive app on a daily basis with actions like eating, sleeping, playing, and more! The status of each Noun will change throughout the day and you can tend to it accordingly to keep it alive, happy, and healthy.

## Introduction & Background
---
Hello Everyone,

I'm Jeff (aka heyjeff.eth, jefe) and I‚Äôve been developing an app over the past year that aims to engage NFT collectors by bringing their NFTs to life. Quick backstory:

The concept was inspired by the popular Japanese phenomenon ‚ÄòTamagotchi‚Äô released in the late 90‚Äôs. Each handheld device contains a virtual friend the user must tend to in order to keep it alive, happy, and healthy. Interestingly enough, it‚Äôs a style of game that you don‚Äôt necessarily ‚Äòbeat‚Äô or ‚Äòwin‚Äô. It‚Äôs more of an experience of having a buddy that you can play with, care for, and watch grow throughout it‚Äôs lifespan, forever.

I thought it‚Äôd be fun if people could do the same with their NFTs, so I decided to build a prototype. At first it started out as just a silly napkin sketch, but now we‚Äôre proud to say we‚Äôve recently finished adding support for all 6,969 CrypToadz, each with 11 unique animations totaling over 75,000 files! *(That‚Äôs 7.6 GB of raw toad data)*. For those who own a CrypToad, you can check out the app [here](https://tinycitizen.xyz).

Here‚Äôs some footage:
[![CrypToadz Gameplay](https://i.imgur.com/KHs4MZi.png)](https://vimeo.com/780511900)


## Motivation and Goals
---
What we‚Äôre aiming to do is leverage the tech we‚Äôve developed for CrypToadz and adapt it to build tools so that anyone can generate, access, and download Nounish animations on demand for cc0 use.

To do this, we‚Äôll develop an easy-to-use Build-a-Noun app through which anyone can choose a pre-existing Noun or build their own by mixing and matching traits at will or at random. Users will be able to preview animations on the fly and then instantly download any or all of the animations they like, with the option of exporting the individual animation frames as well. The app is future-proofed too, so every Noun that is born each day will be readily accessible.

Not only that, but any animation for any Noun configuration can be easily accessible via a back-end API and/or a URL for developers to use in their web apps instantly and seamlessly.

As an added bonus, anyone can immediately interact and play with their Noun or custom Noun through our other interactive app we‚Äôve already built!

Ultimately, the goal of all of this is to empower people to actively use Nouns in engaging, refreshing, and easy ways to help spread the meme.

## Build-A-Noun App, prototype & poc
(early prototype shown, does not represent final product)
[![Build-A-Noun Prototype](https://i.imgur.com/Viv5UfU.jpg)](https://vimeo.com/777492078)

The 20 total actions and states are: idle (breathing/blinking), happy/loved, laughing, talking, dancing/head bob, eating: pizza, mushroom, veggies, fruit, hamburger, playing a gameboy, sad/crying, drinking: coffee, water, tea, health/mana potion, tired, sick, and sleeping.

The above is an early prototype solely to convey the concept of the Build-A-Noun app. The final product will have a redesigned and intuitive interface, with way more options and functionality, such as:
* Select transparent or any background color (hex or rbg input)
* Quick select any existing Noun ID config
* Searchable traits by ID or name
* Randomize traits button
* Flip the animation (left-facing vs right-facing)
* Change output animation speed
* Apply an rbg tint to the animation
* Apply a black and white filter to the animation
* Resize animation to specific dimensions
* Export all individual frames for a given animation
* Pick and choose which animations to export
* Add text overlays
* Share-to-Twitter button to quickly tweet your creations 

Flipped![](https://i.imgur.com/bIxYeRQ.gif) B/w filter![](https://i.imgur.com/eI9okhg.gif)
rbg(255, 5, 555) tint![](https://i.imgur.com/1n2f2xY.gif) Sped up 3x![](https://i.imgur.com/FsMU13t.gif) Flipped, 0.75x speed, rbg(293, 65, 5) tint![](https://i.imgur.com/AaLiqTR.gif)


*Examples of animation customization options*

In total, we‚Äôd pre-generate 8,700 animation files (435 Nouns assets x 20 unique states), each with an average of 30 frames per animation. That's  a total of 261,000 individual frames to bring this vision to life! There are 23,377,200 possible combinations for a Noun, and 467,544,00 possible animations outcomes (23,377,200 x 20)!


## Why?
---
Currently, there isn't a scalable tool in the Nouniverse that allows users to quickly produce a wide range of highly customizable Nounish cc0 animations on demand.

Game developers, content creators, and everyday users can benefit from such a tool as a building block to create even bigger and more Nounish things!

We're trying to fill this gap in the Nounscape by providing STOMMs (*Super Tool of Mass-Memeification*) in an area that is lacking. With this tool in place, I believe we'll see an explosion of new Nounish content for everyone to use and enjoy as they see fit.

Plus, being able to interact with your Noun deepens our emotional connection to them!

## Interactive App ~ Bonus ~
---
Anyone who owns a Noun or builds one with our Noun Builder app can interact with it on a daily basis through an app we've already built (works on mobile too)! Each Noun will be animated to reflect it's current state or action - it will truly feel like your Noun has come to life!

Here are the following mechanics:

4 Stats (each max val of 100):
* Fullness
* Energy
* Happiness
* Health

3 Player Actions (each grants XP needed in order to level up):
* Feeding ‚Äì Increases fullness and happiness
* Sleeping ‚Äì Increases energy and health
* Playing ‚Äì Increases happiness, decreases fullness and energy

3 Conditions:
* Can‚Äôt sleep while starving
* Can‚Äôt play while sleep-deprived
* Can‚Äôt eat while sick

3 Items (purchasable with points earned from completing actions)
* Coffee ‚Äì Triples the amount of XP gained, but cannot sleep for 8 hr
* Health Potion ‚Äì Replenishes health to full
* Mushroom (can be easily reskinned to another object) ‚Äì 1 of 4 potential effects, chosen at random:
    * Jumbles stats at random
    * Earn a random amount of XP
    * Gain 1 level
    * Eat a poisonous mushroom and die
* All stats decay by 2 every 4 hours automatically, forever
* Sometimes, at random, 1 of the 4 stats will be depleted to zero if all stats are non-zero
* If neglected for ~8 days, the NFT will die
* NFTs can be revived, but lose 1 level and costs points
* Highest levels are ranked in a public leaderboard

![](https://i.imgur.com/PaRnHTs.gif)
*Nounish interactive gameplay demo (limited features)*


## How is this valuable to Nouns??
---

### 1. Public Goods & Network Effects

Everyone from experienced devs to everyday users will be able to generate & access Nounish animations on demand, either through the API or the front-end tool within a few clicks.

This means anyone -- enthusiasts, developers, and/or content creators can save countless hours by bootstrapping these animations to be used any way they like! Some examples include: 

* Enrich existing apps or websites
* Use as stickers and/or emojis for Discord servers
* Use the animations to develop a game
* Use them to make merch and/or NFTs
* Enhance Nounish media like tweets, infographics, or videos
* Use as pfps
* Download the individual animation frames to make sprite sheets
* Use the frame data to create lip-synced animated avatars for video/audio calls

-- the possibilities are endless!

The end result will lead to quicker turnarounds for prototypes and media creations, and act as a catalyst for the proliferation of new Nounish content overall.

Quote from devcarrot, Nounder:
"This sounds like a very fun idea, I love the animations. Would you be willing to make the data accessible to other developers via a public API? Maybe with something like a license that requires attribution? It could be interesting to have Nounish characters hanging out on the various projects‚Äô sites; imagine Timpers‚Äô disco floor but with TinyCitizen characters rendered in real time.

The disco floor:
![](https://cdck-file-uploads-europe1.s3.dualstack.eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/original/2X/a/a30c42ece4e30f7f4aac00f6979b82a057b19eb9.gif)"


### 2. Rally community around organic and fun reward systems

Through the interactive app we‚Äôve already built, it provides opportunities for users to earn rewards through quests.

As an example, we‚Äôve successfully rewarded 80+ unique CrypToadz players with a CrypToadz hat and pair of Nouns glasses to those who reached level 10 with a CrypToad through the interactive app. Everyone shared how much they loved this event!

This provides a more rewarding experience because the merch drop felt earned rather than simply given. In turn, it promotes camaraderie and a sense of fellowship among the community who want to achieve a mutual desired result by partaking in shared experiences.

Any Nounish DAO that wishes to engage their audience can task their community with completing certain actions through the app and granting them an award upon completion.

**Reward bundle: CrypToadz Hat + Noun Glasses + NFT NYC Coaster**
![](https://i.imgur.com/Xupiot6.jpg)
![](https://i.imgur.com/f8PToWz.jpg)

*pssst‚Ä¶ This event is still ongoing! If you want a CrypToadz hat and Nouns glasses you can still grind for them! Find me on Discord :wink:*

### 3. Tap into & activate new creators and builders
If we make these assets readily available for people to access in an engaging and easy manner, it could open up doors for new people to enter the ecosystem.

Those that need assets to build on Nouns in new or interesting ways but have no developer or animation experience can often feel discouraged not knowing where to start.

With the Build-A-Noun app as a building block, we can inspire existing Nounish community members as well as potential new ones to create something Nounish easily and quickly. Anyone can get up and running with tens, hundreds, or thousands of animations ready to use within minutes.

---
* Create an easy-to-use front-end tool + website where anyone can create and download unique cc0 gifs for any Noun configuration on the spot. The 20 unique states/actions are:
    * Idle (breathing + blinking)
    * Happy/Loved
    * Sad/Crying
    * Laughing
    * Talking

    * Eating
        * pizza

    * Drinking
        * coffee
        * water
        * tea
        * health potion
        * mana potion
    * Playing a gameboy
    * Tired
    * Sick
* Create a back-end API, where anyone can instantly grab any animation for any Noun configuration for use in their web apps programmatically via an API key and/or a URL
* Revamped front-end design with mobile-friendly version to generate animations on the go!
* Integration with our existing free-to-play side-app where users can interact and play with their Nouns (already built)
* Publicly host the raw base64 encoded png frame data for all Nouns assets in json format so anyone can use the animation frames how they like

## Timeline
---
### Total: 10 weeks

Each individual trait needs to be manually animated for all 20 states. That's roughly ~1,000 files per week (435 x 20 / 8). Some take shorter than others because they're static in a given animation, or they mimic the same motion as another animation and can be ported. Regardless, there is a lot of upfront work to be done.

### Weeks 1-4:
Front-end work, complete site redesign and development. Mobile-friendly optimization. Developing gif creation software with various customization options.

~50% of animations files complete

### Weeks 5-8:
Back-end work on API creation. Work on image processing and manipulating animation frame data. Create hosting solution for animation data.

~100% of animation files complete

### Weeks 9 & 10:
Hook-up back-end to front-end. Allow 2 week buffer for testing & bug fixes, or any last minute optimizations/improvements.

# Creator Contests - a Nounish Funding Middleware

## Tldr
Fund the Calabara team with 60 ETH to continue developing Creator Contests for a 3-month sprint.

## Introduction
Hi NounsDAO, we‚Äôre nick and weez, the tandem behind Calabara and Creator Contests. 

### Our Nounish Journey: part 1

Both of us were introduced to Nouns by way of SharkDAO, which we first joined over a year ago. We were fascinated by the Nouns protocol and community and soon began building out sharkish tools to ease some of the unique challenges of a Nounish subDAO. We created a dashboard for SharkDAO, which included widgets for a snapshot client, calendar, and token-gated document center. We wanted to build a simple interface for casual members to be able to quickly catch up on the latest in SharkDAO and Nouns. Soon after, other communities asked if they could have their own dashboards. We open-sourced the code, modularized the components, and invited other web3 groups to join. Today, we‚Äôd describe [Calabara](https://calabara.com/explore) as an open-source design house for public infrastructure and applications.

![](https://i.imgur.com/V819CqQ.png)


By prop [62](https://nouns.wtf/vote/62), we began to get excited about many of the ideas being communicated by the Prop House team. We'd been thinking deeply about community funding protocols for some time ourselves, and were eager to experiment with the Prop House model. Unfortunately, we weren‚Äôt yet able to run our own Prop House rounds at SharkDAO (because we don‚Äôt use an erc721 for governance). Prop House wasn‚Äôt open-source yet, so we decided to fork the core ideas of Prop House and build something of our own: Creator Contests. 

## Creator Contests ‚Ä¶ WTF?

Creator Contests are a nounish middleware for distributing funds to creatives.

Creating scalable funding infrastructure at all levels is a critical building block in establishing Nouns as the world's largest open-source brand. Creator contests build upon the strong foundations developed by the Prop House team while experimenting with novel features to create unique incentive systems and new ways to fund builders ‚Äì allowing any Nounish community with an ENS the ability to start running their own contests.

## How does it work?

Similar to Prop House, participants create submissions in response to a contest prompt, and voters choose the best ones. Once the contest is over, funds are distributed to the winners. All contests follow this basic model, but administrators have full control over the contest settings to layer-on additional components. Here‚Äôs what we offer today ‚Ä¶

* Submitter Rewards
    * Define 1 or more winning ranks (1st, 2nd, ... nth place)
    * Define 1 or more rewards for listed ranks (ETH, ERC20, ERC721)
![](https://i.imgur.com/LK2Vg12.png)

* Voter Rewards
    * Voters that accurately choose rank N submission will split X reward.
    * Can be used to create unique incentive systems.
    * NOMO-style games can be created, where voters join forces to try to choose the 2nd best submisison without pushing it to first place.
![](https://i.imgur.com/IBwqCwI.png)

* Participant Restrictions
    * Token thresholds required for participants to submit or vote
    ![](https://i.imgur.com/YcwFxhK.png)

* Voting Strategies
    * Token -- Voting power based on token holdings
    * Arcade -- Uniform voting power for all qualifying voters
    ![](https://i.imgur.com/KpVyBT8.png)

* Twitter Integration
    * Collect submissions via Twitter interactions
    * Inherit all existing infrastructure while proliferating via Twitter
    ![](https://i.imgur.com/0J7OkhJ.png)
    ![](https://i.imgur.com/cDWuZ26.gif)
    
* Additional Parameters
    * Vote total visibility
    * Anonymous Submissions
    * Self Voting
  ![](https://i.imgur.com/jkCGMtY.png)


## Our Nounish Journey: part 2

Before Spring 2022, we had bootstrapped the project ourselves. We were lucky enough to receive support from SharkDAO, and they funded us with 7 ETH to develop an MVP of Creator Contests. We launched our first contest in September, and have helped fund 45 nounish creatives with ~4 ETH and 25k ERC-20 tokens since. 2 months ago, we received a small grant of 8 ETH from NSFW to develop the Twitter Integration mentioned above. We have groups like SharkDAO, Composables, TNS, and the Society of Nounish Cartoonists running contests as we speak. We are now ready to take Creator Contests to the next level.

![](https://i.imgur.com/Fk7grjB.png)


## Goals for the funding period

For this funding period, we‚Äôd like to focus on ‚ÄúTop of the funnel‚Äù funding infrastructure. This means implementing a scalable protocol for funding creatives in the 0.069 - 3 ETH range. Our goal is to fund 100+ nounish creatives in the 3-month window.

While bringing the codebase out of ‚ÄúMVP mode‚Äù so it can sufficiently scale to other Nounish pods (and make it easier to fork), we‚Äôll work on the following upgrades:

* Support native video and other media formats
* Add vote audit reports
* Add voting capability for Noun delegates
* Experiment with new voting strategies
* Simplify contest initialization process.
* Improve our twitter algorithms
* UX redesign - It‚Äôs time for CC to get Nounish


We‚Äôd also like to answer the following questions:

* Are voter rewards a feature or a bug?
* In the voting period, how impactful are visible vote totals on a communities ability to choose the ‚Äúbest‚Äù submissions?
* Does submission history serve as a relevant talent repository for other pods?
* Are deep Twitter integrations viable for other tasks, like governance? (Nouncil, Nerman, etc)
* Are there ways to maintain a certain level of submission quality without directly moderating submissions?
    * Prop House already sees a certain percentage of ‚Äúlow quality‚Äù submissions, and we‚Äôll see higher levels at this funding tier. Are there ways to ensure a certain quality standard without direct moderation? Learnings from this experimentation could be layered on top of Prop House and other applications.







## Defining success

Success at the funding tier we are targeting is tightly coupled with onboarding. We‚Äôll define onboarding for the scope of this project as the following:

* New creatives
    * Introduce new creatives to Nouns and extension communities
* Existing creatives to larger funding tiers
    * Support creatives in the earliest stages of ideation that can translate to quality Prop House or NSFW proposals
* Between Nounish extension communities
    * Increase the discoverability factor of extension projects and communities through different contest designs and synergies, i.e.
        * TNS and Composables co-host a round
        * Multi-community voting
        * Twitter contests

Of course, success for us also hinders on our ability to proliferate the meme. Twitter integrations drastically increase our proliferation potential -- elevating contests from a siloed web app to a publicly discoverable and interactable experience. We're focused on lifting the stack as close to the "public edge" as possible and see the potential for these integrations in other Nounish areas.  

Defining success is one thing, measuring it is different. For this funding term, we‚Äôll do so manually by following up with participants and winners while exploring ways we can automate and better measure this in the future.


## Prop House

*Why not just fork Prop House for real?*

While we haven‚Äôt really heard this much, it‚Äôs a valid question that we anticipate some Nouners might have.

Halting further experimentation to go back and layer our changes on top of the PH codebase feels like a step backwards at this point in time. We envision a coordinated approach where both PH and CC are able to sandbox and test different ideas and merge the ones that work. Ultimately, the far more relevant component to fork will be the smart contracts for a trustless implementation that the PH team is leading, which we fully plan on doing. 

At worst, CC is an alternative client for Prop House. At best, it is an experiment in funding infrastructure, working alongside Prop House in developing sound protocols for high velocity, trustless, and scalable funding infrastructure for web3 communities ‚Äì all powered by Nouns.

# This is Nouns ‚Äî The First Edition minted by Nouns

[![Ordinary Folk Reel](https://i.imgur.com/uSC0HEl.jpg)](https://zora-prod.mypinata.cloud/ipfs/bafybeicnztdctxucbqbpm2m6mghjw6nv4n4opnev4hmftoxk5moykuayeq)
---
Following the overwhelmingly positive response to the Nouns Explainer created by **Ordinary Folk from [Prop 113](https://nouns.wtf/vote/113)**, we are proposing that Nouns releases this video as a timed open edition.

This is a groundbreaking proposal, as it will be the first time that Nouns DAO will be minting and releasing a creative work that was commissioned by the DAO.

By minting this video from the DAO via a proposal, it is becoming NounsDAO canon. Similar to how the DAO added in [new head attributes](https://nouns.wtf/vote/125) via a proposal, Nouns can continue to explore and experiment with new models of CC0 art and production and minting directly from the DAO is a new tool for the organization to directly release and distribute the most important artifacts from the community. It‚Äôs not hard to see how this can advance Nouns into a crypto-native form of Movie Studio, Production House, Art Museum and so on.

This video will be released as a Timed Open Edition for a price of 0.05 ETH. This means it will be available for anyone to mint for the specified minting period, which will be open until the Rose Parade on January 2nd, 2023. The proceeds from sale will be split between Nouns (60%) and Ordinary Folk (40%).

We are excited to experiment with DAO NFT releases as an additional value capture mechanism, and potentially create a simple and repeatable model for any creator, community and brand in the ecosystem to put forward amazing artifacts to be minted via Nouns.

This edition will be minted with [Zora](https://zora.co), and will be available to mint onchain and at [thisisnouns.wtf](https://thisisnouns.wtf)

# Nouns Love v1.0 / Mucho Love v1.25

## **tl;dr**
-   Mucho Love is a nounish social impact platform that follows a ‚Äúsee good, do good‚Äù format that began operating 6 months ago.
-   Nouns Love aims to be a platform that uses content from social impact, public goods, and charitable efforts to expand Nouns through social media content creation and storytelling.
-   The platform will increase brand equity by building a positive association of the ‚åê‚óß-‚óß in a widespread audience.
-   Nouns Love will have international communities in Uganda, Mexico, Germany, and Spain test the framework‚Äôs adaptability.
-   Some of the planned activations in the Dominican Republic include cooking 100 children‚Äôs dream meals, giving free haircuts and essentials to an entire community, and building a house that got destroyed by Hurricane Fiona.
-   Development of a Nouns Love toolkit, creating a framework that can be used by other communities for smoother activations.
-   The proposal requests funding for a 4-month extension to establish Nouns Love as a fully functional platform and keep growing Mucho Love in the DR for further experimentation.

### What is Mucho Love?


**Mucho Love is a social impact platform that follows a ‚Äúsee good, do good‚Äù format.**  
ML uses social impact activations and content creation/distribution to proliferate ‚åê‚óß-‚óß .

**It began in Lil Nouns on prop.house** ([https://prop.house/lil-nouns/round-3/655](https://prop.house/lil-nouns/round-3/655)) **and then went on-chain**. ([https://nouns.wtf/vote/137](https://nouns.wtf/vote/137)).

#### In the past 6 months, we have:

[(click on thumbnail to watch video)![IMAGE ALT TEXT HERE](https://i.vimeocdn.com/video/1561716804-3360feb04da9e29f78f85da2dc88f4110188ae47a4829b62956a480df34894fd-d?mw=700&mh=1244&q=70)](https://vimeo.com/778159366)

### Problem Statement

Charitable efforts, social impact, and public goods are **cornerstone activities within the Nouns ecosystem**.

NounsDAO **has funded a total of 1468 ETH for 19 proposals** related to charitable efforts/social impact through on-chain, NSFW, and prop.house. *_Data from proposal.wtf_

Public goods are an **essential** part of what Nouns is, not only helping society but making the community feel even more connected with each other. **The desire to help others and make a positive impact on the world**, for many people, is **a way to connect with others and create a sense of community and shared purpose**.

**What are the main problems?**
-   Nouns has yet to have a platform that leverages all of these impacts done by the community, content creation opportunities are not seized.
-   As Nouns keeps growing and more public goods are activated, the need for a flexible framework that produces raw content of charitable efforts, public goods, and donations is a must within the ecosystem.
-   There should be a platform that gathers community members interested in social impact and public goods.

**Social Impact is one of the best ways to show any human what Nouns can do**. The power that **see good, do good** content has is too big to let it go to waste. So far, Nouns has been one of the most successful projects at integrating IRL to web3 impact.

Showing everyone how a community can come together to help others and cooperate with each other, **a community connected by ‚åê‚ó®-‚ó®**, is an excellent way to noun-pill newcomers.

This is where _**Nouns Love**_ comes in.

![nounslove](https://i.imgur.com/Zo86psu.png)

### What is Nouns Love?
Nouns Love is born from the interest of the Mucho Love‚Äôs team to **develop a global platform that uses content from social impact, public goods, charitable efforts to leverage the expansion of Nouns through social media content creation and storytelling**. Nouns Love will focus on in-real-life impact activations and public goods generated by the Nounish community.

The power that **see good, do good** content has is too big to let it go to waste. So far, Nouns has been one of the most successful projects at integrating IRL to web3 impact.

**Nouns Love will increase brand equity by building a positive association with the brand in a widespread audience**.

![](https://i.imgur.com/4lw5YK7.jpg)

### Transitioning to _Nouns Love_
We will start transitioning from Mucho Love to Nouns Love. Mucho Love will stay as a branch of Nouns Love for further social impact experimentation, public interaction, and testing ground of new ideas in the DR.

**Nouns Love** aims to become a branch of Nouns that focuses on using storytelling, different narratives, and high-quality IRL content creation, which with the **see good, do good** content format **will expand Nouns to a global audience**.

By the end of the 4-month extension Nouns Love aims to be established as a fully functional platform.

![](https://i.imgur.com/5j9RvTb.jpg)

### Mucho Love and international communities
International communities will be using the model created by Mucho Love for its activations to test its adaptability. This will allow to take into account the inherent differences between countries, cultures, societal structures that exist throughout the world.

**The communities that will test the model**:  
‚ó® Uganda - led by Davin ([https://twitter.com/davinoyesigye](https://twitter.com/davinoyesigye))  
‚ó® Mexico - led by Mono & Ale ([https://twitter.com/NounsDAOAmigos](https://twitter.com/NounsDAOAmigos))  
‚ó® Germany - led by bk ([https://twitter.com/0xbk_](https://twitter.com/0xbk_))  
‚ó® Spain - led by BlakeNeit ([https://twitter.com/blakeneit](https://twitter.com/blakeneit))

**DR activations**:
-   Knife RD x Mucho Love - ‚ÄúWe cooked 100 children‚Äôs dream meals‚Äù ([https://www.instagram.com/kniferd/](https://www.instagram.com/kniferd/))
-   Giving an entire community free hair cuts and essentials
-   @sunsetco.rd x Mucho Love - ‚ÄúWe took 10 families to see the beach for the first time‚Äù ([https://www.instagram.com/sunsetco.rd/](https://www.instagram.com/sunsetco.rd/))
-   Techo RD x Mucho Love - [https://rd.techo.org/](https://rd.techo.org/) - Building a house for a family that lost it all to Hurricane Fiona
-   Hugo Mendoza Children‚Äôs Hospital x Mucho Love ([https://hospitalhugomendoza.gob.do/](https://hospitalhugomendoza.gob.do/))

**International activations**:
-   A refugee dedicated to preserving the endangered Mexican donkey
-   A volunteering event that will hand out food to homeless people around the city.
-   A child care center for orphans and abandoned children to donate clothes, nounish educational materials such as books and pencils, toys, and dry stock food hampers.
-   A city clean-up activation volunteering event.

### Content creation and distribution
**Every public good, social impact, and charitable effort has a unique narrative**. Through storytelling, all of these narrative can portray what it means to be nounish. Nouns Love will have its own in-house marketing team **to develop unique narratives through captivating, ‚Äúsee good, do good‚Äù style videos**.

**The amount of raw content that can be produced from public goods, charitable efforts, social impact is immense**. The marketing team will receive raw content to produce high-quality content for social media distribution. The team will have constant brainstorming sessions with international community leads to deeply understand the particular narratives of every activation done.

Content creation was one of the biggest challenges that Mucho Love faced, not having our own team that could develop our ideas, concepts, and styles was a huge limiting factor on our social media content capacity. **NL‚Äôs in-house team will allow us to 5x our content creation capabilities**.

![](https://i.imgur.com/ZjHKKHM.jpg)

### Development of a flexible framework
During the past 6 months of activations, Mucho Love has made mistakes, created solutions, and changed formats. The amount of time lost by Mucho Love‚Äôs starting inefficiencies is very significant. Time-efficiency is the reason why we decided to develop a flexible framework for public goods, charitable efforts, and social impact.

**A flexible framework that allows for better, smoother activations, therefore saving time.** The framework will take into account many minor details that may be overlooked which can lead to a poor activation and overall experience.

**This framework will be tested by our international communities** that will be performing social impact activations during the following 4 months.

![](https://i.imgur.com/UvXE2KN.png)

### Global synchronous activations
**A global synchronous activation is an activity performed by many different communities that form the Nounish ecosystem in a certain time period**. These activations will target the same issue/activity and produce raw content for content creation.

By providing a platform for people to connect and interact in real time, global synchronous activities **can help to build relationships and foster a sense of belonging among members of a community**.

**Nouns Love aims to portray the amazing work being done by nounish communities all around the world**. With storytelling, content creation, narratives, and marketing allowing Nouns to reach a wide audience.

By removing all barriers of crypto, web3, creating a wallet, discord, different websites, twitter, **see good, do good content** will be able to transcend as far as many hearts it touches in its path. Additionally, global synchronous activities will help build momentum and enthusiasm for a particular cause or issue, driving up engagement and participation within the community.

### Social media & content distribution
**We aim to expand Nouns Love to**:  
‚ó® Youtube: Mid-length video format striving to combine storytelling with good animations, edits, and clips that will lead to the production of family-friendly, shareable, ‚Äúsee good, do good.‚Äù content.  
‚ó® Tiktok: Short video formats with catchy hooks with the main point of spreading the ‚åê‚óß-‚óßs through the platform. Making it easier for people who find the ‚åê‚óß-‚óßs interesting to click the profile and access other social media where more information will be more easily found (Instagram, Youtube).  
‚ó® Instagram: So far, Instagram has worked for us pretty well. A few flops and one fantastic post (a post with 67,000 likes), but it‚Äôs been great in general. Instagram will be the ‚Äúface‚Äù of what NL stands for, does, and activates. We‚Äôll also be using challenge formats to engage more people.  
‚ó® Twitter: We‚Äôll be using Twitter to make updates like ‚ÄúToday, Nouns Love donated 100 football kits powered by ‚åê‚óß-‚óß‚Äù.

**Combining youtube‚Äôs storytelling capabilities through mid-length content that engages viewers, TikTok‚Äôs short-form video with hooks that captivate the attention to the noggles, and Instagram as the face of NL, we believe that it‚Äôll be only a matter of time & effort for us to reach substantially good levels in all these platforms**.

# Verbs 6 Month Extension

## TLDR

* [DAO V2 upgrade](https://nouns.wtf/vote/152), including dynamic quorum and voting gas refund.
* Enabled trustless [proposal payments in USDC](https://twitter.com/davidbrai/status/1598623310094688256)

## What's next

We have a [chunky backlog](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/verbs-szn-3-ideas-brainstorm/3189#backlog-2) recently shared with everyone, and we're planning to work on it starting with what seems most urgent/important first. 

At the same time, we're always open to introducing new ideas into our backlog; our north star is working on what's most valuable to the DAO.

The change we're most excited to complete during this extension period is ragequit. In addition to ragequit, we're tracking the following themes:

![Themes & Examples](https://bafkreicd6qlgpghe22d7dbirhot4f3cfxuwkiox2sfjvsmknywpaomqw2i.ipfs.nftstorage.link/)

## Compensation and terms

* 6 month engagement starting Feb 1, 2023.
* Either party can cancel with 1 month advanced notice.
* Payment done via streams controlled by the tech pod.
* $37.5k per person (2) per month (6) paid in USDC.

* Total: 450,000 USDC, 18 ETH.

# Increase Voting Delay to 5 Days

A proposal, when submitted to Nouns DAO, has to go through the following:

 - 2 days of Voting Delay
 - 5 days of Voting Period

This configuration was last updated in [Prop 161](https://nouns.wtf/vote/161).

I propose we increase the voting delay to 5 days for the following reasons:

 - Gives the public more time to view, evaluate, and discuss props in public before big votes come in and sway opinions.
 - Gaurantees that weekly meetings will be able to discuss every prop no matter when it was submitted.
 - Gives DAOs and Communities with Nouns more time to organize the logistics of posting the props for discussion, holding an internal vote on it, and processing the vote on-chain.

joel & krel

# Atrium X Nouns - A Lore Experiment


# Atrium X Nouns - A Lore Experiment
![](https://i.imgur.com/ZQDdQuJ.jpg)

## Description:
**TL,DR**
We are proposing to commission [Atrium](https://atrium.art/) & [3D Print Guy](https://twitter.com/3d_printguy) to create a cinematic 1:30-2min animated story introducing the World of Nouns. Bring the expertise of a Pixar veteran to the Nouns ecosystem enabling us to create a foundational animated short story & proliferate the meme!


[Check out the proposal trailer!](https://twitter.com/3D_PrintGuy/status/1604906537184792576)
![](https://i.imgur.com/V58xsIR.jpg)

**Wait, what is Atrium?**
Atrium.art is a crypto-native network of independent artists and creators. Disciplines represented on Atrium currently include Screenwriting, Animation, Concept Art, Voice Actors, and Music production. Together, creatives on Atrium bring experience from Pixar, Marvel, Luma Pictures, Sony, Netflix and many more.

> You can see the work of Artists on Atrium [here](https://atrium.art/)

Simply put, Atrium is a way to easily piece together veteran talent to produce cinematic content.

**So ‚Ä¶ What is this animated Lore?**
Nouns are cc0 identities coming forth one day at a time. While there have been explainer videos done via [113](https://nouns.wtf/vote/113) and open video content proposals (explainers) via [181](https://nouns.wtf/vote/181), We want to create an engaging cinematic introduction to the world of nouns. One that reflects the original intent behind the emergence of Nouns DAO, a story that shows who nouns are, what they have been up to, and a nod to future plans. A tale that leaves the audience curious, engaged, and wanting for more.

We believe this animation will serve as a foundation to build an expansive storyworld on top of nouns cc0 IP. Where any noun could go beyond the core nouns audience and have a viewership across different communities native to crypto and beyond.

**Who is the creator behind this first story?**
Having a creator who understands the NFT space, the broader story, and cinematic culture is important when developing content to serve as a landing page for Nouns. We believe that 3D Print Guy is uniquely equipped in style, storytelling and understanding to provide a memorable rendition of the values and beliefs behind nouns.
![](https://i.imgur.com/rmzvlQT.jpg)

With over 2 decades of experience in the business, including working on films like Up, he has been tugging on your heart strings over many years. His youtube page has content eclipsing 45 million views and his characters and plots have shown the ability to capture the world‚Äôs attention. He has also demonstrated an ability to release relevant content based on trending topics as seen with his most recent animation about [ChatGPT](https://twitter.com/3D_PrintGuy/status/1600116597711990784) (5k+ likes, 77k+ video views on twitter).

Quick Links about 3D Print Guy -

[Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/c/3DPrintGuyChannel)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/3D_PrintGuy)

In 2022 alone he has produced 15 min of animation both in longer formats and short viral clips, with sound design and VFX all done in house. In 2023, we hope to have the opportunity to help proliferate the nouns as well.

Some of the Highlights of 3D Print Guy‚Äôs independent work

[Imposter Origins: Among Us](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xpCrmbP-Dfs&ab_channel=3DPrintGuy)
![](https://europe1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/optimized/2X/e/eea1fe1b1a05d83b75e4260ea6e9a44c654ae275_2_1264x514.jpeg)
30+ mil views between Part 1 and Part 2

[Sixstrings: Commissioned Non-canon BAYC Story](https://twitter.com/siixstrings/status/1554875246049722370)

**Process at Atrium**
The entire process is a feedback loop. We would be creating a special channel on the Atrium discord server where Nouners are welcome to join and follow along the milestones of the process.

We would love to have at least one nounder to engage in conversation so that the story stays loosely true to the canon if any.

* The workflow starts with defining the script and dialogs (if any) for the story. This involves defining shot by shot verbatim descriptions of what is happening on screen. A good story is a great script in the first step.
* After the script is done, we start to look for Voice actors who will help narrate / engage in dialog based on the script. If the script doesn‚Äôt have any dialogs and is mostly visually expressive we skip this step.
* Now the fun part begins where you start to model the characters, the environment, the objects in the scene. Rigging a model is technically intensive process and better rigged models are more equipped for better emotions during a scene (more fluid and organic movements)

![](https://europe1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/optimized/2X/e/e4408f0a1790f89fa248ea6aa9d233881580b665_2_522x518.jpeg)
* Once you have the 3d assets ready - you start the process of Look-Dev. Look development in CG means you start to give definition to the model through textures, lighting, colours etc. They start to come to life.
* Animatic essentially lets you block out part by part of the story sequence with actual scene setup (the animation is not smooth and done yet but essentially simulates the storyboard).
* Using the animatic, Sound design can start to happen.
* We will review the animatic and invite feedback to the animatic via our communication channel.
* Once the animatic is locked down, the final animation work begins. This is the most intensive and time consuming process and takes the bulk of the later half of the creation cycle.
* After final animation is done - it is time for last visual effects, lighting passes, refinements before you start to map out the finished sound design artefacts as well as the dialogs.
* And then the final Reveal of the output (examples shared above). Final Output to premiere both on Twitter as well as youtube.

We will be utilising the Story‚Äôs reach in terms of reshares / likes / social engagement as metrics for success.

**Ask / Cost**

All inclusive production cost is proposed to be 20 ETH. (Transferred to the Atrium Multi-sig upon execution)

Things covered included

* Storyboarding, Scripting
* Multiple character plotline (3d Modelling)
* In 3d animation, cost ramps up as you animate more than one character in a scene + dialog work
* Voice Over + Sound design
* Animation
* Final FX

> We will also be including the main characters 3d files (rigged) available for download and re-use under cc0.


**Production Schedule**
Post the proposal execution, we will look at a final production duration of about 6-8 weeks of the above process.


We will be coordinating the comms and logistics through out the whole process alongside 3dPrintGuy. Below are the team members involved:

**Team at Atrium**
![](https://europe1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/optimized/2X/9/9687218ba0fd098bac4f63262303f4372d6943b2_2_1380x506.jpeg)
* Supriyo - Founder | Atrium.art
* Anaroth - Head of Community
* Bri Ferraro - Artist and Collector Relations
* Lasharna - Head of Marketing

**The Future**

After the first nouns story, based on the reception of the content launch and social signals, Atrium intends to come back with a larger proposal to fund n (undecided number) number of new original nouns Stories.

This will be Atrium‚Äôs take on creating an expanding anthology series centered around nounish lore where different creators from the Atrium ecosystem come together to build new characters with their backstories, lore and more.

This will be an interactive exercise where we will do a Casting call and participating creators / artists themselves make the decision on selecting casting call winners.

# Nouns Sports Pick‚ÄôEm‚Ñ¢

# **TLDR;**

This proposal aims to develop Nouns Sports Pick‚ÄôEm‚Ñ¢ - an inclusive community-based game that proliferates Nouns through the global sports community. 

**Proliferating the Nouns & Benefitting the Community:**

1)	**Make sports communities and fan-engagement Nounish**

2)	**Educate and grow a community of Nouners within Web2 sports fans**

3)	**Create a fun place for Nouners to enjoy sports together**

![](https://i.imgur.com/HuKu41u.jpg)


# **How It Works:**

Noun Sports Pick‚ÄôEm‚Ñ¢ is a peer-to-peer platform that hosts contests where players pick which teams they think will win, earn points for correct selections, and win prizes! This global game is NOT gambling. It‚Äôs a peer-to-peer platform where fans challenge each other to test their sports knowledge. It‚Äôs where trivia meets March Madness, but for every sport and every Nouner. Nouners will participate against each other in fun, easy, and simple-to-play daily contests across all major sports leagues. Here‚Äôs how to play:
 
### Players join and get a free game credit. 
![](https://i.imgur.com/Je5UNvw.png)
### Contesting will be available in major global sports leagues, with new leagues being added on demand.
![](https://i.imgur.com/LuODrnj.png)
### Players choose a contest of their choice
![](https://i.imgur.com/99eWvk7.png)
### Players choose a winner of every game in the contest and earn points for each correct selection
![](https://i.imgur.com/D3W6oIW.png) 
### The more points they earn the higher the prize
![](https://i.imgur.com/yxWRgS4.png) 


# Proliferating The Nouns
Sports is a global passion, integrated within every Web2 and Web3 community. However, the bridge between these two groups has always been a challenge. When it comes to understanding Web3, Web2 users simply don‚Äôt know where to start. It‚Äôs up to Web3 projects to create resources that are immediately useful to them; Noun Sports Pick‚ÄôEm‚Ñ¢ is designed to do exactly that. This game cultivates an audience of Web2 sports fans in one place by providing a fun, inclusive, daily sports game.

Once the user has been registered, the game is designed to develop their interest in Web3, specifically the Nouns. In addition to the game‚Äôs Nouns branding, there are several key user journeys that will proliferate the Nouns.
1.	**NFT Prizes:** Many of the prizes will be NFTs and the dollar values will be shown. When Web2 users see the monetary value tied to the asset, they will be far more inclined to learn about NFTs. ***We will prioritize prizing from the Nouniverse ecosystem***
2.	**Nouns Updates:** Users will receive regular updates through e-mail and push notifications about other Nouns projects. There will be a page on the App where they can learn more about these projects.
3.	**Daily Facts:** Everyday there will be a brief Noun fact pop-up that users will see when they first open the App. Users can click ‚ÄúExplore Nouns‚Äù to be redirected to the Nouns Encyclopedia. 
4.	**Weekly Voting:** Every week, users can vote on which prize they want the following week. Showing the various NFT utility (many of which will be sports related) will educate users on the Web3 space. On this page, users can click to learn more about the Nouns DAO and voting as well.
5.	**Nouns Encyclopedia:** Across the App there will be prompts for users to click ‚ÄúNouns Encyclopedia‚Äù which will be a complete guide to the Nouns. Users will be provided with direct links the Nouns native site

### A subsection of the app titled ‚ÄúNouns Encyclopedia‚Äù will be a resource centre for players to learn about Nouns and NFT‚Äôs 
![](https://i.imgur.com/F7D7VjC.png)
### In app messaging will provide players with interesting facts about the Nouns, Nouns DAO, and NFT‚Äôs 
![](https://i.imgur.com/7udQWRo.png)
### Players will be notified on the app when a new Noun has been minted and provided with a redirect to the Nouns website to bid on future Nouns 
![](https://i.imgur.com/Stky4Ov.png)
### Bounty will offer NFTs as contest grand prizes, and players will have the ability to vote on which NFT prize they‚Äôd like to play for 
![](https://i.imgur.com/ApqbmiW.png)
